title: Resuscitate!
description:
Resuscitate! offers instant videos on how to perform CPR, use an AED, and aid a choking victim. Developed by leading educators and doctors at the University of Washington, it is compatible with the latest recommendations from national organizations. More info at learncpr.org

The CPR videos that incorporate the latest guidelines issued by the American Heart Association (Oct 2010). The most prominent change is from A-B-C (airway, breathing, chest compressions) to C-A-B (chest compressions first, then airway and breathing).

From the AHA Executive Summary (http://circ.ahajournals.org/cgi/content/full/122/18_suppl_3/S640): "The newest development in the 2010 AHA Guidelines for CPR and ECC is a change in the basic life support (BLS) sequence of steps from "A-B-C" (Airway, Breathing, Chest compressions) to "C-A-B" (Chest compressions, Airway, Breathing) for adults and pediatric patients (children and infants, excluding newly borns). Although the experts agreed that it is important to reduce time to first chest compressions, they were aware that a change in something as established as the A-B-C sequence would require re-education of everyone who has ever learned CPR."

Be sure to maintain proper training as there are other important changes to the guidelines in addition to C-A-B.

summary: Instant videos on how to perform CPR, use an AED, and aid a choking victim
recentChanges: Added AED instruction
comments: This is a very good app to have so is becoming fully certified on first aid and CPR and how to use a portable defibrillator.
My dad choked an I was so glad I had this app. We saved his life.
Everyone needs this.
To low of level of CPR for my needs
Very informative

title: Cooking Diary®: Best Tasty Restaurant & Cafe Game
description:
Become the chef of your own restaurant in an exciting and FREE time management game! Cooking Diary is the best cooking game recognized by prestigious awards, loved and supported by MILLIONS OF PLAYERS around the world! Caution: this game can cause real culinary fever!

Welcome to Tasty Hills—a city where everyone loves to cook! It's your turn to keep a cooking diary. Help your grandpa save his family restaurant chain and build his reputation back up! Don't give your competitors a single chance to cook up evil plans, while you find true friends, manage restaurants and cafés, and cook top-quality dishes! Join fascinating events in the city's vibrant lifestyle, and gain fame as a great chef!

Features:
● COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
● OPEN dozens of restaurants and cafés in all the districts of Tasty Hills and decorate them to your taste!
● AMAZE the whole world by trying on ultra-stylish looks!
● MAKE FRIENDS with cute and amazing pets of all kinds!
● WIN in various culinary competitions with lots of prizes!
● INTERACT with the residents of the city and immerse yourself in an exciting story!

🏆 Winner of the WEBBY PEOPLE'S VOICE AWARD 2020 for Strategy/Simulation Game
🏆 International Mobile Gaming Awards 2019 People's Choice Award winner

Play with your friends to cook and have fun together! Cooking Diary is a game that unites lovers of delicious and beautiful food from all over the world! Meet and chat with like-minded people—a love of cooking is a great starting point for a good friendship.

You can cook at restaurants and enjoy culinary adventures offline as well!

Tasty Hills is waiting for the grand opening of your restaurant! Etch your name in culinary history right now, Chef!

Join us on social media to keep up with the latest news from Tasty Hills:
https://www.facebook.com/CookingDiaryMYTONA/
https://www.youtube.com/CookingDiaryGame/
https://www.instagram.com/cookingdiary_official/
https://twitter.com/cookingdiary/
https://www.instagram.com/realvivisaur/
https://twitter.com/realvivisaur/

comments: The feedback by developers that "levels are balanced and can be completed without purchases" is bogus. That's like saying you can walk 20 miles to work if you don't have a car. Technically true, practically untenable. Unless you don't care about quickly progressing through levels and don't mind saving up measly 2-ruby daily rewards...skip this. It's an awesome game but without making constant in-app purchases, it's too frustrating to be worth anyone's time. Also the house/pet features are dumb.

It's fun but can get get frustratingly difficult. It's annoying how many gems you need to upgrade your restaurants later when you barely get any. I wish they would change it so you can buy the pet stuff with coins instead of gems, because I don't want to waste my precious gems on them. I know you can get pet stuff via challenges but it can be difficult.

I did so much progress in this game, unlocking new restaurants and having so much equipment and upgraded stuff, I don't remember when or why, but I uninstalled it, now I remembered it and I installed it again, as expected everything was gone, I just made a character and did the tutorial, afterwards, it showed my saves, and it showed that other save and I thought it would bring back all the progress I'd done but it didn't, I just want to know how to restore everything.

I love how there seems to be endless levels without in-app purchases. But... when I first started to play upgrading the interior of the restaurants cost way less bank notes. I don't want to spend hard earned gems on that. I'm saving those for the kitchen. Why did you guys jack up the prices of things? Plus the new house thing. The shear amount of gems I'd need to purchase ONE piece of furniture is rediculous!! So i pretty much ignore that feature. And why do in-app purch cost so much?

I honestly really enjoyed this game to begin with. It was fun, interesting and I really like the guild feature. But I've been playing for maybe a week or so and now it's asking me to pay rubies to upgrade things. I don't have a lot of rubies and I think it's really silly that that are so expensive! You don't earn nearly enough rubies to actually make it worth the wait. The entire game is centered around them and it's really not fun to play anymore as everything gets more expensive! :(

title: Cooking Fever
description:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! 

With a wide choice of unique locations and restaurants, from Desserts and Fast Food to Indian and Chinese cuisines, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use hundreds of delicious ingredients to cook the best quality dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. 

Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

Features:
• Thousands of delicious dishes to cook using hundreds best quality ingredients
• Huge choice of world famous cuisines
• More than a 1000 levels to complete
• Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, tournaments, challenges, and other gameplay improvements.

recentChanges:
Can you hear the sound of the balalaika and the bayan? Welcome to The Three Matryoshkas, my friend!
Surprise your visitors with hand-made dumplings and savory borscht, offer them the freshest bread with caviar, and pour some hot tea from the genuine vintage samovar: a real treat during long, dark winter evenings!
comments: I love this game.its great and very fun. Please return this game back to when we could play it without data. I want to be able to play without data. Thank you. This game is best cooking game i have ever downloaded, but we are playing with money, (data) that's why am giving it 4 stars. Otherwise i ought to give it a 5 star. Please look into my request. Thank you.

My favorite game that has actual goals to reach. I never put money into the game. There is a mini game you can win gems to help with upgrades and ads if you want to get extra coins, but are not required to play. It's definitely challenging. I do dislike how some upgrades won't help you at all get three stars on some levels though. So, there is a requirement for certain upgrades to win a level with 3 stars...but you won't know until you keep upgrading everything.

The game is addictive, no doubt. Everything is very good, loved it. Giving a 3 coz it takes a lot of diamonds to pass a level and there's no such source of earning them. Playing a level over and over again because you don't have enough diamonds to update is totally frustrating. If you want us to pay so many diamonds for things so at least let there be a good source to earn them.

Fun and challenging levels that test hand-eye coordination as well as cognitive acuity. Some of the restaurants have similar foods, but the builds are always fun and creative the further along you get. The only downside is the number of diamonds needed to upgrade and progress. Tech support has been fantastic. I lost my progress in 2018 and deleted the game out of frstratio. 2 years later they were able to restore my account. Thank you!

The game is nice,i have to give that much to the developers. The issues i have with the game-the only reason i rated it 3 stars-,is that it is data consuming.You need data to do virtually everything in the game. Firstly I downloaded the game with data,then to play the game you have to connect to the internet at all times. And as if that is not enough, after acquiring enough coins and gems to buy a new restaurant, you would still need to connect to the internet to download its contents. NOT NICE

title: Asian Cooking Star: New Restaurant & Cooking Games
description:
Play the new Fast Pace Cooking Games and Restaurant Games. Explore the Asian Food and feel the Madness and Fever of a crazy chef who loves cooking games. Feel the cooking fever in this addictive cooking game.

Cook and serve cuisines from Japan, China, Thailand, India, Middle East, South Korea, Russia etc, and become a true Star Chef. Working in different restaurants around Asia and become a master chef in this one of the top-rated cooking games.

Download for Free Now this Madness filled new Cooking Game get a cooking fever and be a Crazy chef. 

Simplified Asian Food and Recipes to cook at a fast pace in restaurants with Time management game features. The cooking game has hundreds of levels and they are easy to play and hard to master. 

Be the star chef in this is fun and challenging Restaurant games. Asian Cooking Star is a sequel of our other top-rated cooking game - Indian Cooking Star!
 
Create your Crazy Cooking diary with tons of recipes! Cook like you have cooking madness or fever for cooking or you're a crazy chef running your restaurant game. 
 
Time-management features will keep you on your toes at every level. 
 
Variety of Mouth-watering food & kitchens:
Asian Cooking Star is one of the best Time Management Cooking games available on the Play Store.
 
Cook unique and traditional Japanese Food:

Explore restaurants of various cultures: China, Japan, India, Thailand, South Korea etc.

Cook Lunch, Dinner, Breakfast, and Fast Food

Master the culinary arts of Grilling, Frying, Boiling, Sushi Making, Baking, and mixing drinks.

Install the cooking games now and start your Asian Food Journey in Restaurant Games. 
 
Travel & Cook in Exotic Regions:
Travel north, south, west, and eastern part of India. Cook and own a variety of restaurants in these amazing cooking games.

Travel Asia and the middle-east for more variety of Asian Food: Japanese, Chinese, South Korean, Thai, and Arabian local food is available.

Love Cakes? Well, we have plenty of restaurants available for a chef like you to bake and cook some delicious sweets in Kitchen Restaurant Games.

Be the best chef in the region and become a master chef. Cook & Serve Asian Food & Feel Cooking Fever in Cooking Games. As a Crazy Chef with cooking fever, you'll be visiting various Asian Countries on this culinary journey to explore Asian food.

1. China
Cook Noodles, duck, rice, and other popular Chinese food of the region.

2. Japan
Cook Sushi, Bento box, Sashimi, Onigiri, Ramen and other popular Japanese Cuisine and food in the Japanese food region.

3. India
Cook Naan Roti, Curries, Fish, Dosa, and other popular Indian cuisines and dishes in this region.

4. Thailand
Cook Pad Thai, Seafood, Thai curries, and other popular Thai Food in this region

Who is this cooking game for?
One of the best cooking games and restaurant games on Asian Food. The game is amazing graphics and addictive gameplay.

Cooking Games is suitable for girls, kids, men, and women. The gameplay is easy, just tap, cook, and serve food.
 
Fast-Pace time-management Cooking Games with Levels:
Well, it's fast-paced, easy to play, and hard to master the cooking game. One of the best cooking games for the casual gamer.
 
Asian Cooking Star has a variety of boosters which might elevate your fun during the crazy kitchen serving in various restaurants.

Asian Cooking Star has one of the easiest and most smooth gameplay ever in chef cooking games.
 
Start your culinary cooking adventure and have a cooking diary with you to maintain all your crazy kitchen chef experiences and record all of your cooking in your kitchen diary.

Asian Cooking Star is a FREE casual Restaurant Cooking game.

Try this amazing, fun, colorful, and addictive chef kitchen cooking game. One of the best New cooking simulation games available for girls, kids, and adults.

comments: One of my criticisms of the game is the double tapping to discard an item. It causes me to lose a life/heart a lot when I did not intentionally do it. It would be better to discard an item by tapping it and the trash can instead. Please change this. Other than that, I enjoy this game and learning about other cultures and foods.

Since I updated this app is not working properly like before. Before you play u will need to download it, not only that the game is not displaying again is now showing black. And secondly the app will just close it self while your trying to play the game. This is so annoying I shouldn't have updated this game at the first place. You should fix this problem or I will uninstall it.

Edited 13102020: After the recent update, i had to re-download the levels after Japan within the app. I hope you could improve this. I know you're doing this to reduce your app size but it's a hassle to redownload again the data, haiyaa.. Thankfully tho, I don't hv to replay all the played levels after redownload the stages. If you do that, I might say goodbye to this game just like the Spongebob Cooking Game did to me.
It's a fun game. Just started playing . Just wish it didn't make you use the boosters right off. I love the graphics! Way to go guys. I'll update review once I get further into game.

The app keeps crashing. I haven't even been able to play a single round because the app crashes before the page even loads. Disappointing. I have played Indian cooking star and that did not have any such issues.

title: Cooking Family :Craze Madness Restaurant Food Game
description:
Crazy cooking is one of the finest arts available on the planet.
Experience the fever of real cooking in the kitchen without making any effort with Cooking Family : Craze Madness Restaurant Food Game. This crazy chef game is a truly international cooking game that brings together worldwide cuisines under one app and also gives you precious knowledge on the madness art of craze cooking restaurant.

Cooking Family is definitely a madness restaurant cooking game in which you must fulfill customer orders and create different tasty dishes in a bustling restaurant. The aim of this chef game is simple: you must serve your customers and make as much profit as possible! In this exciting chef game you must move around the world and build a series of thriving Restaurant fever.

Play cooking crazy and try all the possible kitchen game appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and beef steak makers.

comments: Love this game, very addictive. Don't get me wrong, it is frustrating as well as you serve all the customers yet it says you haven't completed it and so you either pay for more diamonds/energy or you have to watch continuous ads about other games to recharge your lives, which is okay if you can keep yourself busy while it is recharging rather than sit there watching the repetitive ads.

Love the game, but Paris 24 tier 2 is impossible to beat. It is this new combo coin only level, i hate it. You need 465 points to beat it. Combo 5 gives you 40 points only and this level gives you a maximum of 42 dishes only. So even if i make all 5 combos out of the 42 dishes, i will only make 320 coins. Not even close. Now i am stuck.

I liked your game.It is so nice but I did not like one thing which is heart why to play it need heart I like your game no doubt in it but do something about heart I Luke your game but if hearts are finish than l have to wait for half an hour plz do something about it do so quickly nothing else complaint only that much you and about your game than your is so nice,Interesting,awesome, etc and plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz do something about it as fast as you can nothing else plzzz do it so.🙏
This game is fun and easy to play. I love the challenges and it's easy to earn gems. You just watch videos to earn them. The customers are cool and it's an interesting game! Overall, I love the game!
After playing a ton of similar games and getting stuck because of in app purchases,this one was surely a pleasant surprise. If you don't mind ads,you won't need to purchase anything at all!

title: Cooking Frenzy™:Fever Chef Restaurant Cooking Game
description:
Let's find your taste, your way to cooking hot dog, hamburgers and so on... Cooking Frenzy is much more than just a Purest, Truest, and Fast-Paced kitchen restaurant game. Come and embrace the cooking craze 🍳 and feel the collecting fever🔥! We fused the popular collecting and diner dash gameplay styles together to offer you a different flavor of fun in this Cooking City🕹😝👻! Come and record your cookout diary!📚📚

A precious album of worldwide cuisines are divided into pieces and lost in different countries for a long time… All the world-class collectors, top gourmets, and crazy chefs👩‍🍳👨‍🍳 are looking for the lost cards and pieces. It is rumored that some famous restaurants are hiding the pieces in their kitchens, and use them as rewards for people who pass their diner dash cooking 🍳 challenges. 

As a passionate chef, you are invited to take part in those challenges. Now you have the opportunity to make the album complete again. Accept this challenge! And start the treasure hunt around the cooking world! On this cooking adventure, you will:

🔥Travel across different 🌐 countries! 
🔥Cook and Serve in various cooking city! 
🔥Conquer the creative and addictive food levels! 
🔥Feel the exotic taste of fantastic 🍱🥘 food!
🔥Collect the precious cards of distinctive🥢🍴cultures!
🔥Expand your collections and achieve great fame!
🔥Master the secret 📜 recipes of authentic food!
🔥Claim generous rewards and gifts for your victory!
🔥Enjoy the great graphics all about cooking mania!
🔥Have a fast-paced but relaxing time!
🔥Get endless fun from the engaging progression!

Cooking cultures may be different, but the cooking craze is always the same! From North America🌎 to South America, from Europe🌍 to Asia🌏, come and dive into the frenzied kitchens of these worldwide restaurants! Achieve great fame and fortune, and become a world-class cooking master!

COOK
🍖Tap to add the correct pieces of ingredients 🍋 🥓🥩 to make the target cuisines! 
🍖Remove the food from the cooker🥣 on time to keep it from burning!

SERVE
🍔Tap to serve the correct dishes 🌮🍕 the customers ordered!
🍔Serve in time to keep the customers 😄 happy!
🍔Complete serving tasks before the time ⏰ or customers run out!

COLLECT
📮Open treasure boxes 📦 to collect the unique cards inside!
📮Redeem rare cards to complete fancy 🖼️ collections! 
📮Claim the valuable rewards 🎁 of signature collections!
📮Open the gourmet feast for all the restaurants!

LEVEL UP
↗️Get culinary EXP to upgrade the kitchen by beating levels!
↗️Unlock new challenges with new dishes 🍤 and special kitchenware!
↗️Open new restaurants in the engaging progression! 
↗️Improve your cooking skill and cook worldwide 🍣🥟 food in real life!

Cooking Frenzy is made by professionals who have been making cooking games for more than 10 years. That's why Cooking Frenzy is a high-quality product full of sincerity, and has in incredibly stable and consistent game experience. 

No time to waste! Download and play! Write your own cooking dairy!
Cook, Collect, & Have Fun Right Now!🏃‍♀️🏃🏻🏃🏽🏃🏿‍♂️🏃🏽‍♀️

comments: This game was addicting at first then got really annoying. I would be able to pass hard levels by watching a commercial, but then they changed it. I had to watch two commercials and still had to use a booster I was saving. I Uninstall game two months ago. This game is not worth the time anymore. The creators are so greedy. To the reply of the creator; shut the f*** up. You made this game unplayable. People who said this game is beatable; try to get higher than 88 then talk.

I'm on French Restaurant by now. But I couldn't collect keys of level 207, 211 and 213. I'm just stuck there. I've had used my boosters and played all those ads just so I could pass these levels, but no luck. And everything's upgraded already. So frustrating. The levels just became impossible to pass...too difficult. Anyways, I still don't understand how that clock booster works. Every time I try to use it, there's just no change in the game. It doesn't make sense to me.

The game is nice but somehow they do their best to make you spend on the game for higher levels . Even if you are the best you can't go pass easily and the also run many ads so try to squeeze as much as money they can from you . Most of the big games opt for either advertising income or in app purchases . I fortunately they do both here

Same as most of review here, really nice start, but those timed stages quickly become impossible to pass, and sometimes takes days or weeks to beat. Not sure if the developers actually played the game themselves before releasing or what, but please give it a try, and tell me if the game is enjoyable.

This game is nice and in case am stuck, the commercials earn me 10 seconds or adds 1 customer in turn. I am however not liking it now because I am stuck and the commercials are not working. There is a watch button but when I click on it, nothing happens. Why?

comments: Hi - I was really enjoying this app until the burger shop . The burger patty/meat doesn't move from the grill to the rolls and it burns and I have to start over and the same process again. Please fix!!! Still want to play. Level 201

Very nice game. I enjoyed it playing really very much. Ads are there but only at some instances. In other games we do not get enough gems to collect but this game offers a lot of options to collect them. I like the different cuisines of the various restaurants. Moreover I come to know about a variety of food items being served in parts of the world. An amazing time management game! It's just really wow😄😄🤓🤓......

This is as close to perfect as I've seen for a cooking game. Ads are just for doubling coins, usually enough to get all the upgrades without having to redo levels. Decent amount of free gems. I just wish the levels got a bit more fast paced. I'm only about 4 or 5 restaurants in though.

Finally a game where you can just enjoy playing, travel different countries, cook amazing food and have fun which some of your competitors don't seem to grasp. Also I love the graphics which are really good and the game works with you not against you or is designed to just get your money yet still challenging on the levels. Love both your games.....im hooked keep up the good work and please make more 😃❤

The best cooking game! Lets you double coins through ads and by playing all levels sublevels. It gives you daily challenges to get more coins. It doesn't freeze as so many other apps. One of the best things is that it never runs out of ads to double your coins, unlike other games. Design and graphics are nice!

description:
Welcome to Cooking Hot👩‍🍳👨‍🍳, the BEST chef game, FAST PACE Cooking Game and Restaurant Game! It brings you the Purest and Truest COOKING experiences. Come to different cooking cities, feel the craze and madness of a cooking games lover. Cook and Serve food as a crazy chef! 

In this chef game, you act as a top chef and star chef. The craze for the cooking grabs you, and you are cooking in brink of madness. You work in the kitchens of different countries and cooking styles, TAP fast to cook various food, serve dishes to customers.  

The high tense and coherent gameplays bring you fascinating experience, and make your time full of awesome dash moment. 

We discard the verbose operations and irrelevant systems in the current cooking games on the market, and provides you a Fast Pace and Simplified restaurant simulation game. Focus your work in various restaurants, satisfy the taste buds of your customers and fans! 

👉Download for FREE NOW and get ready to rock the cooking world!🏃

EASY AND ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAYS 

Game is relaxing, it is very easy to play but challengeable to be mastered!

* Top correct ingredients to cook the food 
* Cook in correct order for special food
* Serve food with right side dishes 
* Earn coins and tips from cooking service
* Upgrade kitchenware and food for luxury cuisines 
* Complete multiple cooking targets to pass levels
* Open new restaurants and learn new cooking skills
* Check in daily to get rarity boosters
* Complete daily tasks and achievements to get rewards 
* Create exciting combos and get bonus

Feel the growth of cooking knowledges and the enhancement of cooking skill as you playing the game. 

Endless fun and joy is coming! 
Do you dare to challenge the most picky customers?
Will you accept the lasting cooking joy?
👉Install now and start your hot cooking journey!🏃

REALISTIC CHALLENGES AS IN REAL RESTAURANTS

You are facing the same challenges a top chef will encountered in a real restaurant!

* Serve the customer in time
* Serve correct food with right side dishes
* Keep an eye on the cooker, don’t burn food
* Arrange your cooking reasonably, don’t discard food 
* Use time management skills 
* Serve in smart dish sequence

Use your fingers to cook delicious and fine food, realize your cooking dream as a crazy chef. The hottest thing is: you are a star chef, people hear of your fame and chasing you all over the world in order to taste the amazing food cooked by you. 

UNIQUE FOOD AND RESTAURANTS

We give you the best, best cooking gameplays, best cooking experiences, and the best cooking operations; also, our dedicated artists give you the best kitchen, kitchenware, ingredients, and beautiful food that tantalize your appetite. You can:

* Feel food culture in distinctive restaurants, America, France, Italy …  
* Cook unique and traditional food, hotdog, steak, rib, waffle …
* Mix sweet drinks, lemonade, red wines, coke, beers …
* Cook breakfast, lunch, dinner, deserts and snacks … 
* Master all the cooking gestures, boil, fry, steam, grill …

Tired of waiting for new levels in the other games? It won’t happen here. Mountains of game Levels are here waiting for your challenge! And we release updates regularly with new restaurants, new levels, new dishes, new gameplays! 

No more hesitate! 👉Download and play now!🏃
You are the right cooking master customers are longing for!

Follow our fan page, get the latest news, participate the fan page activities, get the gifts that are only for fans. Write down your cooking dairy, share game experiences with your friends, get social, and spread the cooking fun!

comments: Fun, challenging, can be free if you strategize. I love how this game builds in learning. Levels get progressively more difficult and some are impossible unless you use boosts and the limited extra time offers, but this is part of the fun. You learn to strategize when to play certain levels in order to capitalize on those gift boosts, temporary boosts, and extra times. I don't mind the ads since I'm getting to play such a visually appealing, fun, challenging game for free.

Ad-pocalypse. This is a fun game. But..everything you do WILL trigger an ad. Lose a level...ad. Win a level...ad. Update your kitchen..ad. Open anything in-game..ad. Sometimes you can't even exit the ad without going to the app store. You will have to restart the game. And they aren't even the good ads. The ads are the loudest, most obnoxious ads you can think of. It's definitely a shameless, money grabbing game, but it is fun. The developers need to make money, I get it. Please pick better ads

Fun, but if you're going to make me watch ads, youre going to get an uninstall and a low rating from me. And I'm not talking about ads for coins or diamonds or to speed up upgrade times, but ads just for the heck of it that you can't back out of. Nope.

If you like watching ads over playing, this game is for you. The more you progress the more ads and then they start appearing back to back where you have to watch 2 or 3 ads in a row all 30 seconds long each before allowing to play one more round and then the ads return. It's to bad as it's a fun game but the ads are way out of control. 😵

This game is pretty fun and addictive, the higher the round the more you have to move faster, these customers are pretty greedy lol but if you looking for a game to test you cooking skills and see how fast your fingers can move then this is the game for you

comments: I love the game but what made me change my review is the challenges. You have a time limit to complete the task but 10 second runs off the clock before the first customer comes. That make you use you booster. I guess that's the way you make your money but it is fair if you can really complete the task and it makes you not want to purchase any if you wanted to.
Excessive ads that cannot be skip. 70% of time spent on the game was watching ads between each stage. If game allows the ability to close out the ads, it would be 5 stars.
This is the best one of these games I've played so far, ads aren't intrusive, levels are challenging but possible, a fair and fun game.
Nice game but when I play more levels they become very bery hard I will install this game but when this game is installed they give up update.but I say that you have ads available.

So much fun, love the graphics and detail of each restaurant. Levels are great because there is a variety of easy and more challenging. Love all the boosts, makes the game even more fun to play. This is the best cooking game I have played and as I love these kinds of games, I've tried many. This is by far the most rewarding and fun to play. Love the new rewards, makes it so interesting and keeps you motivated to continue playing. I'm never bored when I'm playing this game. Super cool!

title: Cooking Marina - fast restaurant cooking games
description:
🔥🔥🔥 Welcome to Cooking Marina - new cooking restaurant games 2019. 🌟🌟🌟 As you know, Singapore is well-known as one of the most beautiful and fresh cities in the world and especially Singapore is also famous for a diverse cuisine paradise. 
👉👉👉 This fast restaurant cooking game will take you to travel around Singapore and some countries in Asia to experience tasty dishes with unique cooking recipes.

HOW TO PLAY
Touch the screen to prepare, cook & serve correctly.

comments: Love this game! I would give it a 5+ except for one major flaw. It has happened more than 10Xs so its not just a glitch. I hit a piece of toast & it is not delivered. So of course I hit it again. Now it is tossed & I am penalized for tossing it. This is a pretty clever way to get rid of my free items so I will buy more.....hmmm? Tried slowing down. Thought it was MY fault.....NOPE! Still happens. Or you move so slow you lose the level. Wish this "flaw" could be addressed. Then would be 5!

This game is is awesome, love the graphics, really easy to play. Hats off to whom ever invented this game him or her should get a noble prize for the best game ever. If I could rate this game with one million stars I would.

The game is good only but there is too much of add coming and u have to complusory watch the add if u have to replay the game again. And after some time u have to pay money to game .and I got so angry with the game atlast . 😡😡😡

I love this game, with the extra chances to win, just all the extras you can get in this game it is so much fun to play! I hope that none of it changes, and I'm sure that there will be more. It's an overall great game and I give it 5 stars!!

Very frustrating! Food would not move off the cooking area to plates regardless of where you tap or how many times you tap, causing it to burn or delay service. This happened alot in the Burger restaurant and also happening in the dessert restaurant. Also the game does not give you enough customers or time for you to meet the goals. All my equipment and food are upgraded to the max and still can't complete several levels.

title: Cooking World - Food Fever Chef & Restaurant Craze
description:
Cooking World - Food Games Chef & Restaurant Craze is a brand new cooking games for girls & rated the best in 2019 from its fast food category! Play for free & discover free new recipes and tons of restaurants like french cuisine,american cuisine,italian cuisine,chinese cuisine & many more! Taste the fever of cooking & Push your time management skills to the limit and build your own kitchen! Travel across the world and spread the Fast Food madness in all the kitchens! Beat your of the free cooking games for girls today and cook mama's delicious meals,dishes and desserts in every country in the world!

Features:
- 4 Exotic Restaurants with tasty food
- 160+ Levels of cooking delicious recipes
- Best cooking gameplay!
- Serve your hungry customers
- Learn how to cook pizza, spaghetti & discover new delicious recipes for free!
- Learn the cooking madness & cooking craze way of making tasty food!
- Beat your fever of cooking today!
- Bake tasty desserts and Fast Food games for girls & discover Oriental Restaurants and Chinese Restaurants, you will be able to cook and learn a variety of cooking techniques.

American Restaurant
You will learn to serve burgers, sausages & learn to condiment the burger meat with ease!The perfect burger is made with ketchup, mayonnaise and just a small amount of mustard!The Chicken Fried & crispy chicken wings are a game changer!Use lemons to prepare a special white sauce with garlic & sour cream & milk! When you cook with mama & she tells you to eat your vegetables, then you eat them in order to win this cooking game! Don't forget about the barbecue level where you will discover recipes like Hot Chicken Wings with garlic sauce or hot chili sauce as well as french fries and several other types of chicken meat & also grill some beef ribs or pork chops & delicious Stew or Chicken Parmesan.

Italian Restaurant
We'll teach you how to make pizza & spaghetti!We have unique flavours for Pasta Bolognese,Carbonara,Tortellini & Arrabiata! We also have various types of pizza like pepperoni, pizza carnivore & pizza cannibale. Taste delicious sea food with herbs,lemons & olive oil.

Chinese Restaurant
Chinese cuisine is very old & always a delicacy! Pork Dumplings as snacks and Shrimp with Broccoli in Garlic Sauce for dinner is the main course in this country! Fried Rice which has the best complex carbohydrates mixed with soya sauce for healthy bodybuilders!Japanese sushi shouldn't be forgotten!Tempura and Sashimi Sushi are tasty & a hot bowl of Ramen or Makizushi will make your day! Make sure your sushi rice is cooked with wasabi and soy sauce to perfectly season the food!

Australian Restaurant
We didn't forget about waffles with strawberries, honey & blueberries! We'll teach you some sugary recipes to do in your kitchen with ease. Shakes & blenders will be your friends in this level. Mama will make you cookies,banana split dessert & a banana smoothie!The cakes that she makes are internationally recognized!Smoothies & milkshakes are the tastiest ever!We will teach you how to cook your favourite donuts, cheesecake & brownies.

Upcoming Restaurants
In the Mexican restaurant, we adore to cook Chicken Fajitas, slice meat and veggies to wrap them in the tortilla!We have our proprietary blend for Guacamole recipe to fit perfectly with the Mexican Burrito, Nacho & Taco!The secret here is to choose the best olive oil, tomato sauce & fresh avocado!

The indian cuisine which is one of a kind!The Indian Chicken Curry is at the base of indian food!Cook tasty Samosa with some Tandori chicken or Rogan Josh.Don't do it without Naan bread or tortilla for dinner.Chole Chickpea Curry or Palak Paneer spinach and cottage cheese are recommended for the elders & it's a delicious lunch.Did you know that Chaat is the most delicios snack in India?

Play our free cooking games & download Cooking World - Food Games Chef & Restaurant Craze today!

comments: This is honestly my favorite cooking game app that I've tried, and I've tried a lot. It is the slow to fast pace, the animations and general design of the food/boards, the special events that give you so many boosts. I really enjoy this game and have no complaints. It is annoying that coins don't transfer to the next world but i guess then it would be boring for the player.

It is the most best game because I was playing one cooking game so it showed me one add so I thought to dowload is super app means crazy chef : fast restaurant . and the best thing in this app is they will not give adds u know I hate add it waste the time a lot but this game will never waste time I am proud of this game
Good game can be challenging but enjoyable but after update it keeps turning off back to home screen in the middle of a game and you end up losing your lives it is happening all day very annoying

Amongst all the cooking games, this one is my favorite. It gives a fair chance to finish the levels. Cooking time is not too slow and burning time is longer. The ads are not in your face all the time. Also, the limited tines I was offered to purchase something. I am on level 65 without buying anything. This game helps me alot with my anxiety and depression. Distracting me from overthinking too much. Thank you ❤❤❤
Best cooking game out there. I haven't spent a single penny on this game. With some small tactics everything is achievable.

title: Cooking Madness - A Chef's Restaurant Games
description:
PREPARE 🔪, COOK 🕑and SERVE 🍕 delicious meals from all over the world 🌎 in Cooking Madness! 
 
Become the master chef 👨‍🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year it’s this highly addictive time-management game that’ll bring you a better cooking experience!
 
Get yourself in a real cooking craze. Cook like you’re a MAD CHEF in Cooking Madness! Did the cooking fever caught on and you can’t get enough of 🍨 cooking games? Then this is THE cooking game for you! You’ll be serving delicious dishes 🍩 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants in a ⏩ FAST pace. No challenge that can’t be beaten by you.
 
Dash from restaurant to restaurant on this magical map. You will discover and unlock many places as you progress on your journey. 🌄 Get the restaurants back to business and attract more and more customers. Let the Cooking Madness begin!
 
Practice your cooking techniques and management skills 🍽. Tap as fast as you can while keeping your eye on the time. Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting! Try all the possible kitchen appliances 🍳 to improve your cooking abilities. Upgrade dishes and kitchenware for a better gaming experience!
 
Love a little bit of a thrill in your cooking game? Keep up with the rush hours, become better at time management 🛎. This cooking game offers endless fun levels with challenging missions set up in each level to give you that special experience. 
 
What more FUN things brings this game? 
-       Cook & Travel  discover many different new restaurants 🍴
-       Get Combos and Earn Huge Tips while showing off your cooking skills 💰
-       Unlock New Restaurants by collecting enough key cards  🌮
-       Upgrade your Kitchen and Level Up to become the famous Mad Chef! 💵
-       Tap away in many fun levels 🍖
-       Complete special missions and achievements to earn more🎁 
-       And keep an eye on many more updates to come! 🔥
 
Put that Chef Hat on and get cooking! Download for free today and join the Cooking Madness! ♥️

comments: SO. MANY. ADS. An unreasonable amount in a way I have not experienced with any other game. While I recognize ads help with revenue this feels like it is specifically designed to manipulate you into buying the game (in app purchase options so this is extra annoying). Even if there was an option to watch an ad to have the game be ad free for half an hour that would be a less infuriating option. I even put my phone on airplane mode with no wifi and ads still got through. Uninstalling immediately.

I really like and enjoy the game. I usually turned off my WiFi while playing to avoid watching ads every level so the ads doesn't bother me that much. But I just noticed that for example when I only got one energy left and my phone was lowbat, after I turned it on, I was expecting that my energy was full since I usually turned off my phone for like 2-3 hours while charging, but when I turned it on and I launched the game, my energy remains at one, so please fix it.

im a fan of cooking games and I like this game so far....I like that every time a new restaurant is open it starts from an easy level.. so I don't get bored..unlike the game I use to play that it gets harder and harder that I am unable to play it.. so Im hook with this cooking madness..🤩 I just hope energy and gems are more afordable like 5 pesos? I think I would have bought a lot and spend more if thats the cost.. its better than nothing right?

It's really fun there's not to many ads you don't have to spend money to do a good job or pass the levels and it's easy, I just don't like that if you pass the levels you can only replay them three times otherwise it's fun and addicting 😅♥️💜💗💙❤️ people keep saying there's too many ads but that wasn't a problem for me, I don't get very many ads

Deleted the game for a while. Downloaded again and it ran fine for a while. Now on level 1160 it took my diamonds again. Instead of 3 customers that was supposed to be on there it only gave 2. Now have to wait a while again to get more diamonds. Finished the daily quests and got a no burn item. I guess will delete again cause y'all can't fix the problems. I will not spend real money on a game that can't play right so I know it will just take the real money and not give the right items too.

title: My Cooking - Restaurant Food Cooking Games
description:
Join My cooking, a well-made cooking game, which can be completed all by just tapping with one finger. 
Easy to operate & Rich in dishes. Manage time properly to operate your own worldwide restaurant chain!

Cooking Delicacies From Around The World In Crazy Fever Cooking Games
- Hundreds of fresh ingredients for cooking into delicious dishes!
- Cook savory cookies, grill tasty tender steaks and delicious hot dogs.
- Fry, Bake, Boil, Steam, Simmer and Grill magical cook method.
- Sweet donuts, pizza, waffles and shrimp - the recipes grow with opening city!

Opening Special Theme Restaurants  In New Cooking Games For Free
- Elegant Cafe, delicious Burger Shop, sweet Dessert Shop are waiting to unlock!
- Improve cooking skill and manage time efficiently to become the best chef!
- Upgrade kitchen appliances and ingredients to earn more money.
- More amazing restaurants and new cities will be added regularly! 

Proficiency in Cooking Techniques & Strategies
- Create more combos: Get big bonus and achievements.
- Upgrade ingredients & kitchenware: Increase income & Reduce cooking time.
- Use useful boots appropriately: Complete special cooking goals smoothly.

More Features:
+ More than 6 featured theme restaurants are available!
+ 85+ ingredients to create over 50 dishes from around the world!
+ 150+ well-designed levels with 3 kinds of difficulties!
+ Interesting and magical boots help you pass the levels.
+ Hundreds of kitchenware and ingredients are waiting for upgrading.
+ Wi-Fi not needed: No internet needed after the initial install.
+ Enjoy time-management game play in your pocket anytime for Free!
+ There are more restaurants and delicacies coming soon!

How to Play:
Don't worry! You can do all the steps just with one finger: 
According to the food on the customer's order, tap the ingredients to cook food in order. 
Click the finished dishes to complete all the orders.

What are you waiting for? Come and try!

title: Cooking Master
description:
Cooking Master is #1 deliciously fun game that lets you feed a host of hungry patrons before they leave in a huff and become a star chef!

Cooking Master delivers fast paced, addicting fun that is optimized for playing on the go. Keep customers happy by prepping everything as quickly as you can!

How to Play:
1) Tap to select food
2) Tap frying pan to cook
3) Tap to place food
4) Tap to serve customers' orders

Game Features:
- Casual Mode and Time Mode
- 3 difficulty levels in Casual Mode
- Local and online leader board
- Amazing visuals and sound effects

Amazing cooking game with many levels..the concept of the game is very nice....I love this game....

title: Indian Cooking Madness - Restaurant Cooking Games
description:
Indian Cooking Madness - Restaurant Cooking Games, come with a lots of recipes from Indian kitchen. Explore different levels and play the Indian cooking games like you have cooking madness or cooking craze. With this cooking games in 2020, you will experience a new restaurant games for all genres.

Are you ready for your diner dash adventures? What’s in this game for your cooking mania?
In this Indian kitchen cooking game, you will learn to make new recipes right from fast foods, to street foods and desserts. You will manage the restaurant and customers like a real chef. You will upgrade your restaurant to better serve your customers. The most addictive time management chef cooking kitchen game!

STREET FOOD COOKING GAME RESTAURANT LEVELS
We all are fans of the Indian food & we adore the street food! Be the first to learn some of the most famous recipes from Indian street food kitchen. We have varieties of Indian street food levels:
- Kachori
- Mumbai Street Foods
- Chicken, Barbecue
- Kulfi & Desserts

FEATURES
- 100+ Indian recipe cooking
- 250+ levels with unique goals
- Fast, fun and challenging game play user experience
- Time-management meets fun challenge your cooking limits
- Upgrade kitchen appliances & add more items and foods to earn more points
- Combo rewards and other bonus
- Increases your time management and focus skills

USE POWERFUL BOOSTERS
Complete special cooking goals with magic boosts. You can increase your earnings with double sales and more customers and many other surprising features. In this game we have below boosters: 
- Add Customers
- Buy Time
- Get 2nd Chance
- Instant Cook
- Burn Proof
- Double Coin
- Instant Serve
- Magic Hat

So try this amazing, fun, colorful and addictive chef kitchen cooking game. Practice your cooking mania and management skills. Tap as fast as you can while keeping your eye on the time and waiting customers. Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting with a food game!

title: Cooking Tycoon
description:
Cooking Tycoon is #1 extraordinary restaurant stimulation game that offers a perfect blend of kitchen cooking with restaurant building.

Cooking Tycoon delivers fresh new cooking experience alive with smiling customers, hundreds delicious ingredients and tasty dishes! Running a restaurant is loads of fun in this addicting game that is optimized for playing on-the-go. You’ll learn to take orders, grill patties, add toppings, and serve everything from burgers and fries to sushi and desserts to all of your crazy customers. Collect tips to make money to unlock new dishes and build more types of floors to attract more customers. Escape to the world of cooking, friends and fun now!

Game Features:
- 7 unique gourmet restaurants: Fast Food, French, Italian, Drink, Dessert, Japanese and Chinese
- Multitask between serving, grilling and stacking
- More than 40 dishes to cook using hundreds ingredients
- Stunning graphics and authentic sound effects

comments: I was really enjoying this game, I made it all the way to level 35 but then one round it got stuck on 28/30 recipes completed and the customers stopped coming into the restaurant so I couldn't complete the level. It's like the game got frozen or something. I tried undownloading and re-downloading the game and that didn't fix it. This is super frustrating because I essentially can't play the game anymore.

Am rating this game 4 stars instead of 5, I really enjoy the game, it's really interesting but I couldn't get the required number of order and as a result could not continue with the game at all and I ALREADY UNLOCKED THE FIFTH FLOOR. I had to uninstall and reinstall the Game. It was heartbreaking because I had to start over from day 1. Overall it's a really nice game and I'd recommend to any food, cook, game lovers Great recipe and restaurant Hussle touch as well.

I really enjoyed this app, but anytime you do not open a restaurant and you open the other, two customers would not come. Then, you have to wait for 2-3days before the customer comes. Right now, i have 6 restaurant, i decided to open only 5 restaurant, now i have been waiting for weeks for just two customers to come so that i can close the shop. Please do something about it. Thanks

Hateful game! Don't download it guys , it will not let customers in before you have updated anything..so, when you don't have the thing, you have to buy it..and when your money is finished,then they won't let you play anymore...and the products are very very expensive and the customers don't pay you well

Very fast paced after a while...fun getting the hang of things...a bit of a slower pace for incoming customers would be better...no one wants to feel stressed while playing games...too fast...too stressful...People want to relax, destress, and unwind during gameplay...Overall very entertaining and loads of fun!!!!! Awesome game design & graphics as well!!!!

title: Cooking Chef - Food Fever
description:
Experience the madness of real cooking and put your amazing food skills on the test in Cooking Chef! Serve delicious meals to hungry customers while building the kitchen of your dreams! Don't let the time run out in this fast-paced restaurant game! 

Put on your chef hat and practice your cooking techniques while keeping an eye on the clock! Simply tap to cook delicious dishes and serve them hot to win your customer's heart! 

This cooking game will simulate your cooking, time management, and food serving skills! 

Features:

- Practice your cooking and time management skills.

comments: The best cooking game I have tried..The pace is realistic, kitchen appliances are available and reasonably upgraded to a better working level very early in the game. Other cooking games make you suffer to wait for diamonds and coins. Meanwhile the pace is too slow when you haven't the right any of appliances. You are penalized for something that's not your doing. Thank you again for a great cooking game.

It's a cool game but i don't like the fact that we need data to download levels as from level 25. Why is it like that? I was having fun with the game until that happened. I can't give a 5 star for that

Love this new cooking game🙌! It's really fun and challenging, the addition of new dishes, as well as the kitchen upgrades, keeps it fresh and enjoyable to play. Also, the unique characters that come in between are quite entertaining. As for the gameplay, the more you play, the better you get at this game. Check the customer's order, keep an eye on the clock, don't let your food burn, and you can do pretty well👌. I have played a lot of cooking games but Cooking Chef is my favorite so far! ❤️
Great game. Love the gameplay its engaging.love the art style as it look very fresh. A casual game to brighten up the day.

Fun game with lots of levels to play and so many different dishes to make👍. The customers have interesting personalities and some special appearances are really funny😁. Time management is nice with different types of customers. The desserts, pizza look yummy from a wide variety of fast food and modern cuisine. Upgrading the kitchen is another interesting strategy and to watch out that you don't end up burning stuff 😂 Overall a fun game to play and beautiful graphics to keep you entertained !

comments: Loved this game until the Pizza Restaurant! No possible way to play. No plates for cooked food and customer gets angry before you can even get the pizza cooked. If you want people to play this game you would think you would make it at least a little possible to even have a chance at winning.
Used to be great, but got really difficult to achieve the results needed . In the end, it lost my attention. A game should be challenging but achievable, otherwise what's the point? Uninstalled.
It is a decent game. Yes certain levels are hard to pass unless you have power-ups. I managed to finish all the levels and no new levels have been updated, it just says coming soon.
Good game but can't stand how much it freezes. I been sending messages to you but nothing changes. It crashes after every round.

The game is fun, but it freezes a lot and some levels are far too challenging and despite what the creators tell most people who complain about this, it is practically impossible to pass some of them without boosters or watching ads for extra time. Also been waiting for more rooms to decorate, but they are just not coming and without that part, this game is just a bit boring in my opinion

title: Cooking in the Kitchen - Baking games for girls
description:
Are you the Masterchef this cooking game needs?
Choose a recipe and select how you want to make it! Pick a good great pizza or become the number one hamburger cheff. You as a Junior Chef must take control over the kitchen at home, prepare your self to become a restaurant owner or buy your own Food Truck after learning to cook. Prepare dinner and practice to cook faster and better each time as Jr Chef! Create a cuisine cooking fever with professional food as a real master in the kitchen! This game is specially build for kids.

Make the best burgers in town or a healthy pokebowl, English breakfast or Italian pasta. No real ingredients needed in this cooking tycoon game! Just start the kitchen adventure to run your own home restaurant and serve the best cookery suppers.

We have multiple recipes for you in this kitchen cooking game. You can choose what to bake: fries and a hamburger, donuts, soup, spaghetti with meatballs, sushi, pizza, sorbet, cake and many more! Most of the dishes you can decorate with different toppings or toys.  

There are more than 25 recipes in Cooking in the Kitchen already! This is the menu:
✔ Make fries and a hamburger
✔ Bake and decorate your own donut 
✔ Cook your own soup
✔ Bake and decorate your own birthday cake
✔ Bake your own pizza in the oven
✔ Fill your thanksgiving turkey and bake it
✔ Make a long drinks in the summer in your kitchen
✔ Chop and fill your sushi with your favorite ingredients
✔ Bake cupcakes for the family and decorate them
✔ Create a poke bowl dish

✔ Make the best hot dog in town

title: The Cooking Game- Mama Kitchen
description:
Welcome to The Cooking Game. 
You’re on a mission to start running your own restaurant business. 
Fancy celebrity chef who owns a chain of his own restaurants and who promotes healthy and vegetarian recipes inspired from all over the world? Do you want to become a famous gourmet, and food writer who has her own TV Show?
Start now with The Cooking Game and learn how to cook, serve and manage your own restaurants. 

Chef Jennifer will help you getting accustomed to preparing a variety of dishes from all over the world & managing different style of restaurants: from fast food cafe to vegan to a high-end exclusive Japanese sushi restaurant. 

You will start with simple Fast Food Cafe to gain basic culinary skills, then proceed with to earn a Turkish restaurant business, provided you prove what you have as a chef. 

Features:
- 8 unique restaurants, from bakery to diner, from american to chinese
- more than 320 levels
- hundreds of kitchen upgrades
- prepare hundreds of dishes
- satisfy thousands of customers
- personalize your interior  with elegant furniture
- cook any dish from burger to fancy chef recipe, from breakfast to dinner 

You will slowly make your own into owning and managing a Chinese Noodles  restaurant. 
Ever wonder how to stir fry a Chinese noodle and fried rice? 
Do you have what it takes to stir fry a Chinese style egg-noodles in front of your customers with selected toppings, meat & sauces?

Upgrade your culinary skills then with managing more advanced and exquisite Italian and Japanese Sushi restaurants. 
These restaurants are not for the faint-of-hearted. 
Japanese sushi restaurant will take your skill to the limit as you explore the traditional ways of making Japanese sashimi, sushi rolls, tempura etc. 

All work but no play? Don’t worry. Candy shop will take you back to your sweetest memory as a kid. 
Serve the desserts to your customers by learning how to bake cupcakes, make cotton candy, frozen yogurt and Slurpee! 

A variety of cuisines:
- Chinese Noodles & Rice 
- Italian Pizza, Pasta & Lasagna 
- American Fast Food Burger & Hotdog 
- Japanese Sushi & Tempura 
- Arabic Shawarma & Kebab 
- Popular Cakes, Icecream & Sweets 

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?!?
Show your skills and feed the hungry customers! 
Download the free version of "the Cooking Game" now! THIS IS THE MOST INSANELY ADDICTIVE COOKING GAME EVER!

The Cooking Game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items.

Facebook LIKE: https://www.facebook.com/thecookinggame

comments: I've been playing this game for a while and I'm really enjoying myself; but my problem is that once you reach Misty Peaks, your ability to earn enough money to progress pretty much stops. I've reset several times and always get stuck at misty peaks. The fish are barely worth anything, the cost to go to the next level is a huge jump from the last price, and the price to level up your boat (to level 15) is totally insane. I want to keep playing but it's frustrating to not be able to advance.

Love the game but it seems like a con! I paid 0.79p for gems. Spent 264 gems on a crew member and when I returned later, the crew member had gone and went back to being locked but my gems had gone. Won't be spending another penny on this. I've also noticed that I upgrade my boat and when I come back, the boat has gone back to the previous tier but my money i spent on the boat has gone. Absolutely terrible

Pretty good game. Nice time waster with some good built-in rewards and fair progression. There doesn't seem to be any way to circumvent ads in the game, as there is no visible "remove ads" purchase option, and a lot of the more enjoyable rewards are hidden behind watching ads or making purchases. This is ultimately going to make me stop playing at some point, but the game itself is well crafted, so 4 stars.

It's ok. Could be way better. There is absolutely no way to gain experience for being offline. Making it hard to progresses unless you leave the game on constantly. This is a typical make is as far as you can then reset game. The experience is what you get when you reset, but you don't really earn while offline. Make the game more offline friendly. This is why other games are successful

(Check edit history, ran out of space.) Along with all of that, the ads truely are everywhere. Open the game after saving? Full screen, unskippable casino ad. Get past that? Double up by watching another ad. Finally get into the game? Checked your item box and lost 60 gems because the "open with gems" button is big and right in the middle of your screen? Looks like you have to watch some ads to get those back. Not even going to mention the wheel. Thats just made for ad watching, being rigged.

title: Crazy Cooking - Star Chef
description:
New restaurant is unlocked: 1946 Coffee house is open now! ☕🍕🍝

Crazy Cooking- Star Chef (Original Burger Master) is a cooking game that allows players to open different genres of restaurants! Run your classic diner to serve serves 🍔 burger, 🍟fries and 🍦🍧🍨 milkshakes or open a Japanese ramen bar to cook 🍜 delicious noodles 🍜! Can you act fast enough to deal with tons of orders?

🍩 Flowery Donuts Shop is ready for unlock! Cook brand new food: Donuts with delicious cream! Enjoy cute, pinky and delicate interior design! 🍩

Our brand new kitty ramen bar is open! Would you like to have a bowl or ramen with pork chasu, egg and bone broth? Upgrade your interior to attract 😺 cats to your restaurant, customers love these adorable fury things!

Mexican restaurant provide different classic mexican food! Update your Mexican style interior decorations in the restaurant!

Also, don't forget to upgrade the American diner! Classic burger 🍔 or BLT is always a great choice! Want some snacks 🍰 or treats? Our Fries and Milkshake can satisfy you!  

With the dream to make delicious food and serve hungry customer, let’s start with each restaurant, earn coins to upgrade the kitchen and dining room, and expand to the world eventually! 

Upgrade Everything
Serve each customer as fast as you can, great service will increase tips! Upgrade the ingredient quality and offer cupcakes to make your customer even happier! Don’t forget to upgrade the restaurant appliances and ingredient quality, and create a better dining environment to attract more customers! Oh the automatic cooking machine can save you tons of time and make sure nothing is burnt!

Become a cooking master and star chef!
Life in restaurant industry is not easy. Prepare the meal ahead of time, turn the milkshake on and fry the Shrimp Tempura constantly. Also, keep an eye on the stove and do not burn the food! Serve the burger or ramen with the right ingredient that your customer asked for. With the increasing demands, you need to act fast just like in real life! You will find out this game is so addictive and time passed so fast at these busy restaurants! 

Will you be able to handle the chaos and high demand? Achieve your goal to become 3 star chef! Download Crazy Cooking today!

Follow our Facebook developer page to receive newest update info and share your ideas!
www.facebook.com/CrazyCookingGame

title: Cooking Mama: Let's cook!
description:
Make scrumptious food and serve it! 

Chop, bake, stew...
Cook tasty meals with easy touch controls!
Try out this unique cooking game.
The yummy food you'll create will definitely make you hungry!

▼Let's Cook! 
Cook food by playing fun mini games. More than 30 kinds of recipes are waiting for you. Do your best, Special Chef!

▼Happy Village! 
Serve your cooking to everyone at your restaurant. Create a big and wonderful restaurant that's all your own.
Harvest lots of things by going Fishing, growing plants in the Fields, and raising animals in your Ranch.
Gather up lots to exchange for Happy Foods!

▼Game Plaza!
Play non-cooking games like "Help out," "Play Shopkeeper," and "Exercise your brain." More than 30 kinds of mini games are waiting for you. Aim to get high scores!

▼Challenge Ranking!
Compete in weekly events for the best scores! Join the global rankings!

▼Other Ways to Have Fun
-Decorate the kitchen with various items.
-Make surprise dishes by combining 2 recipes.
-Watch realistic cooking videos for supported recipes.
-Watch an animated video of Mama's fun daily life.

[Game Features]
With its intuitive controls, both children and adults can enjoy the game. Also, even if you make mistakes there are no game overs, so everyone can complete dishes. Furthermore, children who play may develop an interest in cooking.

[Recommended Setup]
Android OS 4.1 or later.
**Game may not be playable on certain devices even if the above conditions are met.

**By downloading this game, you are accepting its User Agreement.
http://www.ofcr.co.jp/APP_CookingMama/en/privacypolicy.html

[Supported Languages]
English,French,German,Italian,Spanish,Dutch,Russian,Portuguese,Polish,Czech,Turkish,Japanese,Korean,Simplified Chinese,Traditional Chinese,Indonesian,Filipino,Malay,Thai,Vietnamese,Hindi,Spanish-mexico,Portugues brasileiro,Arabic,Persian,Swedish,Norwegian,Danish,Finnish

comments: It was a good game but way to many ads and I thought that it should have be a shorter time interval between doing each step so I would not recommend unless you like long time intervals between each step and ads spamming all the time I would play it again if it did not give me the only option of watching an ad 😡😡😡😡
Love this game. But I thought when we updated it there would be more free recipes, levels higher than 10 & just new things to do in general.

Now one can play OFFLINE! YES! that's a big plus. You still need to go online to download recipes and other stuff but you can play offline now and you guys added so much activities to the game. You can fish, you can cook, sell, grow fruits, own a restaurant, etc.. it worth it now. Thank you so much.

I like the game. Ive been playing it for about a day or two, the ads are fine (i mean you have to make money some how) the only thing I don't like is the farm, shop, ect have a time limit and if you pass that time limit, you can't play for the rest of the day. I think thats kinda stupid i don't understand why its like that

I LOVE this game! It's not just "cooking," but has various other activities for you to compete to run a restaurant; like fishing, harvesting an orchard and garden, and running your restaurant. The game helps me to zone out and relax, and the slight Japanese theme running through out reminds me of my time spent in Japan ♡. Anyone at any age can play. I wouldn't waste your time buying any in app purchases though, don't really need them to enjoy this app.

title: Top Cooking Chef Recipes
description:
Are you ready to start cooking? In this cooking game, you'll get a chance to make a bunch of different recipes. Choose from several recipes including pizza, spaghetti, and cupcakes to select your favorite one. Then follow the instructions to create each recipe from scratch. You'll love how fun and easy it is to make your own food and desserts just like a professional chef!

Features:

Choose your own recipe to make including pizza, spaghetti, and cupcakes.

Shop at the store for all of the ingredients you need to make the recipe and be sure to you grab everything you need.

Mix all of the ingredients to make the recipe by following each step. 

When you're all done give your family and friends a taste test of your delicious kitchen creations.

title: Cooking Crazy: Restaurant Chef Master
description:
Challenging role-playing crazy chef with restaurant cooking game free 👩‍🍳 2020.

Are you a cooking crazy genius? Yes, the restaurant chef game will bring you great cooking experiences!

Transforming into a chef restaurant, you will be serving food to the guests in a great restaurant space,
with a quick hand, certainly, no challenge can beat you.

From these restaurants game, you'll discover European restaurants, Asian restaurants, other food, culture, and travel around the world. Players role-playing game chef uses the genius kitchen with cooking methods such as bake, fry🍳, boil 🍚, steam, simmer to create delicious dishes for restaurant customers.

As a crazy chef in restaurant games, you gradually experience each level, initially creating simple dishes like steak 🥩, roast beef,
vegetables🥗, Salad🥙, burgers🍔, hotdog🌭, You will then experience dishes that are harder than combo baked, cook rice🥣, pizza🍕, sausages, grilled fish,
cheese, pasta, cladding eggs omelet, and delicious desserts such as coffee☕, ice cream🍦,cheesecake 🍰, fruit juice, smoothies.
with a large number of customers, and more fastidious. Gradually, you will experience the challenging level of the game, you
will play a crazy chef who combines the thinking of arranging in-game cooking tools to overcome challenges in the game.
To master your culinary skills, you need to manage the restaurant and touch as quickly as possible to the dishes but be sure to pay attention to the time and tasks or try the kitchen
appliances and upgrade the utensils to get A better experience.
When the chef is too crazy, can use the support of the kitchen game such as super cooker, more time, more customers, double gold, instant cook, helping and pudding

Things cooking kitchen brings you:
-Display your culinary skills with combos!
-Cooking in restaurants and explore the culinary world!
-Unlock new restaurants by collecting keys!
-Upgrade kitchen tools to optimize the cooking
-Upgrade the crazy restaurant, become a famous chef!
-Many difficult challenges for you to conquer!

Cook, collect, and have fun now!

title: Cafe Tycoon – Cooking & Restaurant Simulation game
description:
Cafe tycoon is a beautiful cooking and restaurant simulation game that tests your time and resource management skills. Manage many chef’s, cook delicious meals, serve hot coffee and decorate your hotel. Write your own restaurant story in Cafe Tycoon today. 

Keep customers happy and earn money to buy restaurants all over the world café and become world’s top Chef. Cafe Tycoon is fast-paced cooking and catering game. Use lots of exciting power-ups and booster and get carried away in a cooking fever!  

Cafe Tycoon is a fun cooking scramble game where you own your food court, decorate it beautifully, hire chef to cook food and serve customers as quick as possible to earn maximum profits. It’s by far the best Restaurant paradise cooking Simulation game ever! Travel the word and explore varieties of recipes. Play this kitchen game, cook and serve delicious food as a top chef and put your time-management skills to test!

It’ an addictive food serving game where you set off to open a classy cafeteria, manage kitchen stories and chefs and serve customers delicious food and drinks. 

Serve coffee, cook bakery goods and immerse yourself in an addictive restaurant simulator that’s brimming with exciting tales and stories.

CAFE TYCOON FEATURES

❤ Build Your Restaurants!
~ Restaurant management means you’re in charge! Create and maintain multiple cafe, restaurant or diner layouts to promote your business

❤ Cook delicious food!
~ Hire best restaurant chefs and prepare delicious food that customers will love and share. Guests must love your food and service so as to improve cafeteria popularity. Make delicious tasty food Cake, deserts, cookie, coffee, burger & other cuisine ranges from breakfast, lunch and dinner.

❤ Design Your Restaurant!
~ Design your cafe, restaurant or diner by purchasing decorations to give your own personal touch
~ Decorate your virtual restaurants with all kinds of in-game decorations

❤ Open Cafe worldwide
~ What are you waiting for to invest your money and open another café world across the globe. New recipes and decorations simulation await for you in each country. 

❤ Improve your appliances 
~ Acquire new machines for your cafeteria, upgrade them and give them maintenance. Ovens, blenders, coffee shops!

In your journey of becoming a Chef Tycoon mania, explore special dishes with skilled waiters or waitress having exceptional cooking skills, who handle world kitchen and restaurant appliances. Manage rush-hours by upgrading your cooking appliances, and decorate your restaurant to attract more customers! 

Cook delicious meals and prepare fruity drinks! In all the restaurant you’ll find iconic but also special dishes from all over the world. Not to mention the special kitchenware that makes you the greatest waiter or waitress and chef in the cooking business mania. 

This cooking game is a fast-paced game. Keep up with the rush hours, become better at time management. What makes this cooking game so fun is that there are endless amount of levels and the levels are loaded with enough orders to enjoy. 

Become the superstar cook dash, you’ve always wanted to be! Start cooking, chef!

Realize your dream of becoming a Culinary Master! Play Chef tycoon: Cooking & Restaurant Game today!

IMPORTANT CONSUMER INFORMATION:

Cafe Tycoon respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not allow you share this information.

We do require a few additional Permissions:

1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
These permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content for new kitchen areas / competitors.

2) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
This permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new game content for new cafe world locations / competitors

Cafe Tycoon is FREE to download and play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money to enhance your gameplay. Game may contain third-party advertisements.

title: Cooking Joy - Super Cooking Games, Best Cook!
description:
🚢🚢🚢Board the cruise ship and go on a cooking adventure 🍔 with Cooking Joy!🍹Come and cook delicious meals or prepare fruity drinks! 🍉This highly addictive time management game 🕛 will bring you a cooking game experience you’ll never forget. 
 
Are you a big fan of casual games such as restaurant games, kitchen games and serving delicious dishes to hungry customers in amazing restaurants? If you got caught by the cooking fever too. Then this is the cooking game for you! 
 
Cook & Serve hungry customers in many fancy restaurants! Get ready to become the best cooking chef in every kitchen that this game has to offer! 
 
Manage restaurants located all over the🌴 tropical islands. ☀️ You’ll be feeling like a dashing restaurant manager! Not to mention the special kitchenware that makes you the greatest digital chef in this food game.
 
Practice your cooking techniques and management skills. Immerse yourself in this cooking craze. Combining dishes have never been so much fun and exciting!🍲   The customers in this game can’t wait for you to show up and cook 🍝 delicious food for them. It will be a real cooking challenge! But nothing you can’t handle as the best cook in town!

Why you should NOT hesitate any longer: 
 
-       Exciting cooking game with many fancy restaurants😍

-       Unlock New Restaurants that pushes your Cooking Dreams to the next level

title: Breakfast Story: chef restaurant cooking games
description:
2020 brand new restaurant chef cooking game, tons of food and levels. Super addictive kitchen games.


This is the story of an office worker leaving to open a breakfast shop~
I think my boss...
He must be very angry...
After getting on the subway for 523 days...
And working overtime for 428 days,
That morning, an idea suddenly comes to my mind...
Be your own boss!
...
Life should not be the same every day, My own life is up to me!
Finally...
I became the owner of the breakfast shop!
...
As expected, I'm more motivated to work for myself!
Meet different people every day,
Do what you like everyday!
...
Slowly, I met a lot of people with stories,
They are my customers,
And share their stories with me.
...
Slowly, my business is getting bigger and bigger,
I found my new assistant,
It's cute!
...


Game features:
● new game mode you haven't experienced yet.
● the type of food you haven't made yet.
● a plot form you haven't felt yet.
● a game with insight into all aspects of life.
● it's not perfect, but it must be fun.


I sincerely hope you like this game, we will continue to improve and add new features and stories.
Official website: http://www.ccyiyo.com
Contact us: http://ccyiyo.com/page/contact/contact.php

comments: I enjoyed the game and the story plot, which made it all the more enjoyable to play. But i should say that it was indeed tough to complete the levels. However, overall it was fun to play and the dishes really looked appetizing so kuddos for that. Literally Can't wait for the new characters and story plots. 🔥🔥

It's a very nice game, I completed it within a week. Levels are quite tough which is especially fun as most of the cooking games are way too easy sometimes.! Very nice features, I enjoyed it a lot. :)

I think this game is the best cooking game I have ever play before comparing to those with high numbers of download. The graphics are beautiful, and the story lines are heart warming. No bugs or hang problems found and the levels are challenging.
The character is cute & nice graphic interface. However, the conversation is quite long. Overall, its nice.
