title: Kitchen Clout: Cooking Game
description:
Kitchen Clout – Cooking Game

Ever heard of competitive cooking? Whip up world class cuisine as a chef in the fun new cooking game – Kitchen Clout. Be quick! Time is ticking.

Cook your favorite dishes as you become a world-famous chef in this addictive time management cooking game. 

Be a top chef and make your restaurant famous. Run around efficiently in the kitchen flipping burgers, baking cakes, or grilling pizzas in a jiffy while keeping your customers happy! Because that’s the secret to online cooking fame – fast delivery and happy customers. Are you ready to roll, chef?

Anyone can be a chef, and win!

• Download content for your restaurant and start cooking
• Join the mania – most engaging time-management kitchen game
• Play offline; have fun cooking 24/7. 
• No wi-fi needed once you download the content.

Be a chef in a top restaurant in this fast and fun game

• Manage your kitchen on the clock to earn more tips
• Bake or grill your favorite dishes in a tap
• Cook breakfast, lunch, dinner, tea…and more
• Upgrade your restaurant with every level you unlock
• Feed customers across the globe and overcome new challenges

Your crazy kitchen skills, rewarded

• Try new cooking techniques with every new restaurant upgrade
• Choose your customers wisely to earn positive reviews and surge ahead
• Unlock premium ingredients based on your performance
• Lots of tasty ingredients to cook exotic dishes

Up your time management skills

• Crazy and fun time management kitchen game
• Cook and serve in time to gain positive reviews and reach new levels
• Get special pans for burn proof cooking
• Grow your menu with every city you cook in
• Do extra shifts to earn more points for new levels
• Serve food real fast to win timed levels

Free time management game with 100+ levels

• Cook exciting dishes across continents in an engaging time-management game
• Strategize to win time-limited rounds on a tasty quest
• Grill, bake, and serve in restaurants around the world
• Earn positive reviews, large tips, and be the best chef in the world, for free


Download Kitchen Clout and join the online cooking mania for hours of fun.

comments: This game is awesome, but i cant give a full stars because on several levels especially level 400 its not make sense. You need to fix it.

It is one of the best cooking games I have ever played, saying this because I have played almost every cooking game play store has to offer, this game is really fun and has a new concept of opening new restaurants because many of the other cooking games in the play store use this "key" concept- where each level is assigned a key and to unlock the key you have to play the same level twice or thrice and it gets really annoying. But this game is nothing like that, it's fast paced and enjoyable.

The scenery was beautiful party nice. I liked the themes. There was boring party music & feel to the game..there should be a different motivating, upbeat energetic or a smooth groovy party mix music that fits each and every different theme, accept for a tea party. There should be people socializing or dancing in the background. There should be confetti in the air with flashing lights at times. And there are hardly any characters dressed for the party themes. I'm severely disappointed.

E njoying the game. No gliches so far. Able to obtain necessary coins, diamonds & energy. Keeps my interest, challenging but each level obtainable. Enough ads to obtain without forced to buy. TY good game!! On level 12. Will give feedback again at later levels. Also good to be able to repeat levels to practice and pick up coins.

I play this game and its awesome on my phone but on my tablet it keeps crashing and I keep starting the game over. Would have given five stars but I had to start all over again on the phone. Because on my tablet it kept shutting off. I had beat slot of levels was on the sea level now I'm back at the beginning.

title: Cooking Sizzle: Master Chef
description:
With a wide choice of unique locations and restaurants from all over the world, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use hundreds of delicious ingredients to cook the best quality dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Make your own xfreebiescombos, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes.

Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

Features:
* Thousands of delicious dishes to cook using hundreds of best quality ingredients
* Huge choice of world-famous cuisines
* More than 800 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Sizzle requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, tournaments, challenges, and other gameplay improvements.

comments: I really love this game. It's just amazing ! But I hate it when I again have to refill the heart and spend 30 minutes for it. If at the beginning of the game you have offered 5 hearts then it will not be a little annoying to me. I hope you will make this improvement in it. Otherwise it's graphics and everything is just awesome!

I gave 4 stars earlier today and a good review for a fair game. Now I've played some more I've downgraded to 3 stars because its basically a fun game and fairer than most with ads purely to gain help you need which is a great bonus, but the only way to keep progressing is to keep having to go over the same bonus round from the previous shop to be able to get enough cash to buy the upgrades you need to move forward. Yep its fair because its possible but how mind numbingly boring!! Uninstalled..

Good game, but needs work. I completed every level in first restaurant, and still did not earn enough income to pay for every upgrade. This put me behind in the second restaurant with no way to earn income for necessary upgrades in order to move forward in the levels. These are not miner complaints, also the prompt finger is annoying.

It's a really fun game believe me. You get nervous when time is going and you didn't Give food Yet to the costomers but it's fun. I'm still in level 8 so i'm still in the first restaurant but when you get in a higher level about 17 you get a New restaurant. In the end you finish with alot restaurant. I know this because I have similar games.
hard to play beyond a certain level, you might just keep watching ads instead of playing

comments: I love it so far but as I got farther and farther I see its making me spend all my gems ,,,,, it has to be the updates because it was not like this ,, I appreciate this game I love to cook in real life. It's just something's are just unfair ,,,, now n I just don't like it but I will continue to play because I love it just that much !!!-!

Starting with the spiral potato truck--the last 10 levels had glitches which put the plates on top of each other, slowing you down. The next truck requires you to use boosters because you end up about 1 to 2 or or short of getting 3 stars. And it seems to continue to all the rest of the trucks. Levels 1743 and above take away your food baskets for each level BUT do NOT return the basket so that you loose 5 baskets every turn. When you look at ads to get baskets, they don't show up.

I wanted to give it a five stars cause the game is amazing lots of levels and fun but the only problem is its control I have 3 times click on a dish to serve or cook it plz fix this problem in the next update and i would rate it 5 stars. I have never seen such an awesome game with so much of variety of food to serve which other games do not provide but the controls of the game is the problem. As the controls problem has been fixed in the next update I am rating my favourite game 5 stars

At first I thought it was the best cooking game but there is a big problem with the game especially the ice cream game shop, so need to skip that shop by paying more than 1 thousand diamonds and for every following shops 🙄🙄🙄. Waste of time ... uninstalling. I cannot send screenshots to you anymore because I already uninstall it. Cannot serve double flavored ice cream , keep on pressing it but it won't go to the customer instead goes to the trash can.

I used to enjoy playing this game until the updates that made the buying of no burn and double money power up very expensive. From 10 gems to a whopping 60 and 80 gems. The gap is too much and it made the game not fun anymore. If there were to be increments, make it at reasonable rates like from 10 - 25. 60 and 80 is just too high. It was a 5 star worthy game except the occasional glitches but it is jst 2 stars now for me.

title: Kitchen Madness - Restaurant Chef Cooking Game
description:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming master chef 🏆👨‍🍳 by playing fun cooking game and serving delicious dishes🍔 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants? Then get ready to become the best cooking chef👨‍🍳 in Kitchen Madness - Restaurant Chef Cooking Game. Dash into the madness, craze and fun🎉🎉 created by Kitchen Madness - Restaurant Chef Cooking Game that will provide a challenge for even the master chef 🏆👨‍🍳 of restaurant games. Kitchen Madness - Restaurant Chef Cooking Game is a 😍 FREE kitchen game where you set off to play as restaurant chef by cooking delicious dishes🍕 to please starving customers in food game. Kitchen Madness - Restaurant Chef Cooking Game is an addictive ⏰time management cooking game, that enhance you cooking skills🍳 moreover your ⏰time management skills as you take over the kitchen madness in restaurants games. Travel around the world🌎, dash from restaurant to restaurant and spread the kitchen madness, cook delicious meals🌭️ and desserts🍰 from all over world🌎!

Start your chef games adventure in Kitchen Madness - Restaurant Chef Cooking Game, use various ingredients to cook delicious dishes🍕 with amazing recipes like Donuts🍩, Burgers🍔, sausages🌭️, Pizza🍕, Sandwich🌮, Cake🍰, BBQ🍖, French Fries🍟 etc. By providing delicious & tasty cuisine, please customers😋 and make foodie paradise in this food game. Bake, cook, and grill meet unique customers, serve and delight them with your delicious recipes, and earn Coins and Tips in kitchen games. In the world of master chef cooking game experience serve exotic flavors all over the world🌎 with crazy cooking chef games. Upgrade kitchen game appliances & produce an even greater variety of dishes & tasty cuisine🍩 with kitchen game utensils. Decorate your new restaurant kitchen to attract more hungry customers. Be the crazy cooking top chef in the world and please your hungry customers in this kitchen game a fast and fun restaurant games. Make the best cooking strategy that will help you earn big tips💰 plus you can unlock exciting food items and kitchen appliances. Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes, in this way you may expand your restaurant chain & you may serve more customer in minimum time. 

⭐Kitchen Madness - Restaurant Chef Cooking Game Features⭐:
🔹Unlock new recipes and grow your food menu.
🔹Receive coins from happy😀 & satisfied diners.
🔹Race against time⏰ to prepare catering orders.
🔹Cook, grill, and serve food🍳 by using simple TAP.
🔹Spend earned money💰 to upgrade your appliances.
🔹Fulfill the orders of Hungry Customers in cooking game.
🔹Cook on multiple stoves and serve a variety of meals🍔.
🔹Serve your finest cuisine to customers from all around the world🌎.
🔹It is a free😍 cooking game + No Wi-Fi is required to play this food game.

comments: Got to a level and it says earn 150 coins...but the level only gives you "likes"...and you only get one coin for that...so kinda messed up in my mind...and I spent the 2.99 for no ads...still have ads...

There's just to many ads covering the game. I would of given it a higher rating if it be for all the ads. Plus you don't need to be timed since this is only a game. Plus there's people out there that can't tap that fast. Plus the speed needs to be slow down quite a bit. So I'm unstalling.
It is a good game but you really need a internet connection when you play. This game is not for people like me who don't want to spend my mbs in just a game.
Can't play when this game freezes I've pId money and can't play wth pls fix very frustrating 😒

Nice quality gameplay. Fast customer entry , tap and serve! But this game doesn't have an option to save my progress... No good! Please fix that soon! I need to save what I work hard for! Thanx! P.S: When I win my daily prize of 100, 300, coins... I dont receive ANYTHING into my coin account! Why??? Please help. Thx!

title: Cooking Life: Crazy Chef's Kitchen Diary
description:
Welcome👏👏 to Cooking Life and Start your best Cooking Hot Life in 2020. Get ready for the New Cooking Home Game🍳 ? Dash into your tasty town and design your cooking restaurant🏡 🏡, cater customers with top-quality dishes🍔 🍩 ! Those real cooking fevers would motivate your cooking craze in this casual strategy restaurant games! Come and feel the cooking fever!
👊 Expand our culinary skills and serve delicious food🍕 to earn achievements🏆 in a fantastic and time management cooking home game! Just simply download⏩ the kitchen content and start your COOKING LIFE!

FEATURES:
🔥 Cook top-level cuisines from around the world!
🔥 Match food to customer orders with challenges, boosts, mini-events, and puzzles!
🔥 Bake donuts, cook cookies, grill burgers and tasty steaks!
🔥 Enjoy the Smoothest game operations and the Easiest gameplays!
🔥 Utilize time management skills for yourself and create the empire of restaurant!
🔥 Earn tips from restaurant renovations!
🔥 Customize your clothes, restaurants and decorations!
🔥 Involve special EVENTS and popular tournaments.
🔥 Play with your friends to experience as a real chef and manage a restaurant together!
🔥 No need Internet after the initial install, loading process becomes more simple!

🌟 Let's imagine this scenario:
When you spend a long workday and back to home, you are losing the courage and hope about life. Then, you notice the picture on the bedside table and recall all the memory about your grandpa... 
In the next day, you are in the coach with the picture and back to your hometown🏠. In the car,  your finger is touching the frame and fall asleep😴. When you wake up, you would see the colorful buildings in the hometown. Everything is as beautiful as the memories. After seeing strangers in familiar streets and restaurants, you walk to the door of Grandpa’s restaurant.🍳

Now a brand new energetic cooking game is Online💥
What are you waiting for?🎉  Let's Cook & Design your Cooking Home!👊 👊 👊

comments: Love the game so far!! My only negative is that they've copied the art/gameplay/design of Cooking Diary almost exactly. You would not be able to tell screenshots of the games apart. I wish they were confident enough in their game to do something unique to their own ideas! I hope to see that in the future.

I was Really Enjoying the game until it came to watching the ads for the Rewards or for Extra Customers or more seconds to continue the game. The ads will play, but I Can't get back to the game. I have lost coins and time because of these ads

Just began playing and I like the game. It is similar to Mytona's Cooking Diary with one major exception. It's much easier to get diamonds needed to upgrade. The rubies in Cooking Diary are few and far between unless you purchase them. I don't mind buying stuff to advance in a game, but not constantly. This game might be the same way, once you advance levels. Don't know as yet.

Even though it's a carbon copy of Cooking Diaries, wish I played for over a year and no kidding spent well over a grand on it. Ridiculous. I like this better because there are so many ways to get gem and money and so far I haven't been bombarded with buy this you only have 15 min ads. Thanks for making a superior!!! I for sure love it!!

Started off great, some levels a real challenge but it is now bombarding me with ads, buy this , buy that. You need ridiculous amounts of diamonds just to continue when you need them to get upgrades. The game stalls just as you think you are winning the level and what is it with the emojis? They slow down progress so that you miss stuff, then it's back to the ads nagging at you to buy more.

title: Delicious World - Cooking Restaurant Game
description:
Play a FREE, brand new Delicious cooking adventure! Join Emily, a young and determined aspiring chef, as she begins her exciting journey to achieve her lifelong dream 👩‍🍳. A compelling story around the world baked with the most delicious ingredients: a spoonful of love, a pinch of friendship and a whole lot of fun! 💃

Discover original and stunning hand-drawn restaurants in every chapter. Cook, serve and learn new recipes as you make your customers happy happy and become the world’s greatest chef! 🍽️ Combine several ingredients in a dash and survive the kitchen craze before your hungry customers leave. Upgrade dozens of kitchen appliances and improve the restaurant to beat all the challenges!

🛫 JOURNEY AROUND THE WORLD 🛬
♡ Travel to exotic locations and master their most signature dishes.
♡ Take an amazing journey to Paris, Mumbai, Tokyo, and many more world-famous cities.
♡ Cook in a wide range of places, from small chocolateries to busy Italian trattorias.

💌 EXCITING STORY 💌
♡ Enjoy a compelling and addictive romantic comedy.
♡ Meet all kinds of interesting characters and discover their unique personalities: mentors, rivals, love interests and much more!
♡ Get invested in the story of a strong and independent young woman.

⏱ FUN & FRANTIC GAMEPLAY ⏱
♡ Combine ingredients to find the perfect recipe in addictively fun levels.
♡ Surprise your customers with the most tasty-looking food.
♡ Use your time management skills to serve every possible order.

🍳 STRATEGIC POWER-UPS 🍳
♡ Upgrade your kitchen with new appliances and decorations.
♡ Use powerful boosters at key times to obtain amazing effects.
♡ Meet different objectives in every level and change your play accordingly.

⭐ ENGAGING PROGRESSION ⭐
♡ Beat levels to get mittens and progress on your journey to become a great chef.
♡ Unlock new challenges and special mechanics in every restaurant.
♡ Get all-new episodes of this ongoing story with every update, just like your favorite TV shows.

Will Emily become a great chef? Will she find her true love? Find out in this fresh romantic restaurant game!

Want to get to know all of our games?
Follow us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/gamehouseoriginalstories
www.facebook.com/deliciousgames

comments: I love this game but I'm having trouble playing it bc every time I try to get my achievement, when I click on it, the game crashes. Literally every single time. Other than that, it's super fun. That other thing is really freaking annoying though bc it didn't used to do that. I think it might be a bug. If it gets fixed I will change my review to 5 stars.

I really loved this game. I started playing back when it was first released. Because I love the game, I did spend money to support the game and the people that created it. I dont have fb so I wasn't able to save my progress, so when it came time to upgrade my phone I started all over again. Which I didn't mind, but they have now made it impossible to get through levels once possible without spending real money. Shame, it was fun but without the ability to progress its just no longer enjoyable.

Love the game, but developers are greedy. I can achieve perfect scores with every customer, but can not complete the level without buying boosters. My advice to the developers is this: for players like myself who are unwilling to pay to play - take away the story. Those who invest their own money to buy boosters, etc can be rewarded with the story. Too late for me though; lost a player today, uninstalling.

You know what I love about this game? That since it updated I am CONSTANTLY KICKED OUT OF THE GAME! I love spending my time getting halfway through a level, get kicked out of the game because of an unstable connection, and a heart gets taken from me. I really did used to like this game. Now it's has become a waste of space on my phone.

This was my fav game.. but lately its been impossible to play. firstly the upgrades cost too much but I'm ready to be patient and play levels over and over.. but as I'm progressing, I can't even finish older chapters where I have done all upgrades, without having to use boosters. This has made impossible to earn coins. I have to put in money or I can't play at all.. also the double coins feature is not working. I watch the add but in the end the game hangs and I don't get double coins. I'm sad.

comments: This is a very good game. It will make you think and challenges how fast you can get the food order out. Now I am giving them a 3 because they are cheating when you reach the 15th keys. Good game, but too hard. Gave up at Level 9. Upgrades are way too expensive. People would play longer with better chance to win.

I loved this game.would like to request the developer if you could allow us to buy booster with coins.with diamond it is impossible to complete the game.so at the end we land up deleting the game and switch to other game
Horrible! It suddenly went back to the first level of the very first restaurant. I lost everything that I have earned and accomplished. So disappointing! Gonna uninstall this right now!
so far i love this game because its not hard, and so far it is easy to win levels and coins for upgrades

A World Tour of Tasty Recipes Restaurant Games
Let the fun begin with grandpa Bob and his grand daughter as they are set to chase their dreams in the most exciting cooking games. Explore the most delish street food fever from Asia & the savory fast food from 🌐 New York! Cook together and run your own restaurant business in the best casual 🍳cooking games for adults. If you are looking for a crazy kitchen games with a variety of cuisines, adventure stories and a different cooking simulator experience. Learn to deal with pressure and maintain your crazy 👨‍🍳chef performance.  
	
In this food diary cooking game, you will have a chance to cook dishes and try out Grandpas food recipes from fast food games, US special hotdog and desserts to Turkish, Indian, Japanese & Chinese cuisines & Making coffee in this time management games. You can also get your hands on using different appliances like a deep fryer, 🍕pizza maker, 🍔burger maker, 🌭food maker, 🥘rice cookers, 🍨ice-cream makers, cupcake makers, and MUCH MORE in crazy food fever 2020! Craze of Decorate and renovate your restaurant kitchen. scramble up  your own French cake shop and a NYC inspired burger shop and set up your stalls of donut, noodles, sandwich maker in the best relaxing games. 
 
Bring the Tastes from all Continents in Your Plate
This cook off food is breath-taking and will keep you hooked on food craze 🍳cooking games for girls until you ace all the levels in food games! You will also get a chance to cater to the rush of loyal hungry customers and showcase your great time management games skills in a crazy cooking simulator in a virtual family baking game! comments: Great, Fun Very Addictive Game to play but now it didn't give me my daily Bonus coins of 250 & the 10 diamond gems. It would be better if you could be able to synchronize the game with other android phones. Instead of having to start all over.

Played until level 7 continental.hub then it freezes when the rice is added. I have uninstalled game and tried again wasting lots of time as even though the game was saved I still had to start at level 2. Then once again it froze at the same place :( Good game though if this didn't happen.

Not a bad game. But when you get to the level er l of the Continental Hub Level 17, the soup with the green tea cake I guess it is will not let you click it. It seems stuck or froze. Tried exiting the game and restarting my cell to fix it. It wont fix the problem.

I only play this game for few hours, I find it kinda cute with the graphic plus its fun to play. I didn't have to spend any money on this game. If I can't pass the board then I'll play over and over again til I get that key.
Game freezing on number 7 on continental hub when the rice is added. Wasted lots of time going backwards and forwards. Game is early good but wish this wouldn't happen.

title: Virtual Families: Cook Off
description:
Cook, Grill and Bake your way to greatness in this free time management cooking game! Your Virtual Family needs to grow their House Flipping fund, and you’re going to help them reach their goal - one feast at a time in their own personal backyard restaurant! 🍴😍🍴

Become a top chef, making gourmet food and drinks from around the world! 🌍 

Manage your time to beat the dinner dash and dish out the delicious, from pizza to burgers, sushi and cupcakes and so much more!

The house isn’t going to flip itself! Spend your hard-earned dough and renovate and decorate the house and yard the way you want it. Maximize the property value and move to bigger, better homes! 


Fire up the grill, mix your marinades, become a chef and start your very own Cook-Off now!

Fun and Challenging Levels! 🍪🍳
• As a chef cook gourmet meals for you guests
• Replay family memories
• Expand your cooking technique with every level
• Serve customers from your backyard restaurant

Fun foods from around the world! 🌎🍜🍝🍕
• Cook up delicious meals from New York to Hong Kong, and everywhere in between! 
• Upgrade your dishes to maximize serving size and profit
• Amazing kitchen upgrades


Develop a cooking strategy! 💰
• Blast through memory levels for bonus coins
• Serve your food fast to get all the likes
• Challenge yourself with unlimited dishes in timed levels

Fun chef games are free to play! 🏆
• Time management kitchen cooking meets home renovation and decoration!
• Bake, grill and fry delicious foods in the kitchen for your hungry guests!
• Serve your family and the whole neighborhood!

Upgrade every food and preparation item in the game! 💎
• Upgrade your foods to become more valuable
• Update your kitchen gear to increase capacity and decrease prep time
• Become a master chef in this time management game 

Cook all the classic restaurant foods in this free kitchen cooking game! 🍔 
• Cook juicy hamburgers, hearty American steaks, mouth-watering Italian pizza, gelato, pasta and risotto!
• Whip up Mexican breakfast bowls with eggs, avocado and chorizo! 
• Serve up savory Japanese sushi, classic Canadian maple poutine or Jamaican jerk chicken! 
• Bake 3 milks cake, super sweet cupcakes and so much more!

 Decorate and renovate your home!
• Give your family home a complete makeover
• Renovate and decorate different houses, restaurants and so much more!
• The options are endless for your virtual home

To stay up to date on the latest Virtual Families: Cookoff news visit our Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/Virtual-Families-Cook-Off-268634747356498/

Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise: 
• Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life)
• Virtual Families 2 Series
• Virtual Town
• Fish Tycoon Series
• Plant Tycoon
• San Francisco Zoo

recentChanges: Great news Chefs! Your latest update includes a surprising new project, a host of new characters, and 3 tasty food themes to conquer!
comments: I agree with other criticisms that the double tapping should be changed. Maybe click on the item and the trash can instead. The clock should not start until after the first order is shown. But my biggest problem is I made it to the next theme (Japan) and after a lot of wasted ad watching for extra coins in US, I found out they do not transfer over to the next themes but the chef hats do?! Very unfair! I do not even wanna play Japan now. Pls change this. I do not want to but I will uninstall.

This is probably the most engaging and fun time managementgame that I play (and I play wayyyy too many of them). Never a long period of time to wait for updates. I had to start over from the beginning since switching to android....not sure why since I am logged into my FB, but I don't mind starting over! Thank you for such an amazing game!!!

Fun but glitchy. I was playing round 102 the goal was 1500 I got 1999 and it said I failed the round and took a life away...smh not the first time something like that has happened to me while playing this game either. Chef Girl Craze Food Cooking - Restaurant Games

Do you like Restaurant foods? Do you love spice food? Do you Want be chef master? Do you have craze about cooking?

title: Tasty Chef - Cooking Games 2020 in a Crazy Kitchen
description:
Tasty Chef: A Fun Cooking Game in a Crazy Fast Kitchen. Prepare 🍽️ food 🍖 for the customers 👫 and become the best Chef 👨‍🍳 of cooking games in the world 🌎. Cook and serve to make your clients happy 😊!

The new wave in cooking games 🍽️ has come. Fix fast food like pizza, hamburguer, steaks.... and become a crazy chef opening new restaurants in a variety of countries 🗺️. The crazy kitchen is waiting the best chef of cooking games. Will you be able to cook fast ⏩ enough to serve your tasty dishes to all your customers? Challenge ⏱️ yourself in a crazy kitchen where your cooking skills are the only thing to success! Tasty chef is the most fun among all cooking games!

USA
Choose the best organic ingredients to cook the best eco pizza 🍕. Heat the oven and be aware to not burn 🔥 the food in this cooking game! Prepare a classic pancake dough 🍩 and pour it in the pan. Add some topping over organic chocolate and sweet cream. Mix and tap delicious milkshakes 🥛 fast and funny. Serve fast and get a tip from the happy customers. The faster you cook the higher your tip! 💰 Cook typical fast food from LA and NYC. Grill a steak 🥓 to famous customers in the restaurant game. The great dinner for supermodels with lobsters 🦀 and tasty desserts. The best of cooking games are here! Fast food game to cook the best organic burgers and yummy hot dog 🌭. The best pizza is in Tasty Chef!

SPAIN
The best place to eat. From fresh fish 🐟 to quality meats 🐂. You can have it all at these restaurants.
Visit the chiringuito 🏖️, order a sardine “espeto” and feel the best cuisine of south Spain in this restaurant game. Cook the famous paella 🥘 of cooking games, only the best spanish chef can cook. Put your client a glass of tasty gazpacho seating in your restaurant. Spanish celebrities are hungry so the want to taste the food of the best chef in this fast restaurant game. Serve some tapas and engage your customers with fresh cocktails 🍸the best food of cooking games is in Tasty Chef! 

MORE RESTAURANTS TO COME
Stay tuned for the next restaurants in this cooking game.

Tasty Chef: a fast cooking game experience for those who look for tasty recipes and fun cuisine! Cook fast to serve your clients and complete a ton of levels with different foods and restaurants. Complete a lot of cooking challenges and earn rollers to upgrade your kitchen. 


After the download of Tasty Chef you agree the terms of use: https://www.revolx.io/privacy.php

comments: It's very fun, but I'm already bored! It takes a while to unlock a lot of recipes, so it feels very repetitive that I keep making the same five dishes over and over. Maybe even doing more than one at a time would add some more chaos to practice overcoming. It's apparent that the only way to keep having fun is to open up your wallet. I'll never understand $50+ packs to purchase for a mobile game. That's the price of a full damn complete game that isn't rigged to make you feel impatient.

This game is super fun but it does have some bugs. I really do think this game should be back on PC for people who want to look at a bigger screen and can feel the stress of a real shef and walk around. Also there should be a sandbox with all the foods unlocked. Hope you read this and bring back this game to PC.

Just installed this game and went through 2 tutorials. The first got stuck on unlocking the second recipe and the second got stuck on serving the first recipe. Both times I could not progress out of the window and had to shut the game down. Even though I got the message that my progress was saved it was not saved. I understand this is brand new so I am just informing Devs of the bugs. Edited: Things have improved. Except the game throws food away and misreads commands.

For a free game its pretty nice,i did face some bugs along the way, example when i lift up the board the ingredients stay on work surfice so i have to pick one by one its quite annoying. One time board just went missing and i had to clean up ghe kitchen which isnt a big deal because your progress and recipe stay on. One more thing is the placement is off when i try to decorate the place. The parsley is put on same spot over and over again. Looking forward to new update.

Very Very Addictive Game. I just have one problem, there is a slight bug. Sometimes you can't touch anything after you put something down. And when i use joystick mode to move, sometimes the game tap anything else in the screen that not being tapped. Other than that, the game is very good. 5 stars from me. And please fix the bugs. Thank you for the good game! 😁

title: Burger
description:
A burger-serving game has arrived for your best enjoyment in a free version with the Magma Mobile’s touch! 
You are hired in a chain restaurant to serve clients as quickly as possible to earn money and even tips for yourself. Take orders from your customers and make a recipe among sandwiches, garnishes, desserts and sodas. The more you play, the more ingredients will appear in the fast-food joint!

Take up the challenge and try the Career Mode to cope with a higher difficulty each day of the year! 
Work from Monday to Saturday and reach your goal to get more money and new ingredients for the service. Then if you are a great employee, you will even unlock a lot of achievements!

Time is money! 
Try your best in the Time Attack Mode to collect the maximum amount of coins within the time limit!

This time management game will definitely entertain and challenge you and your family!

Game Features
- A whole lot of different ingredients like bread, meat and lettuce
- More than 300 levels and 40 achievements for burger maniacs
- Many side dishes like ice creams, french fries and muffins
- Share your creation with the gallery

So come play Burger and become the master king of burgers!

comments: Great game, fun to play, simple, but would be great if we had something to buy with the ingame currency. It's been the same for years so expanding even some of the game play wouldn't be bad either. Example, adding Cheese fries or even Disco fries would be improvement. Visual character, employee of the month, special earns, maybe even just buy stuff for a home appartment look. Something to do n buy.

I Loved The Art Style And Gameplay It Made Me Feel Good In A Way. I Don't Know Why But Something About It Reminds Me Of A Memory That I Can't Visualize. I Don't Know Why Such A Weird Game Would Make Me Feel Nostalgic. Even Though I Never Seen Anything Like This. Like... I've Known Something But Can't Remember.. ?!?!!!! Thanks For This Feeling I Guess..

So this game is really fun I love that there is no adds I recommend the people readying this should give this game a try! The only problem is that the music will sudonly go off on its own while playing. I go to settings and it says the music is on even though it's not going. It's really confusing me and I don't know why it's doing that😔. But over all this game is awesome!😄 I would give it give star if the game would not let me do the music⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐🎵🎺🎷

This game is pretty straight forward, easy controls, simple gameplay, kind of addictive, and overall a fun game. I recommend this game to anyone looking to kill time or to kill boredom. Easy to use by kids too. Well designed graphics and gameplay. Keep it up y'all!
This game is so fun and i like it my sister playing this game and she like it too and this game is offline and no ads so. i like it so much

title: Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game
description:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming master chef by playing fun cooking game and serving delicious dishes to hungry customers in amazing restaurant games? Than Welcome to the Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game, it is a FREE cooking game where you set off to play as crazy cooking restaurant chef by providing speedy service in food game to please customers with the most tasty food. Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game is an addictive time management cooking game, that enhance you cooking skills moreover your time management skills as you take over the chef craze in restaurants games. Travel across the world and dash around the kitchen, use various ingredients to cook lots of delicious dishes like Donuts, Burgers, sausages, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, French Fries etc. Meet unique diner who visit your restaurant, serve and delight them with quality food and speed in order to win popularity and earn big tips. Dash from restaurant to restaurant and spread the feverish kitchen chef cooking games craze, something a restaurant games would let you cook in food games. Cook tons of fabulous cuisines & serve customers who visit your fun restaurant chef games with quality food and speed. Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game is a beautiful kitchen chef cooking game that tests your cooking skills, time management & serving skills so as to serve the hungry customers & make them happy.

Chef Craze : Restaurant Cooking Game game teaches you how to cook delicious dishes and manage your own restaurant and become a true master chef in kitchen cooking world! Start your chef games craze in the kitchen games, use various ingredients to cook food with amazing recipes like spicy hamburgers, seafood, spaghetti, steaks, cola etc. You can cook food for multiple customers at same time in kitchen games to improve your cooking & time management skills. So kitchen chef take command of the cooking games and demonstrate the craze of a master chef. Choose the right ingredients & cook food according to your customer’s choice otherwise you’ll have to throw it in the trash. Decorate your kitchen to attract more hungry customers. By cooking delicious & tasty cuisine, please customers and make foodie paradise in this food game. In the world of master chef cooking game experience serve exotic flavors all over the world with crazy cooking chef games. Bake, cook, and grill meet unique customers, serve and delight them with your delicious food, and earn Coins and Tips in cooking games. Upgrade kitchen games appliances & produce an even greater variety of dishes & tasty cuisine with kitchen games utensils. Decorate your restaurant kitchen to attract more hungry customers. Remember don’t let the diner get angry at their food orders. So home chefs! get ready for a new kitchen story with an ultimate kitchen fever in food games.

Features:
* Cook, grill, and serve food by using simple TAP.
* Unlock new restaurants and grow your food menu.
* Exciting cooking game with many fancy restaurants
* Cook on multiple stoves and serve a variety of meals.
* Fulfill the orders of Hungry Customers in cooking world.
* Earn money and great prizes for finishing catering orders!
* It is a FREE game + No Wi-Fi is required to play this cooking game.
* Become the super star master of this kitchen game & cooking world!
* Unlock New Restaurants that pushes your Cooking Dreams to the next level
* Play in English, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish, Thai & Indonesian!
* Upgrade your Kitchen Appliances to speed up the food line and to Level Up & become a Super Chef!

title: Cooking Cafe – Restaurant Star : Chef Tycoon
description:
Cooking Cafe is a beautiful kitchen cooking & restaurant simulation game that tests your resource & time management skills. Cook & serve delicious hot food & expand restaurant business.

Become the ultimate master chef you have always wanted to be! Prepare, Cook & Serve tasty recipes from all over the world in Cooking Cafe! An addictive bakery & restaurant story game where you set off to help chef master to open a classy cafe & serve her guests delicious foods & baked goods. A madness restaurant game in which you must fulfill customer orders & create tasty dishes in a cooking dream restaurant. 

This restaurant game is a fun cooking scramble games where you own your tasty food court, decorate cafe beautifully, hire chef to cook food & serve customers as quick as possible to earn maximum profits & become cafe games tycoon. It’s by far the best chef restaurant games in paradise kitchen simulation story game ever! In this exciting crazy chef games, start your adventure fun truck journey around the town & world to build a series of real restaurant fever tycoon & express your own chef games story.
Write your own real restaurant diary in cooking cafe games today.

COOKING CAFE FEATURES:
❤ Cook delicious food!
~ Prepare delicious fast food that customers will love & share. Guests must love your fast food & service so as to improve cafeteria popularity. Make delicious tasty pizza, candy, cake, sweet cookie, coffee & other cuisines for breakfast, lunch & dinner.

❤ Build Your Cafe!
~ Restaurant management means you’re in charge! Own multiple cafe, restaurant or diner layouts to promote your business
~ Decorate your restaurant to make customer happy.

❤ Immerse yourself in the vivid graphics & exclusive Outfits!
~ Delicate graphics will give you the feeling of actually being in the restaurants instead of just a fever kitchen cooking games.

~ Try out various elegant outfit while playing games.

❤ Open restaurants worldwide!
~ Invest your money & open another Cafe world across the globe.

❤ Multiple Strategies, Tips & Cooking Skills:
~ Create more combos to get extra bonuses
~ Unlock & Upgrade the ingredients to increase your earnings.
~ Apply the useful boosters to level up at hard stages.

Dash into the madness, craze & fun offered in food making games! Cook in different kitchens, cafes & restaurants while serving food to customers & learning new happy cooking skills. Embrace the cafe joy & share the tasty food fever in town! Cooking restaurant Frenzy is much more than just an easy, happy, & fast-paced chef cooking games for girls. Cooking cultures may be different, but the cooking craze is always the same! 

Get ready & dash to the delightful happy cooking journey! Express your craze of cooking to serving the best recipes to your customers! Become the ultimate superstar cook dash, you’ve always wanted to be! Start joy cooking, crazy chef!

If you dream about becoming a crazy chef in a crazy cooking food recipe games, then catch the crazy food fever cooking kitchen games today! Play restaurant cooking games with levels & challenge with your mama, papa and other family members today for free. 
From the makers of Kitchen story, Cafe Tycoon & Patiala babes - cooking game, we are pleased to announce brand new Cooking Cafe Game.

--------------------
IMPORTANT CONSUMER INFORMATION:
Game respects your privacy, does not store any personal information & does not allow you share this information.

We do require a few additional Permissions to function:
1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
These permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content.
2) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
This permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new game content for new locations.

Game is free to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money to enhance your gameplay.

Game may contain third-party advertisements.

-----------------------

Features

title: Cooking Voyage - Crazy Chef's Restaurant Dash Game
description:
🌏🚢Are you excited about driving your own superyacht travel around the world to build your own restaurant empire?🚢🌏
🍩🍛Do you like to play fast paced cooking games?🍛🍩
😁🍰Do you have craze of time management games?🍰😁

If you answered "YES", you should check out this addictive time management cooking game Cooking Voyage - Crazy Chef's Restaurant Dash Game! New FREE fun cooking simulator game in 2020! 🏆 The cooking joys and adventures await! If you are a master of time management games, never miss this challenging one! 

Cook like a crazy chef with the highest cooking fever and madness ever! Show off your cooking craze as you prepare, 🍰cook and serve tasty meals🍲 in each exotic restaurants all over the world to build your own restaurant empire. Control the fast-paced chaos as you dash your way around the kitchen, serve fast to crazy picky customers. Sharpening your cooking skills is not enough though, master your time-management skills and spend your earnings on upgrades for food and appliances for your restaurant to be a five star chef! You are destined for fabulous chef mega fame, just like famous chef ramsey! Pack the cooking talents that your papa and mama give you, let's go on our exciting hot frenzy cooking journey.

Did we say you will own a super megayacht🚢? Board your own megayacht to begin your worldwide journey! Visit famous cities and unlock the most famous landmarks🗼🗽!Discover different food cultures and cook various cuisines with tons of ingredients in distinctive diner or cafe or restaurants. The journey will never be bored while you could give your megayacht a complete makeover✨! Decorate and renovate your bedroom, kitchen, hall and other rooms in just the way you want! Explore your creativity with hundreds of design options and create your dream megayacht while playing this engaging best cooking game, restaurant game and kitchen game!

⭐Features⭐

🍕COOK massive tasty cuisines and recipes with hundreds of ingredients🍕
👩🏻‍🍳EXPAND your restaurant empire with distinct restaurants in different cities👩🏻‍🍳
🦞TRAVEL to explore amazing food cuisines  around the world🦞
🚢A SUPER MEGAYACHT to discover for new rooms and minigames🚢
🎨RENOVATE and DESIGN what your own megayacht looks like🎨
🗼🗽BUILD LANDMARKS in each city map with your progression🗼🗽
☕🍳UPGRADE your kitchen and ingredients for premium dishes☕🍳
🍔TAP to PLAY over 1000+ levels and more to come🍔
💰CREATE COMBOS to earn extra coins💰
😀SERVE  a variety of cute customers😀
📺PLAY OFFLINE📺
🎁Download for FREE and join the adventures of Cooking Voyage!🎁

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to support@newvoy.com.

comments: It was fun at the beginning but by Venice and onward some of the levels are impossible to finish without a booster or two. I have spent a lot of real money to buy bundles however they get used so fast and the rewards are small and disappointing. You can never replenish enough to succeed. It's not enjoyable when you can't move on without it costing a fortune. Thinking seriously about deleting.

I love this game. But like all the cooking games, passing some levels are near impossible without buying boosts. I am not going to spend money just to advance in a game. I understand the need to have ads to make money but not to take money from people who don't have it.

Of all the cooking games I have tried to play, this one is the BEST! 👍🏻 Thank you for giving us a very enjoyable offline game to play with good graphics. ❤❤ Kudos to all developers of Cooking Voyage. 👏

I was really enjoying the game until today. The app keeps freezing and asking me to check internet connection, which I know is working. So until this issued can be resolved, you only get 2 stars for now.

So many ads! Forced to watch an ad every 5 rounds. That's an ad almost every 5 to 10 mins. Makes the game so frustrating even if you can skip them after awhile. The ship decoration was also a real letdown as you're only allowed to choose between 3 sets. It's almost completely identical to another game which isn't ad heavy like this, so I'd rather play that over this one anytime.

title: Crazy Cooking: Craze Restaurant Chef Cooking Games
description:
Welcome to the New Cooking Game :Crazy Cooking: Craze Restaurant Chef Cooking Games on 2020! Become the star chef – cook and serve tasty cuisine with us!
🏪🏙 Why need to settle down for a traditional restaurants when you can serve your own tasty food all around the world?
🚚🚚 Park your food truck wherever you want, make delicious donuts, fried chicken drumsticks or hamburgers as fast as possible, brain out the best way to serve the hungry customers with your restaurants!
🌭🍔🍟 Prove that cooking incredible food on the go is not a big challenge, become a famous king of 🍔 burgers in the world!
🔥 🔥 🔥 Feel the heat in the crazy kitchen with QUICK TAP, COOK and SERVE till frenzy. Enjoy in interesting Cooking Fever game in the Kitchen and Prepare world-class cuisine like a Super Craze Chef!

⭐ Create your own COOKING empire 💍

⭐ Fascinating music, vibrant and fun sound effects ️🎵️🎶
⭐ Lively animations ️🎈

Fun & dash, quickly & frenzy cooking game anytime, anywhere

🎉 Internet is required

🎉 Simple taps with detailed cooking and playing instructions

Interesting cooking games with different challenges to become a MASTER, chef!
🏆 New levels and cities around the world are added regularly
🏆 Enjoy hours of fun time-management and craze cooking game moments

Start your chef madness adventure in Crazy Cooking, cook your own way with your own food truck collection
🌁 Decor trucks, upgrade kitchen in the way you love, make it become your own adorable home 🎁
🌁 Travel, explore new lands in the world 🍾

Diverse & special dishes from different cultures and cuisines in the world, even open an animal restaurants
🍲 Fry, Boil, Steam and Grill wonderful ingredients to create interesting dishes 🍳
🍲 Mix a variety of special drinks and beverages ☕️🍹
🍲 Serve customers for breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert
🍲 Bake delicious cakes, biscuits, hamburgers, chicken, fastfood and steaks
🍲 Make coffee ☕️ 🍹 ice cream 🍦 and other drinks 🍮

Many difficult and attractive challenges & tasks:

🎯 Try your best to earn coins & diamonds, upgrade kitchen utensils and premium food 🍖🍤

🎯 Play extra missions to earn extra coins & diamonds - You will get caught up in this addictive and engrossing Cooking Craze 💰

🔑 Apply 🌟 useful boosts 🌟 tons of Cooking Craze tips and tricks to assist chefs with hard challenges

🎊️🎊 Enjoy hours of free fun working in Restaurant and Time Management in this awesome Cooking game!

title: Cooking Tale - Food Games
description:
Cook  and serve  delicious food as a top chef and put your time-management  skills to test by playing cooking games for free!
If you're ready to live the life of a rising star who's just graduated from the chef academy, share the fever,craze and fun of cooking and baking food with chef Audrey! Cooking Tale will fill your dreams of being a chef and discovering joy of various cuisines for sure! Travel and explore towns, each with a new cafe, coffee shop, bakery or diner! Every new episode on the map will bring you a new restaurant with new recipes and unique fun customers to deal with! A surprising illusionist and even a thief may stop by!

In this addictive time-management game you'll have to reach the maximum speed and skills! Your kitchen is equipped fully with all the utensils you need, and you'll find the more advanced and useful ones in the Shop! Take orders, cook and serve dishes and upgrade your tools to the best! Sounds fun? Roll up your sleeves, get ready to cook and make customers happy with various challenges in dash! Survive the frenzy and become the greatest chef ever!

If you want to have a fast-paced fun, play Cooking Tale now and...

- Cook hundreds of different dishes!
- Discover amazing restaurants and towns on the map!
- Learn recipes from around the world!
- Serve super-fun customers on time!
- Upgrade and boost your kitchen with brand-new tools!
- Challenge the other chefs on every level!
- Connect with your friends to exchange gifts! 
- Enjoy cooking in both online and offline modes!

Discover the exciting map with more than 700 levels and addictive challenges! Play for free now!

title: Star Chef™ : Cooking & Restaurant Game
description:
Bring out your inner chef in an exciting online cooking simulation game! 

Are you a foodie? Are you a cook? Live your dream of becoming a Master Chef! Create recipes while putting together a cookbook of delicious dishes and grow from an amateur cook to a culinary master. Discover your passion of running a restaurant by managing a team of skilled chefs and customising your restaurant to make it the best in town! 

Get cooking now!

Game Features: 

• Cook and master worldly cuisines by serving hungry FOODIES
• Build a glorious kitchen using top-of-the-line cooking appliances
• Hire and manage a skilled staff of chefs
• Customise your restaurant using snazzy decors
• Grow your own veggies in the BACKYARD of your restaurant and harvest the freshest crops
• CHEF’S STORE & FOOD TRUCK to trade cookbook secrets, veggies and YUMMY dishes
• Expand worldly cuisines beyond your restaurant by cooking and CATERING for events
• Add friends on Facebook and Game Center to visit their restaurant and send gifts at the CHEF’S CIRCLE
• Serve takeaway food at the DRIVE-IN
• Upgrade your appliances and amenities at the WORKSHOP
• Train your staff at the ACADEMY to improve their culinary skills

Realise your dream of becoming a Culinary Master! Play Star Chef, everyone's favourite online cooking simulation game!

title: Cooking Joy 2
description:
Cooking Joy 2 - a new highly addictive cooking game from the team that brought you Cooking Joy, is calling all master chef candidates! Upgraded from Cooking Joy - a fun cooking game, it inherits the same challenging spirit and adds more fun! 

If you have always dreamt of becoming a top chef in a crazy cooking game world, then catch the cooking crazy fever with this game! Download NOW and try it for FREE!

Time to get back to the kitchen and enjoy cooking delicious dishes for starving customers again! Show off your overwhelming cooking skills and use your time management expertise wisely to beat some cooking game challenges!

Dash into the madness, craze and fun created by Cooking Joy 2 now! Cook in different kitchens, cafes and restaurants while serving food to customers and learning new cooking skills. Tons of challenging levels are waiting for you in our awesome cooking game!

What makes Cooking Joy 2 more special?

Simple and addictive cooking gameplay!
- Easy to start yet very challenging. Let the lovely waitress cook and serve hungry customers.
- Manage your time cooking tasty dishes and do not burn food!

Amazing restaurants and delicious cuisines await!
- A fun cooking journey full of delicious food to cook and stunning restaurants to unlock.
- Cook hundreds of tasty dishes including burgers, sausages, hot dogs, soups, french fries, etc…
- Serve food to all different types of awesome customers in this crazy cooking game, from an old mama to a hungry boy.

Give yourself a special brainstorming!
- Train your brain by memorizing new cooking recipes.
- Use your time management skills to find the best way to beat cooking levels.
- Enjoy the excitement of time-limited cooking game challenges.

Immerse yourself in the vivid graphics!
- Make your mouth water at the delicious food.
- Delicate graphics will give you the feeling of actually being in the restaurants instead of a cooking game.

Enjoy your time with family and friends!
- Compare cooking skills in-game and see who is the best cooking game master chef!
- Remember to share your cooking success with others!

What are you waiting for? Get ready and dash to the delightful cooking journey! Devote your craze of cooking to serving the best food to your customers! Accomplish your cooking tasks with perfect time management skills in the brand new cooking game - Cooking Joy 2!


Download NOW for FREE! You’ll definitely love the fever and craze brought by Cooking Joy 2!

comments: The control of the game by tapping is awesome. It's impossible to make mistake. But i don't like the use of energy to start level. If the energy increase every time you level up then its ok but no it stuck at 50 all the time. Upgrading needs a lot of money but so hard to generate money. I even play all three parts at each level still not enough money. And dont let me start with all the ads at the end of every level. Its annoying

the game is enjoyable, but you lose a life even if you clear a board. I been waiting two days for the other boards to open, I'm about to delete the game all together. How long do you have to wait for new boards? I've been waiting for a month or more, about to delete the game all together. Are there anymore boards coming?

The game cheats really bad when you get to high in numbers of the game it won't let you push the item that you want, also the item are to close to each other so when you push one item you get another. I like the game it got some things that need to be worked out.

Shame. I finished the island on cooking joy "1" to find there are no other levels. My disappointment was lessened when I saw a CJ"2"! But after playing about 1/2 hour, I unistalled it. Boring, too easy, harder to understand the "rewards". I wish they had just made more levels on the original version. Edit *I guess there isn't a 3.*

Its so fun but the network connection is horrible i worked so hard and spent money on the game card and it wont even let me unlock a level i rightfully deserve because of no connection and it always says video unavaible or no network connection i feel cheated i hate this game now i plan on telling everyone what a scam this game is becoming😒

title: Cooking Fantasy: Be a Chef in a Restaurant Game
description:
Train you cooking talents in the best cooking games and enjoy the fever of cooking fast in this crazy and tasty city!👩‍🍳👨‍🍳

Cook & serve tasty dishes  FAST as a chef in Cooking Fantasy – Cooking Games - feel the craze of a chef frenzy!
Become a pro chef cooking hot food to your hungry clients in this time management 🍴 cooking 🍴 games. Dash around the kitchen baking pizza🍕, grilling tasty burgers🍔, and cooking world-class famous dishes in USA, Spain, Japan, Italy, etc. Are you ready to tap as fast as your customers order? Is the craze of a top chef!

Cook Up Frenzy Anytime, Anywhere
• Download restaurant content and start cooking
• A fast-paced kitchen with stuning graphics, the best in cooking games 2020
• Play Cooking Fantasy offline on your android device after initial content download
• ⭐Wi-Fi not needed!⭐

Become a famous chef in the cooking city!
• 💰 Dash through kitchen madness to cook in a rush and win big prizes 💰
• Cook customers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and MORE!
• Bake, grill, and prepare food by using a simple TAP and COOK mechanic, smooth and   addictive, the smoothest of all the cooking games!

Dynamic and smooth gameplay, the best in cooking games!
• Smooth gameplay very fast and addictive
• Scramble to cook fast for a large number of customers! Earns tips!
• Upgrade your kitchenware and become the richest of the cooking games!

Easy cooking mechanics
• Cook in a bunch of crazy restaurants
• Earn stars to beat all the levels and unlock new kitchens!
• Create delicious meals and 🍩 tasty foods 🍩

Fun & Powerful Cooking Boosts
• Time-management with fantastic boosts
• Double your tips using the Price Doubler!
• 🍳 Don’t let the food burn! Take care cooking hot! 🍳

Cook Classic Restaurant Dishes in this Free Kitchen Game
• Cook eggs for breakfast, savory hot dogs & yummy burgers in the cooking empire
• Grill delicious fish, tasty steak, and delicious Ramen 🍜
• Pasta, pizza, ice-cream, gazpacho, paella, Ramen, Noodles… A lot of dishes around the world!

Cooking Challenges Require Strategy
• Take advantage of special events and levels to earn more gems and coins!💜💜
•  Cook with insta-cook boost to serve in your cooking diary! 
• Keep your clients happy to make them give you a like!

The Chef’s Community – Join us!

• Like our Facebook Page and Join our Community to stay tuned and win prizes! 👍
• Add your friends to help you beating the hardest cooking levels!
• Get involved in our social channels to earn more rewards and enjoy your chef diary

title: Burger Shop
description:
Make burgers, shakes, fries and more in this exciting fast-food restaurant cooking game enjoyed by millions of fans around the world. 

After receiving a set of strange blueprints in the mail, you build an extraordinary cooking contraption and open a restaurant. Your goal?  Cook tasty food and satisfy your customers as you try to discover the truth behind the mysterious kitchen blueprints. 

Upgrade the kitchen in your restaurants to provide your customers with different types of food and cook hamburgers, triple cheeseburgers, chicken sandwiches, onion rings, milk shakes, salads, sodas, ice cream sundaes and much, much more!  Build more cooking machines and open different restaurants, including a Diner, Beach Hut, Old West Saloon and more!  Can you dash around serving hungry customers tasty food with the help of your robotic chef and discover the secret of the mysterious food-machine blueprints?  

Burger Shop® is a fun and addicting time-management, fast-food, kitchen restaurant game.

GAME FEATURES:

• 80 Story Levels and 80 Expert Story Levels!
• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!
• 8 different restaurants!
• Over 60 different food items to cook in your kitchen!
• 104 trophies to earn!
• Unlimited play!

Join the Burger Shop craze and play four different game modes that offer endless play!

GAME MODES:

• Story Mode - Build your burger restaurant empire and discover the secrets behind the mysterious cooking machine:  The BurgerTron2000!

• Challenge Mode - Play fever-pitched, fast one-minute game rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over! It's Burger Cooking Mania!

• Relax Mode – Cook and serve food without any pressure or stress. Restaurant customers are infinitely patient.

• Expert Story Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master Chef? Put your food-making chef skills to the test in this fever-paced game mode!

Available in 12 languages:  English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Russian, Japanese, Korean and Simplified Chinese.

recentChanges: Added language selection
comments: One of my favourite childhood games, now on my Android tablet and in proper French! I wish I could the French letter œ/Œ in my player name, though. There's also a bug with my 10.1" Xperia Z2 Tablet on unrooted Marshmallow: The game is squeezed top and bottom if I don't enable full screen immersive mode, and in order to do that I had to install a third-party app, FullScreen Immersive Mode. As for the gameplay, touch works well, but it seems you can't put back food onto the conveyor belt.

Such a great time killer, you could sit on it for an hour straight and not get bored, it's simply perfect, if you're in line or in a train or whatever, this game is perfect to kill time. In conclusion; great immersive story, awesome gameplay and great dialogue. 10/10

This is a great game. Good for entertainment and passing time when you are waiting on line or any where else. Every level is fun and different with new restaurant scenery and new items on the menu. This game is excellent if you like/love cooking and serving. This game helps you with time management and equips you with quick order taking and serving skills.

I played this game YEARS ago on the computer. This port to the phone is great! Burger Shop is a traditional, actual game. That means no energy bars or infinite levels, no levels that are impossible to beat unless you buy overpriced bonus items. It's a fun and quirky take on the food/restaurant management genre. There are brief ads that pop-up infrequently between levels. They don't interfere with the gameplay, and you can pay about $2 to remove the ads completely. Awesome gem of a game!

There's a few ads, but it's super fun! There is a machine with a bar of food, and you tap the pieces of food and put them on a different machines to create the people's orders and you open up new restaurants. I absolutely love it!

title: Cooking Urban Food - Fast Restaurant Games
description:
Cooking Urban Food, a new cooking game concept in which you can cook, train your waiters, upgrade your cooking tools for faster paced cooking games and earn coins by becoming the best chef on different islands. All restaurant cooking games fans will love the practical and fast paced gameplay, but also the possibility to upgrade your kitchen tools and your waiter's speed, tips chance or waiting time.

Play like a professional top chef and make delicious street food for breakfast, lunch or dinner !

Unlock a new food truck every couple of levels, learn new street food recipes like burger, sandwich, donuts and  more but also create the most beautiful platings in these addictive restaurant cooking games.

In this new restaurant game, we've gathered some of the most appreciated street food recipes in the world, which we've combined with beautiful graphics and just like that, Cooking Urban Food, the best cooking game in 2018, came to life.

By playing this cool cooking game you may find yourself in an unforgetable adventure that will blow your mind and send you directly in the middle of the action inside the food truck's mobile kitchen around the world.

Not only you must cook faster and faster, but you will also have to 
make decisions regarding your food truck business by deciding if you use your coins for upgrading tools, getting powerups or just save as much as possible for the hard cooking levels.

After opening the burger kitchen food truck, you will meet your waiters that will guide you throughout all restaurant cooking games and please open your eyes and memorize what you see in our cooking games tutorial
so you won't have problems when preparing food for your team.

As a good restaurant manager you need to manage your team of waiters by upgrading them using the stars won during the restaurant cooking games or upgrade your kitchen tools using coins. Check the messages from your team because the waiters will give you useful advices about what tools you should upgrade or unlock.

You won't get too confortable playing the first cooking games and you will unlock all kind of new features like tornado powerups, gifts coming from your waiters, combos if you cook fast and a lot more. 

New food trucks with worldwide street food recipes will keep getting unlocked so you can experience unforgetable moments playing our restaurant cooking game.

Our game is a race against time in the cooking games but also a restaurant management experience as you have to decide which tools you unlock and what waiters will get trained.

title: Cooking Dash
description:
Flo cooks her way to TV fame as a celebrity chef in this fast-paced time management game – COOKING DASH!

Sharpen your skill as you prepare, cook, and serve delicious menu items in each exotic restaurant… in front of a live studio audience! Hear them gasp and cheer as you earn profits in each exciting episode! Quirky customers, superstar VIPs, fast-paced kitchen action, and TV fame await!

Excel as a chef to beat Series Finales and compete in the Trial of Style, where you can earn adorable Pets & Outfits!

COOK YOUR WAY TO STARDOM!
Control the fast-paced chaos as you dash your way around the kitchen, preparing meals for crazy customers! Collect tons of tips for excellent service and make those profits! YOU ARE DESTINED FOR FABULOUS TV CHEF MEGA-FAME!

HUNDREDS OF EPISODES TO COMPLETE!
Tons of fun cooking play across unique restaurant shows like the Vegas-themed Table Steaks, crazy Taco Train, and trendy Hip Stir Cafe with many more on the way! 

COLLECT AND UPGRADE!
Wanna get more successful and famous? Spend your profits on upgrades for food and appliances for your restaurant! Upgrade to shiny stoves, fancy food prep stations, and more to ensure all customers get three-star service!

PRIZE WHEELS!
Introducing Weldon Brownie’s brand new game show - Spin to Win! Spin a free Prize Wheel every day to win prizes like Gold, Prep Recipes, VIP Tickets, Auto Chefs, Outfits, Pets, and more!

OUTFITS & PETS!
Dress up Flo in fun outfits themed for each Show, and equip Pets to help you out in the kitchen by auto-serving Prep Recipes!

SERIES FINALES!
Want to test your skill? Face a gauntlet of challenging levels in a Venue’s Series Finale - experts only! Beat every episode in a Venue with 4 or more Stars to unlock!

TRIAL OF STYLE!
Try your luck in the Trial of Style! This multiplayer event features different Venues each time - do you have what it takes to be the best?

PREP AWESOME RECIPES FOR MORE CUSTOMERS!
Make special Recipes in the Prep Kitchen and attract customers with their favorite dishes! They’ll get you more and more famous, drop cool items, and give you special powers to blast your coffers with mega-profits and keep your star on the rise! 

BECOME SUPER-FAMOUS!
Fan the flames of your fame as you start your OWN SHOW full of the most elite VIPs coming to see YOU and your amazing cheffing skills! It’s FOOD and FAME for you as you host the hippest dinner parties in the WORLD in front of MILLIONS of VIEWERS! It’s a TV Chef dream come true! 

PLAY WITH FRIENDS!
Exchange gifts and compete with friends on your never-ending quest to be the best!

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?!?
Show your stuff and feed the hungry stomachs -- and fragile egos -- of the guests and VIPs! Download the FREE Cooking Dash® today! THIS IS THE MOST INSANELY FUN DASH GAME EVER!

Cooking Dash is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items.

Use of this application is governed by Glu Mobile’s Terms of Use. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Glu Mobile’s Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.glu.com. Additional terms may also apply.

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @glumobile
facebook.com/glumobile

recentChanges: Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
comments: I really like this game but sometimes just not working well. 1. I watch ads to speed up prep time yet still showing the original time without decreasing the time (i wait 30s-1m to claim but nothing) and i have to watch one more ad. 2. Just win a trial (2nd place), collect the premium wheel yet it does not show up. 3. Downloaded another game to get extra gold and when i reached the acqired level i clicked to claim and apperantly the game was removed from the list.

I used to give them good reviews, but not now. It does take patience and time to build up enough boosters to beat the higher levels. They used to compensate the players fairly when the game would crash. Like some have mentioned, you build up your supplies and then loss them because of an app error when you go to play. This isnt fair. I enjoy the game, but I don't enjoy being robbed by the developers. Glu, what do you lose when you are nice to your supporters, esp the paying ones! Be fair.

I also lost some previous experience and venues I had previously unlocked on my old game. What makes it worse is I even backed up the game with Facebook, but it still didn't make the connection. Also, these events are too boring and repetitive. There are only so many times we can do those Free Play or 50% recipes. Bring back the Gold or extra fame weekends.

I love the concept of this game but it definitely has some glitches. It use to be one of my favorite games until it started messing up EVERY single time I played it. When you try buying stuff you NEVER get it right away like you should. They'll definitely take your cash from your bank account right away but then you just have to keep trying to tell them you bought something and need it given to you. It is beyond ridiculous, never have I ever paid for something in a store & then left without it.

I love the game, but I had to give 2 stars because I previously played the game and I'm having the tutorial forced on me when I already know how to play the game and shouldn't have to the play the tutorial. otherwise a good game but forcing the tutorial on people who have played the game before does not help. Not to mention my progress on the game must have been deleted because I had to start all over again so I'm very unhappy.

title: Cooking Festival
description:

👉You’re the MASTER CHEF the cooking world has been waiting for - the most talented, well trained, and most promising 💥FOOD ARTIST💥 in the known universe!

comments: The customers get angry and leave to fast. The game starts slow but, it picks up the pace. However, the graphics are too small to really control. Things are thrown out accidentally because of the small graphics.
So far it is a good game. Prices are steep for a cooking game though. 41.99 is a special for novice?... 3.99 for less than a handful of gems?.. I will not be making any purchases for this game.
Love that this isn't a repeat of all the other cooking games out there. Love fast play gets you to the next restaurants easily. Love that are not many ads. Love love this game!
Only been playing for an hour but all seems very good! Great graphics, smooth game play, challenging but not difficult! overall so far it's a really awesome game!
Great game.Only problem is it starts to cost money to get through some of the stages.

comments: This game is good . I have given it four stars. And the reason for why I have not given it five stars because whenever I paas one level there shows an ad and when we click on close or cross option it says that "cooking master is not responding " and takes me again to home screen.

Is a good game to fill time, had been doing really well and had managed to get to the 3rd restaurant, but go back on there today and I have lost everything I had done and have been taken all the way back to level 1 and am now having to start all over again... Not great...

OK this was fixed, managed to play France for a few hours today. Then I was given a prompt to update, which usually goes fine. And the whole game was gone. Just like that. All the hours wasted on it..Now there is a new game. No. I don't want to check out your crazy new games..just give me my old game back

This game is an addict no doubt....... It's a good game..... I can say...... But the worst and most worst part of this game is....... I dont know why but even we reach 30th level it starts from first...... Once I reached 19th level... Then I closed the aap and after some time when I used it i was on 1st .. And again today happend the same.... I was actually on 30th level.... But i dont know y it's suddenly started from first level... This is what I hate in games... I say u should look after it..

I like this from when I started this game but now I really hate 😠😠😠😠😠😠😠 this game because I play the game level by level and I got the level 37 ie 3rd restaurant after that level it doesn't move to the next level I had played that level many times but still it didn't move to next level so I gave only one 🌟

comments: Challenging and fast game. Highly recommend this game, if you're up for a challenge. You can earn coins and gems by just playing, no need to spend any money. You can earn enough to upgrade food and equipment, and boosters. You'll definitely need to use the boosters on some of the food trucks. There are some trucks that are very challenging, it's a good thing that there's an option to switch from hard to easy once it becomes stressful.

Funniest cooking game on here, music fits in with the theme, great graphics, however, this game makes my phone extremely too hot, I try to reopen the app and it won't let me off, it's dang near impossible to exit out, and not to mention the customers are getting impatient because the game lags, I said it, lags. This game needs to be fixed, because it is like I said a great game, but the heat, the lagging and not being able to exit out is a huge problem, not to mention I have to restart my phone.

I was looking for games with a Halloween theme and I've always enjoyed cooking games so I decided to try this out. Very pleasantly surprised! The graphics are good, the recipes are imaginative, and funny, and the game play is smooth. I haven't run into any glitches. So far completely free to play which is why I will buy something so I can support the game developers. I see they have another game with a Christmas cooking theme and I will probably check that one out too. Great Job GameiCreate!

I really like this game but there is one bug that confuses me. On level 386, Cake Shop, there's one customer that will ask for a blank, one layered cake but after you make it, they won't take it and you'll end up failing the level. Other than that the game is amazing.

I absoulutly love this game.I'm on the 5th truck.Only one thing is my complaint-after you get a few trucks in it gets almost impossible to keep up but it is fun to work on.It gives you a ton of diamonds the more you play so you don't have to buy them like other games.

title: Cooking Fans - Chef
description:
Cook delicious meals and lovely desserts from all over the Asia in this FREE addictive time-management game! In the future maybe have a choice of 32 unique locations, from Fast Food and Hand-Pulled Noodle Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than thirty materials to cook several hundred noble dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from Cola makers and Barbecue machine to sushi roll and teapot. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients.to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of delicacy. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing！ Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

Features:
* More than 20 delicacy to cook using 100 material
*In the future maybe have a choice of 32 unique locations：Fast-Food, Bakery, Chinese, Pizza, Seafood, Indian, Breakfast Café, Sushi Bar, Ice Cream Shop, Paradise Cocktail Bar, Corn Dog Van, Café Mexicana, House of Crab, FC Barcelona Sports Bar, Sunset Waffles, Smokey Grill BBQ and so on.
* More than 80 levels to complete
* Dozens of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior
