recentChanges:
Psst, everybody!

Do you want to sell a recipe with any spices to a customer? Maybe you're tired of manually recharging machines and you wish the coffee shop earned bigger profits?

Boosters will help you in these and other situations. Win them in the Bunny Game, get them when you reach a new level, or look for them in special offers and gifts.

You can read more in our social network groups. Have fun!
comments: I don't like spending money on games, but I do watch a lot of ads. This game can be easily played without spending money (you just have to be VERY patient and use some kind of strategy), but unfortunately in the new updated they have been replacing features that were free with the same features, but paid. I don't mind that they sell stuff, but removing the features that already exist to make people pay more is very greedy and rude. I hope they fix this but so far I am very disappointed.

This use to be a very nice game. Honestly, I fell in love with the ease of everything which led me to feel fine about spending some real money on certain things. Why not, right? Well...this game has become a nightmare. They completely began to change everything around, without warning or hesitation, to basically charge players for anything and everything they can. Their customer service is terrible, and there customer care base is at a solid zero. I would seriously not suggest anyone play this

This was my first review with 5 stars: This is the first game that i didnt feel bored at all. Now, i'm changing my rating to 1 star! The update was horrible. This game has become more and more expensive to play. I am vip 7 but im getting tired of playing. The devs seem to make it a money making game now. It's not fun anymore! They took minimize the gifts in the bunny game. Now they made it hard for everyone to play without spending!

Don't download the game. I've been playing it almost from the beginning but this game is not worth anymore! If you don't spend you will not enjoy it at all. I am a VIP player and I never complained about any update,not even about almost every bug that came with a new update but this one is a big bul*s*it! They made the game not fun anymore,and if you are a nin-VIP is even worse. Again,choose any other game to play but not this one.

It's OKAY. I've installed and reinstalled a few times, and this time I started from the beginning (my fault). It does try to make you pay to play A LOT. They've recentydone this thing where when you ask the customers what they want and you tap on that recipe it shows you the ingredients needed on the bottom left side of your screen. I prefer to make the recipe thru memory that way it's more challenging and fun! I love this game, but pls make it more fun and easier for the no-pay players to play!

comments: Like the game, but way too many ads. After I got to level 6, I could no longer see the hot dogs. Tried clearing the Cauche, but that didn't work. Tried reloading the game, that didn't work either. Still playing it though, kind of makes it more exciting.

Equipment is to expensive for what you need. You don't score coins fast to be able to by equipment you need to cook with. I gave it two stars, but really it deserves a zero. I am gone and will never return.

A great game for kids, my daughter is totally in love with it . It's a great way to cut down on internet videos and give the kids game to play for few minutes so the rest of the activities can go smoothly and screen time is also under control.
Good concept. But the upgrades are way too high. It's not real life, shouldn't be expensive. And the loading takes too long and glitches are bad. Other than that good game.

The big bug. Picture of hotdog+ketchup doesn't appear on counter and customer order. There was just a blank or pink box. I already try uninstall and download again but it's the same. I can't play if it's still like this, so now I uninstall it already.

title: Masha and Bear: Cooking Dash
description:
Here are “Masha and the Bear: Cooking Dash”! Masha welcomes children to try these games for kids and their cooking food abilities! 😋

The Bear, Rosie, Panda, the wolves, and other animals in the forest are hungry! 🍲🍴 
Who will feed poor animals in this food making games? Masha and Bear of course! With the help of kids this restless little girl will be cooking food for every character from the popular cartoon “Masha and the Bear” in this food games! 
But each animal wants different ingredients. Find them all in this cooking dash and make the best oatmeal ever!
Game for kids features: 🤗 
- 16 characters in this children games free from Masha and the Bear games
- cooking dash games with 33 ingredients to add into oatmeal
- talking Masha in this cooking games for girls
- the recipes become more difficult with levels in this cooking games for kids free

😋 Are you ready to make oatmeal with bananas in diner games? Or with ham? In this cooking dash games Masha and the Bear will teach toddlers how to make oatmeal with anything in this cafe games free! 
Every animal in the forest will come to Masha's cafe games and order a dish. In cooking games for girls this can happen twice a day!
With every new visitor in your cafe kitchen the oatmeal recipes will become more interesting and complicated. Cook all orders in this cooking games free!

This Masha and the Bear cook games are suitable for kids from 2 to 8, it has the initial interface so that even toddlers can play without parents. 
If your kids love children games free about cooking dash or diner games, “Masha and the Bear: Cooking Dash” is the best choice for them! With Masha and Bear plus other animals kids will train their intelligence, logic and attention! And will learn how to cook dinner! 😋

Children games for boys and girls free are not always interesting and new. But Masha cooking chef will make this cooking dash a complete fun! This is the first food games with Masha and the Bear. If you are looking for cooking games for kids free where kids cook this is a good choice!

Give your kids games free that are not only funny but are also educational games for kids! Toddler games free do not always suit these parameters but this cook game for kids really do!

This Masha and the Bear cook games are suitable for kids from 2 to 8, it has the initial interface so that even toddlers can play without parents.
If your kids love children games free about cooking dash or diner games, “Masha and the Bear: Cooking Dash” is the best choice for them! With Masha and Bear plus other animals kids will train their intelligence, logic and attention! And will learn how to cook dinner! 😋

Children games for boys and girls free are not always interesting and new. But Masha cooking chef will make this cooking dash a complete fun! This is the first food games with Masha and the Bear. If you are looking for cooking games for kids free where kids cook this is a good choice!

Get the restaurant cooking back to business, cook tasty food fever up your restaurant craze attract more customers & be the master chef in free Cooking games. Get yourself cooking, travel across the world & cook fast food and dessert in restaurant kitchen as a master chef from free kitchen games. Use various ingredients to cook lots of tasty meals like Donuts🍩, Burgers🍔, sausages🍖, Pizza🍕, Sandwich🌮, Cake🍰, BBQ🍗, French Fries🍟, kebab in free food games. Meet unique diner who visit your restaurant, cook & serve fast food and delight them as master chef with speed in order to win popularity in free food games. Tap to Cook & serve hungry customers in many fancy restaurant games. The fever of cooking will get you going and serve and cook like mama delicious meals, dishes and desserts from every country in the world!

Cooking Shop : Chef Restaurant Cooking Games 2020 is an addictive time management crazy chef cooking games. Take the crazy fate of restaurant games in your hands keep your diner happy by cooking & serving piping hot dishes. Fever your restaurant craze, prepare, cook, and serve tasty meals or dessert from all over the world in cafe, choose the right ingredients according to your customer’s choice otherwise you’ll have to throw cooked food in the trash. Make the best cooking strategy that will help you earn big tips plus you can unlock exciting food items and kitchen games appliances. Upgrade dishes and kitchenware this way you may expand your restaurant kitchen chain & you may serve more customer. So crazy chef take your madness cooking games fever to a whole new level cook tasty food in free kitchen games, take command of kitchen games and demonstrate the madness of crazy chef & fulfill the appetite of your hungry customers in amazing restaurants & make them happy. 

Come and dive into the vast collection of culinary delights! Cook tons of tasty cuisines and become a cooking games crazy chef in this addictive time management restaurant games that features endless play. This super crazy free food games has gathered all the famous dishes and kitchen fever recipes to enjoy the kitchen craze fast food time filled with madness cooking and restaurant games. Take orders of customers and quickly start making best dishes and do fast food cooking. Cooking Shop : Chef Restaurant Cooking Games 2020 will take you through the experience of a chef’s fame and fortune that you have ever seen in a cooking games! Fly from restaurant to the next on our beautiful cuisine map. You will get to visit new restaurants as you go on your adventure. Be the Master chef you have always dreamed of because this is the cooking games just for you! The aim of this chef games is simple: you must serve your customers and make as much profit as possible! It is an exciting chef games in which you must move around the world and build a series of thriving Restaurant.

* Receive coins from happy & satisfied diners.
* Fun filled, unique, challenging & exciting levels.
* Unlock new recipes and grow your cafe food menu.
* Cook, grill, and serve tasty food by using simple TAP.
* Spend earned money to upgrade your cafe appliances.
* Fulfill the orders of Hungry diner in cooking games.
* Run your own Restaurant kitchen with business strategy & Serve Customers.
* It is a free cooking games + No Wi-Fi is required to play this free food games.

comments: Would be 5 stars if the entire game did not lock up at level 47. So disappointed. This was the best game I had played in a long time...

I've given 1 star now this game is a sham.

I liked the game but it freezes after sometime. Moreover what is the timer for? Energy Restoration is the most irritating thing in this game. It is not restored until next day n until I do not watch the free videos. Even after some time the free ad videos are not available. Do fix these issues. I am so happy now. I think you have fixed issues coz now there is no such problem. I appreciate your immediate response and efforts. Thank you

it was good till 47th level. i upgraded all the things with the star i have. but in the next level i played well but i need more customers to cross that level which im unable. the customers should be provided by the app developers. im unable to gain more stars to upgrade the things as there is a tag "find a job " in all the level. if i play the current level there is no increase in the stars. if it doesn't increase, how would i upgrade? how would i cross the level?

title: Kebab World - Chef Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game
description:
Have a delicious journey across Turkey! Develop your restaurant cooking game skills through an epic exploration of traditional Turkish food cuisine in this time-management game. Prepare, cook, serve and satisfy your customers, keep them happy in your world kitchen to earn more coins and diamonds!

COOK TRADITIONALLY
Learn how to prepare authentic Turkish recipes from this cooking game and become kitchenchef. Baklava, Shish kebab, chicken shawarma, doner kebab, Turkish pita, macaroni and authentic seafood dishes are only a few examples of the great traditional tasty food recipes. There is something for everyone’s liking. Find out which one will be your favorite!
 
OVER 750 EPISODES TO COMPLETE!
800 episodes spread into 20 locations in Turkey are waiting for you to discover them. Experience the cooking joy of preparing the authentic flavours in diverse cafe restaurants ranging from Mediterranean to Black Sea seafood restaurants, from Turkish Pizza joints to Kebab houses with shish kebabs and doner kebabs. Your kitchen chef skills developed in cook games for free, can be expanded in Anatolia by learning to cook traditional food and become the kitchen world chef.
 
UPGRADE YOUR KITCHEN
Jazz up your kitchen with upgrades, and boost your cooking chef skills with numerous improvements! From professional cooking pans to advanced beverage stations, you can upgrade tools and ingredients for your restaurant. Better quality ingredients and appliances lead to greater variety of dishes and happier customers with more money in this cooking game!

TAKE UP THE COOKING CHALLENGE
Love a little bit of a tension in the cooking game? Then, get yourself in a real cooking craze, keep up with the rush hours, and develop time management skills. A cooking game offers endless challenging levels to give you that special cooking experience by serving customers. 

Are you a big fan of cookinggames, kitchen games, or restaurant cooking games? Do you feel like the master chef of cookings games? Start your cooking journey to be the star chef of Kebabs. Don’t wait! Download and catch the cooking fever.

Most of the meal orders in Turkey end with, ‘serve with rice’. Turkish rice pilaf is definitely one of the most famous dishes in Turkey! With the brand new rice restaurant, you will also get used to such orders in the game. We bet your customers will be very fond of it. Be ready for the challenging orders!

comments: I have enjoy by playing this game. I had installed this game 3 days ago. Everything was absolutely fine on 1st day but on 2nd and 3rd day this game is not working properly. When I clicked on restuedent then clicked on "next" bottom, it automatically closed the app. Again try to open it same thing happen. Sometimes I can play but most of the time this thing happen to me. I hope my problem can be solve.

A+, very addicting, it gives several options to play daily to earn coins & diamonds so I could continue to play without emptying my pockets. So far the best app game play I ever played. Highly recommended to everyone. Thanks.

This us a really fun game but after level 15 in the first restaurant you no longer get diamonds. Thus making it impossible to go to next level. Paying to spin the wheel gives you the same thing over and over-$100. I think I got 3 diamonds 1 time even though I used up 1500 points. If you play, be ready to pay and pay big in order to enjoy this cute game.
I am a fan but it seems you no longer update new levels. I had done all levels with still many diamonds to spare. Probably I need to move on.

It's a great game. Just a suggestion if you don't add gems in the upgradation of the kitchen equipment that would be great. Gems can substitute coins if they are less. All in all it's great. I love the graphics.

title: Restaurant Mania
description:
You love cooking? Then cook delicious meals and desserts for your customers in Restaurant Mania which is an addictive and time-management game!
You can practice your cooking skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques to become a perfect chef game winner and take Restaurant Mania to the next level. Use lot of ingredients to cook several tasty dishes. Take command of the kitchen and demonstrate the skills of a master chef. Start with burgers and cold drinks and work your way to becoming the best known Restaurant Mania outlet in the city! Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and ice maker to pizza ovens and burger makers! Sharpen your skill as you prepare, cook, assemble and serve delicious menu items in each exotic Restaurant Mania. Control the fast-paced chaos as you dash your way around the kitchen, preparing meals for crazy customers! Collect tons of tips for excellent service and make those profits! In this 2017 Restaurant Mania you will get everything that you are looking in a kitchen game or restaurant game. You can cook for multiple customers at a single time to improve your cooking skills within your café or restaurant. So get ready to create your own story of Restaurant Mania.
Upgrade your kitchen with variety of dishes to serve and cook fast in Restaurant Mania so that you won’t get any fever while cooking in this cooking game.
Hit it to become best chef in town who can cook delicious meals for their café customer and rollover all other burger games or pizza games with this Restaurant Mania cooking game.

Features:
* lots of dishes to cook using multiple ingredients in Restaurant Mania
* unique locations to cook Fast-Food, Chinese, Pizza, burger, coffee, Ice Cream Shop and a lot more.
* Hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior
*upgrade kitchen appliances in Restaurant Mania to cook and serve faster
*Unlock more difficult levels as you proceed towards perfection of cooking in Restaurant Mania .

title: Food Fever - Kitchen Restaurant & Cooking Games
description:
Food Fever - Kitchen Food Restaurant & Cooking Games is a new cooking games for girls & the new craze in the restaurant genre!Upgrade your kitchen & serve your customers in this food maker games!Learn how to cook new recipes like chicken tasty with french fries & chips!You will learn from Chef World how to cook tasty dishes & meals!You will test out oriental restaurant,chinese restaurant,italian restaurant & improve your cook skills by playing this new fast food games for girls!The fever of cooking will get you going!You will learn to serve on the street food & cook like mama delicious meals,dish and desserts from every country in the world!

This fast food maker is one of the best top chef games & restaurant games for girls with tons of levels to finish!You will get free recipes & you will have to complete 4 restaurants!Get ready to learn delicious american pie & dessert from an original free recipe!Learn to cook best donuts, cheesecake & brownies in town!If you want to make something tasty, you will create vanilla cream or chocolate cream & little fruit cakes!The fever of cooking will get you going in this pizza maker game & popcorn maker!Fried, baked or grilled, the Pork will be delicious!We will also cover the fresh seafood & sushi dishes as well & the real italian dish!

The grill restaurant is the best, you will serve burgers,sausages, hotdogs & learn to fry all of them!The best burger is created with ketchup, mayonnaise and a pinch of mustard!The fried chicken taste & crispy good chicken are in high demand, use the lemons provided to make a white sauce with garlic & sour cream & maybe milk.Your mama is cooking & helping you along the way & make vegetables with olive oil!In this challenge, you will need to grill beef ribs & pork with stew or chicken parmesan.This restaurant will also teach you to Cook customers breakfast, lunch, dinner and more!

Build your italian restaurant & we'll teach you how to make pizza & spaghetti recipes!Pasta Bolognese,Carbonara & Arrabiata are our forte & tortellini are the best in the business!We have various types of pizza like pepperoni, pizza with champignon Mushrooms & pinapple pizza & the hot chili peppers pizza.

Features:
- 4 Restaurants with tasty food!
- 140+ Levels with free recipes
- Best free cooking gameplay!
- Serve your hungry customers!

🔥NEW COOKING GAMES FOR GIRLS 2020 🔥 and CHEF GAMES for all the TASTY FOOD lovers!🍔🍟 TAP fast to COOK and SERVE in this girls games!If you play the COOKING joy,  will become the MASTER CHEF girls games, live the cooking madness of TIME MANAGEMENT GAMES. Open RESTAURANTS all over the world and become a CRAZY CHEF! 👩🏻‍🍳👩‍🍳👩🏽‍🍳👩🏾‍🍳👩🏿‍🍳

The bakery challenge will cover cookies, banana split dessert & banana smoothie.We didn't miss out the macaroons & donuts!The story behind the bakery is that Once upon a time, there was a noob baker whose dream became true one day, he cooked the most amazing cupcakes & everybody loved them!

We're fans of the indian cuisine, it's very complex & we adore the Chicken Curry at the base of indian food!Be the first to learn to prepare tasty Samosa with some Tandori chicken. Naan bread or tortilla for dinner is a must in this cuisine!Chole Chickpea Curry or Palak Paneer spinach and cottage cheese are good for everybody & it's a easy & delicious lunch.

Chinese restaurant was always the hardest one! Did you know that Shrimps with Broccoli in Garlic Sauce for dinner is the main course in this country? Also, did you know that Fried Rice with soya sauce has the best complex carbohydrates?Japanese sushi shouldn't be forgotten!Tempura and Sashimi Sushi are great with a hot bowl of Ramen or Makizushi will make your day! Make sure your sushi rice is cooked with wasabi and soya sauce to perfectly season the food!

Play our free cooking games & download Food Fever - Kitchen Restaurant & Cooking Games today!

comments: I really liked this game its very cute but there are ads coming out which disturbs me then i deleted the game then downloaded it again then idk with my self if i liked it or not i prefer liking it so i gave a 5-star rating Thank you for reading this hope have a good day later,soon,today, or tomorrow Good bye

1. I can't get past 11th level due to ads. The ads are literally interrupting the game at the end shortening your time. 2. I have so many coins but I can't upgrade anything as it only wants diamonds, which are hard to get. 3. Basically the developers purposely make it almost impossible to win at some point so you are forced to pay for diamonds.

So far so good. There's not too many ads. The game is really fun. I was skeptical about microtransactions at first but then read a comment that suggested the slot machine which is actually great for getting diamonds without paying real money or worrying about pay walls! My only suggestion is the timing of the ads is a bit awkward other than that this game is great. highly suggest it!

Can't get passed levels 14 and 15 as adverts keep cutting me off when I have over a limit left in the game. It's happened loads today. Shame.i was enjoying the game. I can't play no more as there's no point if I'm going to be cut off by adverts. I won't delete game yet. If not fixed then I'll have too.

I LOVE this game! The graphics are great, game is alot of fun and overall very addicting! I got thru whole game w/o having to spend any money, u can watch ads to get 2 gems at a time or play slot machine that really does give gems(not rigged for once)! Cant wait for more places!DEVELOPERS: GREAT JOB ON THE GAME BUT.. THE HAMBURGER PLACE/ IMPOSSIBLE TO GET 3 STARS IN LAST 5 LEVELS WITH EVERYTHING UPGRADED+ALL CUSTOMERS SERVED ALSO DECORATIONS R UPGRADED BUT STILL SAYS GOAL IS NOT MET! PLEASE FIX!

title: Chef Town: Cooking Simulation
description:
What’s that in your hand? 
It’s the keys to your very own restaurant! 👩‍🍳 🌮🍳🍅🍕👨‍🍳
Can you become the master of the kitchen in this feverishly fun time-management game? Put your apron on, don that chef hat, and get cooking! 
Fill your garden with only the best ingredients and watch as customers flock to your restaurant as you serve them hundreds of unique, tasty meals. 🥕

💫Your cooking tale has only begun!💫

FEATURES:

🍽️PREPARE TASTY FOOD🍽️
Unlock hundreds of tasty meals to serve to your patrons! Keep that kitchen running to serve the freshest food to your customers!

👩🏻‍🍳RISE TO CHEF STARDOM👩🏻‍🍳
Build your reputation and become a cooking star! Discover more and more delicious meals and the most extravagant food as you progress in your quest to become a 5-star chef!

🎈DESIGN AND DECORATE🎈
Your restaurant is truly your own - whether you want to create a sleek 5-star look or a cozy cafe, the choice is yours!

🤝PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS🤝
Everyone’s got that restaurant fever! Visit your friends and community members! You’ll discover the cutest cafes and awesome restaurants!

🤩EXCITING EVENTS🤩
There’s always something new in Chef Town! Enjoy special seasonal decorations, ingredients, and meals to immerse yourself in the fever of the current season!

🏅COMPETITIONS🏅
Put your cooking and time-management skills to the test in special cooking competitions! Become the best chef in town and prove your food’s worth!

Are you ready to tell your very own cooking tale? 
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Do you feel up to the challenge of becoming a world-famous 5-star chef? ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
You can do it!
 Your restaurant is waiting for you! 
Welcome to Chef Town!

Your restaurant is truly your own - whether you want to create a sleek 5-star look or a cozy cafe, the choice is yours!

🤝PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS🤝
Everyone’s got that restaurant fever! Visit your friends and community members! You’ll discover the cutest cafes and awesome restaurants!

🤩EXCITING EVENTS🤩
There’s always something new in Chef Town! Enjoy special seasonal decorations, ingredients, and meals to immerse yourself in the fever of the current season!

🏅COMPETITIONS🏅
Put your cooking and time-management skills to the test in special cooking competitions! Become the best chef in town and prove your food’s worth!

Are you ready to tell your very own cooking tale?
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Do you feel up to the challenge of becoming a world-famous 5-star chef? ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
You can do it!
Your restaurant is waiting for you!
Welcome to Chef Town!

comments: This game have potential. But it' have the slowest making progress chef games I have played. How can it take 17 hours just to produce coffee and 14 hours to produce a smoothie? Visting the community is basically impossible because there is always a problem loading ! Take away orders is hours apart so making progress through that is also not working! Thank you but no thank you.

Love this game, so far! Will uninstall it if food gets ruined on the stoves, love the fact that that doesn't happen! This game needs to UPDATE! Can't even visit Community Friends in the game! PLEASE UPDATE THIS GAME!!! 9-3-2020 The game keeps stopping! Why? Why? Why? The game still won't let me visit Community Friends! I love this game, but sorry to see so many problems with it! I put the game on my phone, have to start from scratch! Please Help!!!

Not bad kinda reminds me of (chefville) back in the day. This game has some errors, like crashing and not loading community. It always says unable to load community or update your game, Very annoying. If this keeps up I'm uninstalling this game not worth it. Update..Does anyone play this game anymore? The friends I add dont visit. What's the point of having friends. What exactly is power for when liking their tables or whatever good for?

I've been playing this game since it game out. However I'm very disappointed that I can't hook up my game to a new device. You'd think it would be very simple like other games that have been carried over. Instead of starting all over. Therefore my review is a 3. Still play it, but not like I use too.

Having to start completely over because somehow my game wasn't saved. They did compensate me for the money I spent last time. Will be awhile before I get to where I was before. Update: got another phone. Guess what!? Again I cannot get my saved game loaded. They will however compensate me again if I start completely over! NO WAY. I don't have this problem with other games, i.e. hay day, homescapes, etc. Done. Been playing for years. Too bad. Put a lot of money in this game. Hasn't been upgraded.

title: Super Cooking - Amazing Chefs
description:
Be an Amazing Chef in Super Cooking Game – a Fun Packed Free, highly addictive time-management cooking game! 🍔🧀🍕🍳☕🍪 👩‍🍳🏪

Very delicious meals are waiting to be served to your customers in your virtual restaurant. Try out your cooking skills to beat this challenge with madness as if you are a master chef👨‍🍳. Oh, it's a fever to reach new levels in your cooking business. Discover new crazy and surprising stuff on the way to become the best chef as your cooking and management skills are improving.

This Fun-Filled, Free Digital Cooking Game will let you take part in the best cooking experience. Cooking, grilling and baking were never so thrilling. With the help of efficient and modern kitchen equipment; you can make burgers, bake sweet and savoury bakery items, brew hot coffee or serve highly flavoured sauces. You will always have a chance to upgrade the kitchen and add more items to the menu.

This game provides every chance to try your cooking skills and improve them continuously to be the chef you always have wanted to be. Along with the fun, the fast-paced 🚀game is the best platform to teach time management ⏰and cooking skills required to satisfy hungry customers. This cooking game has never-ending madness; it will always keep on challenging you.💯

Here are the unique features of the game:

•	To enjoy the super cooking experience you don’t need to pay, it’s for free!
•	No limit of time and place: once you have downloaded the game, you will 
        not need Wi-Fi
•	Just tap to cook and serve a variety of dishes
•	Use different cooking techniques to get the best results
•	Cook, bake or grill delicious dishes
•	Complete special tasks and earn more
•	Learn to use a variety of ingredients to get the best results
•	Try out different kitchen services and equipment to earn a score
•	Learn time management, with the help of fast-paced challenges
•	Avail opportunities to satisfy hungry customers
•	Earn coins, gems and other bonuses 
•	Upgrade & improve your kitchen and Levels to be an Amazing Chef!
•	Show off your best cooking skills and earn great tips and get combos.
•	Earn enough cards to unlock new restaurants.

Always be vigilant and keep an eye on updates.

By downloading the Super Cooking-Amazing Chef, you are agreeing to the following terms of use: https://devtro.blogspot.com/p/privacy-policy-devtro11s-built-super.html

title: Tasty
description:
Meet your new cooking coach! Over 3000 Tasty recipes now at your fingertips; an all-new Step-By-Step instruction mode; ‘My Recipes’ page which serves as your very own mobile cookbook, and an innovative Search tool that allows you to filter by any ingredients, cuisine and social occasion you’re in the mood for! 

FEATURES:
- Get step-by-step instructions on how to cook every single recipe. We’ll even keep your phone awake so you don’t have to worry about it falling asleep while you cook. 
- Watch the latest videos from Tasty before your friends do. 
- Get recommendations for your next meal based on the time of day, day of the week, and major holidays.
- Vegetarian? Personalize the app to automatically hide all recipes with meat! (Don’t worry, you can always change this later)
- Search recipes by social plans, ingredients, dietary needs, difficulty, speed, cuisine, and more.
- Filter by what matters to you like vegan, gluten-free, low carb, healthy, and comfort food to name a few. 
- Add recipes to your Tasty likes to save them for later.
- Live outside of the US? We have metric values side-by-side with US measurements for every recipe!

If you have any trouble with your app please email us at support@buzzfeed.com so we can help!

And don’t forget to check out Tasty on Facebook!

Please note: 
This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy  for more information.

If you’d like to delete your tasty.co account, log in and go to the user settings menu, then tap Delete User. Deleting your account will irreversibly delete all account information, including saved recipes and tips.  This will not unsubscribe you from any email lists you’ve signed up for; to unsubscribe, please follow the instructions at the bottom of the email.  This will not delete your account on other BuzzFeed platforms.  To delete your other accounts, please go to those platforms.

recentChanges: Just the usual tweaks and fixes to make your Tasty experience even better!
comments: It's a great and helpful app and the recipes are great too. My only concern is that I can't find the regular recipe for something. For example, I wanna make cupcakes but I can't find a regular recipe. They are all kinda like alternatives. Like "s'mores cupcakes" "stuffed cupcakes" "cinnamon roll cupcakes". That's my one and only concern for the app.

I love this app, I only have one tiny issue that doesn't really affect anything. When you click 'I made this!' it does what it usually does after then adds it to the things you've made. But after you leave that particular recipe and go back into it the button goes back to 'I made this!'. It doesn't remove the recipe from ones you've made, all that happens is the button changes.

Tasty gives step by step instructions to make their delicious recipes, and it is so fun to try new dishes and foods! I love it! 😀❤ One thing that l liked that they changed pretty recently was being able to swipe right from the recipe and go to the next one. Now l have to go back and touch the next recipe. Its just a little more annoying.

Love this app!! The daily recipe ideas are great, I have used it when I just don't know what to eat and can look through the many recipes I've saved, which is also an excellent feature. Actually can't imagine being without it!

Definitely a great app Got a lot of cool recipes But can do a bit better Maybe add some really diverse cuisines But other than that it great and really easy to use and really handy But I would like to suggest a feature if you don't mind You could a self customisable food list like a song playlist

title: Choke Canyon Lake Offline GPS Fishing Charts
description:
Flytomap is a valid and interesting alternative,
Featured on the Deck
Featured on Geomedia

Choke Canyon Lake coverage resident in the app. It works WITHOUT mobile coverage! 

Worldwide Marine and Outdoor Maps available when connected, thanks to viewer.flytomap.com
Worldwide Satellite images overlay on charts 
Worldwide Terrain features overlay on charts, thanks to Open Street Map, Open Cycle Map, Bing,Earth,GMap,topo maps by ESRI

Now with NOAA raster charts seamless with continuous updates from the official Government server

Now with ActiveCaptain - Worldwide boaters community * 200.000 + Captains

Use to Explore: 
√ Latitudes and Longitudes to go to your favorite places 
√ Search your Favorite points directly 
√ Zoom, Rotate and Pan fast just by a finger touch
√ Local Marine Weather forecast at a tap
√ Route with unlimited waypoints
√ With Head Up and Course Up feature  
√ Geocompass 
√ Navigate and see your GPS position on the map 
√ Heading Vector Towards the direction movement 
√ Distance Measurement Tool to easily calculate the distance from one location to another 
√ Insert the target and destination and see in real time your speed, distance and bearing 
√ background mode - Flytomap works in background as well, you can swap with another app and receive/make calls send sms while panning and zooming.
√ Unlimited Tracks share via email, visible on Google, Flytomap Viewer, KMZ format - Store your track without the need of cellular data or mobile signal
√ Optimized battery usage

√ ActiveCaptain
•	View and contribute to the best boaters community available in the world 
•	Continuous update of all info (including reviews from the deck) about :
•	Marinas
•	Anchorages
•	Hazards
•	Local Knowledge

√ And so much more to come - It’s the only app you will ever need! Our charts are installed on: GARMIN NAVICO LOWRANCE B&G NORTHSTAR EAGLE SIMRAD

Follow us:

▶Twitter        @flytomap

▶Web Site      flytomap.com
 
▶Web App      viewer.flytomap.com

▶Facebook     facebook.com/flytomap

The entire cartography of Choke Canyon Lake is included in this application

Flytomap is committed to constant improvement, this App is developed with the help of professional boaters to get the best experience on the sea, we listen to our users and systematically add the most requested features. 
Thank you for the feedback!

Additional info about Flytomap product

FLYTOMAP LAKE MAPS:

We offer high quality lake maps with detailed information and important features compressed to assure the larger coverage in USA region. Lake maps contain most important DNR lakes with detailed ‘Depth Contours, Boat Ramps, Fishing spots etc. Also includes Trails, Roads and Railways information.

WATER MAPS (Marine): 

Water map navigator is the new ‘Marine Navigator for all mobile devices contains embedded Electronic Nautical Charts (ENC) from NOAA compressed to a large coverage.You can now download the application and transform your Phone in a chart plotter with best NOAA, ENC S57 cartography; which includes Anchoring areas, Fishing areas,restriction areas, obstructions, rocks, Buoys, Beacon, Lights, Depth contour with Values display on map, Spot Sounding and more. The only marine app’s available in the market with such huge information. Every effort is made to be as accurate as possible when presenting information for every destination. 
 
TRAVEL MAPS:

These Maps treat you mostly with information of both Marine and terrain correspondingly. These are the most preferable Maps to travel especially for fascinating recreational voyages, map focus the best Beach spots along the Coast line, Major ports, Sailing, Fishing, Picnic areas, Parks, Hiking, Biking, Clubs, restaurants,Famous Hotels, Museums, Shopping areas, and much more. Introducing guide in map navigator for easy references, you can use it without any Active Internet connection

“We work to delight your moments”
! Enjoy great Journeys!

title: My Pasta Shop - Italian Restaurant Cooking Game
description:
Pasta shop, trattoria, cantina: call it what you want, as long as you serve delicious food!

Open your own Italian restaurant and be fast to manage your clients’ orders and cook all kinds of juicy pasta!

Serve perfectly al dente noodles and many other tasty and typically Italian dishes, using several fresh ingredients to make clients feel as if they’re tasting authentic Italian mamma’s cooking! 

Cook fast like a chef and keep your clients happy so they’ll never want to go shopping for instant mac’n’cheese again!

HIGHLIGHTS

🍝DASH to cook and serve delicious italian food to every customer in 100 thrilling levels! Be quick to keep everyone happy and satisfied with your cooking!

🍝COOK with many kinds of ingredients, from creamy cheeses to fresh vegetables and spices, and serve the most authentic italian dishes in town!

🍝CUSTOMIZE your Pasta Shop with different items and decorations to create that perfect italian trattoria mood!

🍝UPGRADE your kitchen with different appliances and machines and expand your restaurant’s menu! 

🍝GROW your business and see more and more customers coming to your restaurant as you beat more levels and get ready for spicier challenges!

Carbonara, spaghetti bolognese, lasagna...you can make so many incredibly delicious variations of pasta that it’s hard to know where to start!

Show off your chef-level cooking and managing skills by turning your little cantina into a famous Italian restaurant, with a well-equipped kitchen and the most authentic neapolitan ambiance!

Provide a satisfying experience for every customer and see your pasta shop’s fame spread all over! Make you macaroni the talk of the town and earn tons of cash!

Open your Italian Pasta Shop now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: Great game! Especially as a Italian American! Love it! Yet I donot like all the idiotic pop ups and having to wait too long to upgrade the cooking pots! Or more speed on the appliances to keepup with the levels.
Rubbish game, really slow, unable to upgrade items of your choice, ads before new level and after levels.

Every time I have to raise my fingers to give order and accessibility is also not good it is very tiery game

The overall game is good. The flow is nice, although the response when tapping items is too slow which makes you lose points or burn food. And why can you store plates of spaghetti but not ravioli or breadsticks? If you can't store it, the ravioli should not burn. I agree with other reviewers, the food should tap out to customers, not a combination of tap and pass. It's too time consuming. Overall I enjoyed it.

title: Baby Panda's Cooking Restaurant
description:
Search for "BabyBus" for even more free panda games for you to try! 

Become a little chef, manage a restaurant and cook delicious food for guests! 
Make coffee and hot milk; cook fried chicken and bake egg tarts. 
It's time for breakfast! What are you waiting for? Start your cooking journey and discover your cooking talent! 

Make mashed potatoes
Can you make mashed potatoes? Boil the potatoes. Then peel and mash them. The mashed potatoes are complete! Wait! Don't forget to sprinkle peppers on the mashed potatoes for a more delicious flavor! Scoop out the mashed potatoes and serve them to the guests. Observe secretly for any interesting response from the guests. 

Cook chicken roll
Cut the chicken, cover it with flour and breadcrumbs, and deep fry until it's golden yellow. Then serve with lettuce, carrot, and cucumber. Also be sure to spread with sweet cream and the chicken roll is ready! Wow! It looks yummy. You are an amazing chef! 

Bake egg tarts
Baking egg tarts is not that easy. Give it a try and see if you can do it. Pour in milk and flour. Add eggs, stir egg tart mixture, and put it in the oven. Wait for the egg tarts to be ready! Watch the time so it won't get burned! Countdown 3, 2, 1. Time is up. Get the egg tarts out! 

Squeeze juice
Which fruit do you like? Watermelon? Apple? Or orange? Hey! Why not DIY a glass of mixed juice with your creativity! Scoop out the watermelon, cut the apple, and put them into the juicer. Press the button to start the machine. Let's start making juice! 

Here, you can also make stuffed buns, soy milk, fried dough sticks, and other food. Come and manage your own restaurant. Try to cook more delicious food to satisfy your guests' taste! 

Features: 
- Cook more than 10 kinds of delicious food: chicken roll, ham, coffee, egg tarts, and more!
- More than 30 ingredients to choose from: eggs, breadcrumbs, coffee beans, and more! 
- 5 kinds of fruit: apple, watermelon, orange, grapes, and pear!

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      
—————
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza
description:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest cooking game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your restuarant open. Upgrade your restaurant with new toppings, decor and kitchen equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

🍕 Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
🍕 Over 100 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
🍕 Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
🍕 Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.

Download and start pizza making now!

comments: This game is quite addicting and straight forward! The ads are not too much like other games! The characters and items are so adorable! But sometimes the game can be difficult because you need to put toppings in exactly the right places or you'll lose. It's kinda hard to do the half pizza stuff because that's where that stuff comes in. If you could do something to make it easier for us I'd definitely rate the game 5 stars. Apart from that it's a good game! 😁

The gameplay is amooth and fun.. I would have given it a four and half but no power there.. Read in why is that when you're making the pizza, every swipe of the sauce or topping is dedicated from your profit and a whole lot.. So I may end up making crappy pizza because I can't afford to put too much.. Other thing maybe you could give is side games that could help us make more money for the shop that I can afford to get upgrades and not permanently shut down.. Otherwise the game itself is fun

Loo, this is a nice game & I really liked the customers, music, and all. But only one problem is there. That is, there is no ads available. I mean by, when we lose game, there we can see a option - watch an ad for 20 rupees. But when we click that you say no ads available. So I played the day 4 so many times but always I lose. I think if there is an ad is available, then I can win the level. If you solve this problem that will be very better. Only for this problem, l'm giving 3 stars only.

Game is really good and fun. I feel like it has well placed ads and not too many for a free game. I do think developers should take a look at some of the requests vs deliverables for the pizzas. sometimes they'll ask for a pizza (like pepperoni and mushrooms) and then yell at me for not adding bell peppers. the most recent one was the girl who calls you "fam". I mean it may not be a bug. it may just be simulation real jerk customers haha

Amazing game, no ads unless you choose to watch them, and no pay to win! Although, it would be cool to be able to submit new dialogue! Also, I feel like there should be a tutorial for multi-ingredient pizzas, since I thought it meant half and half and kept getting compliants saying "These ingredients should be spread more evenly". I had to watch a YouTube tutorial to figure that out ' -'

title: Cookbook Master - Master Your Chef Skills!
description:
Making food was never this fun... until now! Make way for the best of all chef cooking games:
Do you like cooking, baking and making delicious food? Well, Cookbook Master is the perfect game for you! Start cooking all kinds of recipes in your own kitchen and become a culinary master. The best of all food games is here and free for yout to start playing right now!
Be a real chef with great cooking skills in your own restaurant game! You can try all sorts of recipes in your way to culinary expertise in Cookbook Master - from salads, to baking - it's all here! It's just the start of a rising super chef towards full glory!
Go pro with more than 30 cooking and baking recipes to make only the best come out of your kitchen and be served in your very own restaurant. From salads to desserts, cakes to pies and much, much more, Cookbook Master is by far the most complete cooking game!
Try our more than 40 different ingredients to bring more flavor, that special "humpf!", to every recipe you make! Your kitchen, your rules - just choose a recipe to make and go full pro on it!
Cool, right? So, it's time to get those ideas you've been cooking in there, and start cooking them in here! Download Cookbook Master now, for free, and begin your chef road to success!

I have played this game before but ya also now I am playing but the change I want is that mixing something always goes wrong so it becomes bad which effects our result I have tried a many of times that let me have prefect or great or even ok but it never comes so change it or update
It's a brilliant game but all I can complain about is that there are too many ads ,never the less I love the game that is why I gave you five stars🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

title: Restaurant Empire : Kitchen Chef Food Cooking Game
description:
Do you love cooking? Do you have a craze of playing free cooking games? Then welcome to the Restaurant Empire : Kitchen Chef Food Cooking Game. Dash into the madness, craze and fun created by Restaurant Empire : Kitchen Chef Food Cooking Game that will provide a challenge for even the master chef of restaurant games. Restaurant Empire : Kitchen Chef Food Cooking Game is a food kitchen craze chef cooking game that tests your tasty food cooking skills, time management & serving skills so as to serve the hungry customers & make them happy. Cook tasty food and desserts from all over the world for your customers in restaurant kitchen game. Wear apron and get ready to cook some tasty meal in this restaurant fever cooking games. So kitchen chef take command of the cooking games and demonstrate the madness of a crazy chef in food games. Choose the right ingredients & cook tasty meal according to your customer’s choice otherwise you’ll have to throw tasty meal in the trash. 

Restaurant Empire : Kitchen Chef Food Cooking Game is an addictive time management kitchen chef restaurant games where you set off to play master chef games in restaurant by providing speedy service and cooking tasty food in restaurant games. Dash from restaurant to restaurant and spread the feverish kitchen chef cooking games craze, something a restaurant games would let you cook in food games. Cook tons of fabulous cuisines & serve customers who visit your fun restaurant chef games with delici food. Meet unique diner who visit your  cooking empire, serve and delight them with delicious food in order to win popularity and earn big tips. Start your crazy chef games madness adventure in the kitchen games, use various ingredients to cook food with amazing recipes like spicy hamburgers, seafood, spaghetti, steaks, cola etc. You can cook food for multiple customers at same time in kitchen games to improve cooking & time management skills. 

Restaurant Empire : Kitchen Chef Food Cooking Game teaches you how to cook tasty food and manage your own cooking empire and become a true master chef in kitchen cooking world! Decorate your cooking empire kitchen to attract more hungry customers. By cooking delicious & tasty cuisine, please customers and make foodie paradise in food games. In the world of master chef restaurant game experience serve exotic flavors all over the world with crazy cooking chef games. Bake, cook, and grill meet unique customers, serve and delight them with your tasty meal, and earn Coins and Tips in free cooking games. Upgrade kitchen games appliances & produce an even greater variety of dishes & tasty cuisine with kitchen games utensils. Decorate your cooking empire kitchen to attract more hungry customers.

Exciting & challenging 100s of Levels, so you won't get bored in time management kitchen game! Get ready to become the best cooking crazy chef in every kitchen that this game has to offer! Give yourself real kitchen cooking challenge of crazy kitchen cooking games in diner dash. So don't waste any time, download now and start cooking simulation and baking a variety of tasty food for breakfast, lunch & dinner in this new crazy kitchen game! Remember don’t let the diner get angry at their food orders. So crazy chef! get ready for a new kitchen story with an ultimate kitchen fever in food games.

Features:

• Bake, grill, and serve food by using simple TAP.
• Apply the useful boosts to get help in the hard level.
• Exciting Free cooking game with many fancy restaurants.
• Many Fun and Challenging Levels where you can cook your craze off.
• It is a FREE offline game, No wifi is required to play this cooking game.
• Unlock New Restaurants that pushes your Cooking Dreams to the next level.
• Practice time management kitchen game skills in a variety of cooking world techniques.
• Upgrade your Kitchen Appliances to speed up the food line and to Level Up & become a Super Chef!

title: SOS Respira
description: An obstruction of the airway caused by a foreign body or by choking occurs when a piece of food or an object becomes accidentally trapped in the respiratory tracts, preventing air from reaching the lungs. Early recognition of the situation and prompt action by those nearby can prevent the victim from suffocating and avoid a fatal outcome. Choking is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment. With the SOSrespira app you will learn how to identify and deal with a foreign body obstructing the airway in victims of all ages (adults, children and infants).  SOSrespira uses videos and diagrams to provide you with a simple guide to learning the correct sequence of actions and maneuvers to resolve cases of choking.  SOSrespira is based on the latest International Guidelines for Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation issued by the   European Resuscitation Council (ERC) and the American Heart Association (AHA), published in October 2015.  SOSrespira could be especially useful for parents, carers and anybody working in the hospitality industry, senior citizen and education centers, all environments in which there is a greater possiblity of witnessing someone choking. Healthcare professionals and teachers can also use it as a support tool in their classes.  This theoretical knowledge is no substitute for appropriate and regular practical training in Life Support, but it could help you to save lives.  This initiative forms part of the accident prevention programs promoted and led by FUNDACIÓN MAPFRE. SOSrespira was designed by specialists associated with the Spanish Society of Emergency Medicine (SEMES) and Fundación Mapfre. It is endorsed by the Spanish Council of Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CERCP) and the Spanish Society of Emergency Medicine (SEMES).

It is endorsed by the Spanish Council of Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CERCP) and the Spanish Society of Emergency Medicine (SEMES).

comments: My mother inlaw is alive because I used this app in advance!!

title: Fantastic Chefs: Match 'n Cook
description:
Start playing Fantastic Chefs, Google Play Best of 2018 – a quirky cooking puzzle game with exciting 560+ puzzles now! 

Bob needs your help to cook tasty dishes in this exciting puzzle matching adventure! Travel the world building a crew and matching as many ingredients as you can in this puzzle matching game. 

Help Bob, Leo and Grumpy Granny and many more chefs cook delicious dishes as they travel the world matching ingredients from sandy shores of Tropical Paradise to the evergreen beauty of Charming Countryside. Solve the puzzles to cook tasty treats, complete levels and earn Chef Badges. Use power ups and blast your way through obstacles and the mischievous rat!

Game features:
• Hundreds of puzzle levels to play – add more chefs along the way
• Your chef crew will help you blast through levels
• Powerful boosters to help you pass those tricky levels
• Watch Bob doing his happy dance when you win levels
• Special cooking power-ups to help you cook dishes.
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet.
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors
• One of the most popular mobile cooking game.

Are you ready, Chef? Grab your Chef Hat and travel map, a puzzle adventure filled with fantastic fun awaits you!

comments: Well just getting started on level 19 only . I'm wishing already that if you join a group you should be able to do more than send a life you know like scores add to the group gifts or something? Not sure what else I will come back and reassess..ohhhhh there's no annoying ads so freaking high five to you for that! Maybe work on the group thing love to change it to 5stars
Love the graphics it's a great game it keeps you busy love the characters it gets harder as you go on but I give it five stars
Easy and nice game to play. No annoying ads come and go. Thumbs up!

I liked it a lot. The presentation of ingredients is cute and discovery of new chefs is enjoyable. Very easy controls. All age groups can enjoy it. It is neither too easy or too complex. Rewards are also timely. Unlike other games which force the players to use some coins or stars, it is not forcing us to do. Wheel provision to get surprise rewards and gifts like 3 hearts etc made me like this game a lot.q

It's one of those games where you have to try the level a few times before it let's you beat it. Really annoying actually. I've given it a month before I left my review but it's your typical, pass levels easy then it makes so you'll get to the last thing you need to burst and you'll have no lives. Give it a go but you'll soon see what I mean. Shame its a fun little game. Unistalling, sorry guys, but you've made it really obvious what your doing.

title: Little Panda's Restaurant
description:
The crispy chocolate cookies attracted many diners to the Little Panda’s Restaurant. Just one bite they will never forget it’s taste! Wanna be a world-class chef? Start right here! Get creative and cook the most delicious desserts and dishes that you don’t usually see every day! 

INTERNATIONAL MENU
The menu of Little Panda’s Restaurant illustrates over 20 desserts and dishes from different cultures including barbecue, spring roll, chocolate cookies, sandwich, sushi, cheesecake, and more! Here, you can unleash your cooking talent and make dishes whatever you want! 

COOKING FUN
The dishes in Little Panda’s Restaurant are extremely easy to cook. Pick any ingredient and cook it in your own way. Slice, mix, boil, fry or bake in a simple touch! Express your cooking creativity and discover your passion for food here!

RESTAURANT SERVING
Learn to run your own restaurant, introduce special dishes to your diners, serve their order as they want! Help others and earn coins to unlock more dishes and desserts!

FEATURES:
- Wide variety of recipes to choose from! 
- Beef, mushroom, eggs...mix and match to satisfy your guests.
- Wok, blender, oven... little panda’s restaurant has all the equipment you need. 
- Chili powder, seafood sauce...various seasonings to stimulate your taste buds. 
- Manage restaurant, serve the dish to make money and level up to unlock more dishes!

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 400 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have released over 200 children's educational apps, over 2500 episodes of nursery rhymes and animations of various themes spanning the Health, Language, Society, Science, Art and other fields.

—————
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

comments: I really like this game very much, as a matter of fact, I like all the baby panda games. Well not all- but almost all are very nice and interesting. I love cooking very much. But sadly, my mum never let's me come into the kicthen afraid that I might break something and all that,very unfair! Chef life : Crazy Restaurant Madness Cooking Games is an addictive time management crazy chef kitchen game where you set off to play master chef games in restaurant by providing speedy service and cooking delicious food in restaurants game. Start your chef games madness adventure in the kitchen games, use various ingredients to cook food with amazing recipes like spicy hamburgers, seafood, spaghetti, steaks, cola etc. Chef life : Crazy Restaurant Madness Cooking Games is a new addictive time management restaurant fever cooking games that features endless play. By cooking delicious & tasty cuisine, please customers and make foodie paradise in this food game. title: Cooking Cafe - Patiala Babes : Restaurant Game
description:
Join Patiala Babes on an adventure of restaurant business in Patiala Babes : Cooking Café game! Create your own aspiring chef celebrity and rise to fame and fortune! 

Babita, a gritty and determined woman who has a hard time overcoming self-doubt informed by years of being in an oppressive marriage and her fearless daughter, Mini, who encourages her traditional mother to realize her worth and fulfill her restaurant business dreams. 

Help babes, start and run her own business to become a high rated master tycoon chef in the field of cooking and dash from location to location, serving food to customers and learning new cooking skills.

Cooking Café – Patiala Babes is a beautiful cooking and restaurant simulation game that tests your time and resource management skills. Cook delicious meals, serve hot coffee and expand restaurant business. Keep customers happy to grab those extra tips and earn money to buy restaurants all over the world café and become world’s Tycoon Chef. Cooking Café is fast-paced cooking and catering game. 

Cooking Cafe is an addictive bakery & restaurant story game where you set off to help chef Babes open a classy cafe and serve her guests delicious foods and baked goods. Patiala babes – cooking café takes you on a cooking journey like never before. 

Cooking tycoon cafe is a fun cooking scramble game where you own your food court, decorate it beautifully, hire chef to cook food and serve customers as quick as possible to earn maximum profits. It’s by far the best Restaurant paradise cooking Simulation game ever! Play this kitchen game, cook and serve delicious food as a top chef and put your time-management skills to test!

Write your own restaurant dairy in cooking cafe today. 

COOKING CAFE FEATURES:

❤ Build Your Restaurants!
~ Restaurant management means you’re in charge! Create and maintain multiple cafe, restaurant or dinner layouts to promote your business

❤ Cook delicious food!
~ Unlock several new fun recipes as you progress in the game.
~ Prepare delicious food that customers will love and share. Guests must love your food and service so as to improve cafeteria popularity. Make delicious tasty food Cake, deserts, cookie, coffee, burger & other cuisine ranges from breakfast, lunch and dinner.

❤ Immerse yourself in the vivid graphics! 
~ Delicate graphics will give you the feeling of actually being in the restaurants instead of a cooking game.

❤ Open Cafe worldwide!
~ What are you waiting for to invest your money and open another café world across the globe. 

❤ Improve your appliances 
~ Acquire new machines for your cafeteria, upgrade them and give them maintenance. Ovens, blenders, coffee shops!

Cook delicious meals and prepare fruity drinks! In all the restaurant you’ll find iconic but also special dishes from all over the world. Not to mention the special kitchenware that makes you the greatest waiter or waitress and chef in the cooking business mania. 

Become the superstar cook dash, you’ve always wanted to be! Start cooking, chef!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT CONSUMER INFORMATION:

Cooking cafe respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not allow you share this information.

We do require a few additional Permissions:

1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
These permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content for new kitchen areas / competitors.

2) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
This permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new game content for new cafe world locations / competitors

Cooking cafe is FREE to download and play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money to enhance your gameplay. Game may contain third-party advertisements.

title: Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game
description:
Do you love cooking? Do you have a craze of playing cooking games? Then cook delicious meals and desserts for your customers in Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game. Dash into the madness, craze and fun created by Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game that will provide a challenge for even the master chef of restaurant games. Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game is a FREE cooking game where you set off to play as crazy cooking restaurant chef by providing speedy service in food game to please customers with the most tasty food. Meet unique diner who visit your restaurant, serve and delight them with quality food and speed in order to win popularity and earn big tips. Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world for your customers in restaurant kitchen. 

In Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game, cook tons of tasty cuisines and become a top chef in this addictive time management restaurant game that features endless play. Start your chef games adventure in Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game, use various ingredients to cook delicious dishes with amazing recipes like Donuts, Burgers, sausages, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, French Fries etc. Bake, cook, and grill meet unique customers, serve and delight them with your delicious recipes, and earn Coins and Tips in kitchen games. In the world of master chef cooking game experience serve exotic flavors all over the world with crazy cooking chef games. Upgrade kitchen game appliances & produce an even greater variety of dishes & tasty cuisine with food game utensils. Decorate your new restaurant kitchen to attract more hungry customers. Be the crazy cooking top chef in the world and please your hungry customers in this kitchen game. Make the best cooking strategy that will help you earn big tips so you can unlock exciting food items and kitchen appliances. Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes, in this way you may expand your restaurant chain & you may serve more customer in minimum time.

Chef City : Kitchen Restaurant Cooking Game Features:

• Bake, grill, and serve food by using simple TAP.
• Exciting cooking game with many fancy restaurants
• Many Fun and Challenging Levels where you can cook your craze off
• Unlock New Restaurants that pushes your Cooking Dreams to the next level

title: Sushi House - cooking master
description:
Become a good chef ! An advanced sushi cooker ! Here you can try and learn ! If you are the kind of person that fancy getting to work on some delicious experiments in the kitchen, then this might be just the game for you! a gripping Time Management game with tons of different dishes! Take command of the kitchen and demonstrate the skills of a master chef. Follow the cookbook with real-life recipes and step-by-step instructions!
One of the best cooking games!Sushi House is at your service if you want a break from the routine meals and want something different. Prepare yourself a yummy serving of sushi with the tasty rice, fish and vegetables and flavors of your choice. The chef inside you will love Sushi house and you will learn how to make sushi on the go!

HIGHLIGHTS
• More than 21 ingredients to cook with, like rice,shrimp,abalone,eel,Octopus,salmon,  and more!
• Over 28 recipes to learn and cook!

 GAME SPECIAL
Even though ‘Sushi House’ is a game for kids, it can be used by parents too. Try Pastry Chef’s recipes at home and surprize your kids with their favorite dessert from the game!

Join Sushi House !

title: Masala Madness: Indian Food Truck Cooking Games
description:
Join more than 3 MILLION chefs around the world and unleash the crazy master chef inside you. Show your culinary skills in this FUN and RELAXING fast-paced time management Food Truck Game - Masala Madness!

After the crazy success and amazing love that our first cooking game Masala Express got from you foodies, CYMPL is here presenting a completely different cooking game. No restaurant, no bistro, no bakery but you run your own Food Truck!

Hop on the Food Truck and travel to an amazing adventure with this FREE addictive time-management cooking game! Prepare and serve everyone’s all-time favorite delicious Indian snacks like Vada Pav (Fritters with Bun), Samosa, Pav Bhaji (Veggies with Bun), Idli (Steamed Rice Cake), Chole Bhature, Kulche (Leavened Flat Breads) with beverages like Chai (Tea), Filter Coffee, Lassi and many more! Treat them with Kulfis (Ice Cream), Sheera (Semolina Sweet Dish), Paan and get generously tipped by the happy customers.

Refine your culinary skills and management as you cook and serve delicious Indian menu items across the globe. Decorate your food truck and its surrounding to attract more foodies. Upgrade your cooking appliances to cook fast and serve more portions of dishes at a time. Dash your way around the kitchen and keep up with the rush hour. Master yourself in time management and control the fast-paced chaos as you serve tasty Indian snacks and dishes to crazy impatient customers from all over the world!

Features:
* FREE to Play!
* A fast-paced time management online & offline Indian cooking game!
* Run your own Food Truck restaurant!
* Serve tasty Indian Street Food across the globe!
* 200+ exciting levels to complete with a dash of challenge!

A MAD RUSH
• Cooking Rush like no other game.
• A combination of time management with cooking and serving.

TRAVEL ACROSS THE WORLD
• Travel in your Food truck and set up your own restaurants serving Indian cuisine across the globe.
• Become a Master Chef while serving and excelling at restaurants in awesome places like USA, Canada, Australia, etc.

BEAUTIFUL DECOR UPGRADES
• Decorate your food truck and it’s surrounding with fancy decorations.
• Upgrade the food, kitchen stoves and cooking appliances in order to speed up the cooking time and earn more rewards.

UNLEASH THE COOKING MADNESS WITH CRAZY POWER-UPS
• Never seen before in any cooking game - An amazing buffet of Power-Ups introduced.
• Use Power-ups for more efficient time-management!

MAKE YUMMILICIOUS INDIAN STREET FOOD
• Cook Indian Delicacies that are famous across the globe.
• Street Food that India is famous for - the flavors, the spices, the variety!
• Dishes like Vada Pav, Samosa, Pav Bhaji, Chole Bhature, Tea, Coffee, Lassi and many more.

VARIETY OF CUSTOMERS
• Customers with Individual personalities & traits. Some crazy, some sophisticated, some foodies... got to please them all!


This app offers in-app purchases.

Social:
If you like our work, please like us on Facebook, we will keep on sharing some amazing food recipes. www.facebook.com/masalamadnessbycympl

Support:
Have some questions or feedback for the Masala Madness Cooking Game? Get in touch with us at masalamadness@cymplstudios.com

Permissions Required:
To deliver the best experience we would need some permissions from our users:

*LOCATION: These permissions are needed to show suitable ad content for the targeted user for better ad experience.
*RECORD_AUDIO - This is required for Zapr SDK which is integrated with this app for the purposes of profiling the device on media consumption and other device data and utilizing the same to target relevant content and ads to the device ("Services") pursuant to the terms and conditions of RBL Services ("Terms of Use"). If you'd like to opt-out of this targeting, please visit the following link: http://www.zapr.in/privacy/

* Run your own Food Truck restaurant!
* Serve tasty Indian Street Food across the globe!
* 200+ exciting levels to complete with a dash of challenge!

A MAD RUSH
• Cooking Rush like no other game.
• A combination of time management with cooking and serving.

TRAVEL ACROSS THE WORLD
• Travel in your Food truck and set up your own restaurants serving Indian cuisine across the globe.
• Become a Master Chef while serving and excelling at restaurants in awesome places like USA, Canada, Australia, etc.

BEAUTIFUL DECOR UPGRADES
• Decorate your food truck and it’s surrounding with fancy decorations.
• Upgrade the food, kitchen stoves and cooking appliances in order to speed up the cooking time and earn more rewards.

UNLEASH THE COOKING MADNESS WITH CRAZY POWER-UPS
• Never seen before in any cooking game - An amazing buffet of Power-Ups introduced.
• Use Power-ups for more efficient time-management!

MAKE YUMMILICIOUS INDIAN STREET FOOD
• Cook Indian Delicacies that are famous across the globe.
• Street Food that India is famous for - the flavors, the spices, the variety!
• Dishes like Vada Pav, Samosa, Pav Bhaji, Chole Bhature, Tea, Coffee, Lassi and many more.

VARIETY OF CUSTOMERS
• Customers with Individual personalities & traits. Some crazy, some sophisticated, some foodies... got to please them all!


This app offers in-app purchases.

If you'd like to opt-out of this targeting, please visit the following link: http://www.zapr.in/privacy/

description:
CB Studio is presenting for all craze of chef restaurant games lovers a free chef's cooking game 'Chef Craze Madness Fast Food Game: Restaurant Cooking Games' - One of the most addicting and challenging time management game with fast food craze restaurant cooking. 

Do you enjoy cooking tasty burgers and fast food meals for other people in your own food restaurant kitchen? If yes, then become a maddening cooking master in this chef restaurant craze is one of the best cooking games of 2019. With multiple options to choose from serving yummy burgers, shashlik, shawarmas, tea, drinks, & sauces in this addictive fast-food chef's cooking game for girls.

Practice your skills as a professional chef, handle a variety of orders by serving multiple customers in this addictive time-management kitchen games. Have fun cooking rush making fast food and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your Facebook friends.

Cook tasty food - Serve food & drinks like a talented chef.

Bake, Fry, Boil, Steam, also Grill food ingredients to make yummy burgers & shawarmas.

title: Too Many Cooks
description:
🍣 🍡Share a kitchen with your friends in this delightfully delicious cooking game!🍡🍣 

● You can play solo 🍚 
● You can play online 🍥
● And you can play with friends around you!🍤🍧

It’s heating up in the kitchen! You and up to five more chefs must create amazing dishes against the clock. Can you stay calm and work as a team?  

Pick fabulous cuisines from around the world to cook together:

● Sushi🍣 
● Pizza🍕
● Burgers🍔 
● Soups🍲
● Hotdogs🌭
And more! 

Communication is essential if you want to rise to fame as the world’s best restaurant. Share tools and ingredients with your team, shout for help, and motivate others by praising them for a job well done. 🙌🏻

And don’t forget to cook in style! Your kawaii chef can be customised with a whole range of hats, clothing, hairstyles and facial expressions, allowing you to look as delightful as your dishes. 🥋

Visit https://www.playstack.com/contact# if you need help! Or email us at support@toomanycooks.zendesk.com! 


Follow us to get news and updates:

https://www.instagram.com/toomanycooksapp/

https://www.facebook.com/TooManyCooksGame/

title: Electric Stun Gun - Taser Prank
description:
One Touch Studio presents the Electric Stun Gun, a fun little app that recreates the sound and feel of a real Electric Stun Gun/Taser Gun. The Electric Stun Gun app has a stun gun/taser image in the center which can be touched. When touching the Stun Gun the device will vibrate, generate a crackling sound and flash your LED Flashlight if possible. 

Have fun and prank your friends by pretending you shock them with this app!

Has the following features:

 * Press the gun to generate a shock.
 * Activate the menu to:
   ** Turn On/Off the Electric Shock Noise when activating the Stun Gun.
   ** Turn On/Off the vibration while pressing.
   ** Turn On/Off the LED Flashlight.
 * Have fun!

**Important!**
This app is intended as a prank tool and it is not a real electric shock device.

title: Cooking Tour: Craze Fast Restaurant Cooking Games
description:
Open restaurants 💵 , diners or cantina, serve tasty food to customers and embark on a delicious journey!  Cooking Tour: Craze Fast Restaurant Cooking Games is a cookery game where you are cooking hot dogs, pizza, or other tasty food  🍴, and open restaurants (breakfast restaurants, dinner restaurants,  family restaurants, cantina, restaurant seafood) . Along the way you will have to deal with demanding customers and kitchen nightmares. Do you dare to go on our food tour and build your own food empire? Download and play Cooking Tour now!

Many people love to play cookery game, and especially girls will love some games free for girl that involve cooking hot dogs, serving ice cream, and open restaurants. If you ever dream of owning your own family restaurants or breakfast restaurants, try Cooking Tour! There are also restaurants seafood, diner, cantina, and dinner restaurants to conquer. Try them all and experience the challenge in each location. 

👨‍🍳 FEATURES OF COOKING TOUR – TOP CHEF KITCHEN DINER COOKERY GAME:

♥ OPEN RESTAURANTS! 
Everyone of us dream to own our own family restaurants. Maybe a simple diner, cantina, breakfast restaurants, dinner restaurants, or restaurant seafood. This is your chance to make  your dreams come true!  Open restaurants and explore the world on a tasty food tour. Start with a humble pizza joints and then expand your food empire! 

♥  COOK TASTY FOOD
Cooking hot dogs, pizza, and other menu sounds easy right? Not so, you are cooking under time pressure: your customers are impatient, your cooking might burn down, and you will lose money if you throw away ingredients. It’s truly a kitchen nightmare! You need to act fast, strategize, and have a cool head to be able to handle the kitchen nightmare. 

♥ UPGRADE COOL KITCHEN APPLIANCE
We help you out so you can keep up with the increasing impatient customers and various menu they want. Upgrade your appliances with the money you earn from previous levels. The new appliances will make cooking hot dogs and other food faster and more efficient. On later levels, you can’t survive with old tools so make sure you already get the best tools you can buy.

♥ IMMERSIVE GAME ENVIRONMENT
We provide the best game environment that makes you feel as if you are in a kitchen cooking food and serving it to customers. The graphic is very colorful, detailed, and meticulously created. The animation is lively and exciting. If you are very selective of the game you play and only play the best cookery game with the best graphic and sound, Cooking Tour is for you. 

♥ SIMPLE GAME CHALLENGING TO MASTER
You only have to cook the food by tapping the ingredients and the tools. Then you only need to tap the food to serve it. Very easy and intuitive. But the game will be increasingly challenging. You have objective to complete, you have to satisfy impatient customers, and you need to prevent the food getting burned. Are you an expert restaurateur able to handle the most hellish kitchen nightmare?  If so, you are ready to join us in our food tour today!
So, if you are looking for a cookery game or games free for girl, don’t miss out Cooking Tour! Download and play now for FREE!

👨‍🍳👨‍🍳👨‍🍳
Do you love Cooking Tour: Craze Fast Restaurant Cooking Games? Please rate and review, and also share with everyone so people who are looking for diner game, cooker game, or games free for girls know  can find us!

Follow us on the official fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/cookingtour.topchefkitchen
Or https://www.facebook.com/beemobstudio
