comments: This is supposed to be fun, not frustrating or leaving you feeling like you've been ripped off. The new update has changed the payouts on all the games of chance. Even if you get a "special casino night" it's a major rip-off. I started out with over 260 diamonds on my "special" hour and it took all of my money and my diamonds. I've already decided the "Star Club" aint worth it (tried it) The game isn't much fun unless you have diamonds-too expensive -my advice is PASS!! My id is Qpydz542.

I love the game there are no ads in it. You can dress up style yourself your two bff will help you in this journey. Meet many people in the game u can even invite your friends to play with you. But there is 1 thing that I don't like in it that all the things are very expensive gems r less but give amazing dresses that which has to change and there are only 3 eye ball colours and eye shadow colours. Over all it is a lovely and amazing game u should try the game once in your life. 😍😇😁😁

I like it, it's a fun game. I think the price of the clothing cost way to many diamonds, and not enough of them cost cash, mostly everything cost diamonds. And you don't get many with purchase unless you make a large purchase. And the up scale clothing stores should give gift bags. And why do I have to pay for a date? Haha.

I want to take the time to express my thoughts on this very very cool game! I believe that while I am a star member there is really no benefit to it. $19.95 a week is way more then you should be asking for. It is misleading. You still have to spend money to get ahead not to mention the runway battles are REDICULOUS. It is full of cheaters wearing skirts on top of dressed and looking completely silly yet they win. And the ONLY WAY TO BEAT THEM IS TO JOIN THEM HOWEVER IT'S not even fun anymore!!!

I'm irritated that everything that can help you in the Fashion Arena cost diamonds!! I'm irritated that I did the download of that stupid chef game and finished the tutorial but never recieved the reward for it so I had to spend 5 diamonds to skip it so I could continue with the storyline. It sucks that everytime you get "busted" in recieving gifts from fans the price of continuing goes up. This isnt a game. It's a money pit!!!

comments: This app is absolutely incredible. It has so many drawing and you can create your own drawing. On my second day I colored 5 drawings already. This app is just fantastic. I always get new awards. However, there are so many adds. Which I do not like. I absolutely hate it. Although, all the adds do remove but you have to pay money. It was a fantastic app. I really love the app. I would be shock if anyone rated this a one star. I just cannot believe that.💙💙💙😀

Really good, I was having problems with a other paint by number and it got a little boring so I decided to get this one. This never gets boring for me and has so many puzzles. I also like how it is divided in different genres, it makes it easier to find what I want to do and find specific things that may be hard to see. There is just one problem: I allowed my camera and It still won't let me make custom art, very sad but it's only one problem which I can get from other pixel art apps so it's ok.

Honestly, this game has to be one of my favorite apps in my phone! It just makes me feel so creative and happy. When I'm a little bit sad or maybe just bored, I play this game and it just makes me feel so happy! Also, just to point out, when the other pictures, like, is kinda special, you can just watch an ad and its free! Well, despite the other option which is to get the premium, its fine! So, I am highly reccomending this game to kids, teens, adults, every age!

I absolutely love this game. There are many kinds of drawings to color . I love that the game has different categories to chose from. If you want to color a special drawing it takes 1 add to get it, Well for me it does. I color at least 15 drawings a day. This game is a calming game and a relaxing game. This game is a great game to play in quarantine too. THE END

I love this game, dont get me wrong. Though there is this issue that happens quite a lot when I'm coloring in pictures. I'll be filling/coloring in a picture of something and then there will be a color missing. And I cant find it even when I click the bulb to find it it cant, and then I cant finish the coloring page. Hope you can fix that. 😐

title: Dig This!
description:
Just dig with your fingers — and guide the ball to the cup. It's easy, yet challenging. There is often a trick to solve the levels, sometimes you need take advantage of the objects' speed, sometimes you need to make objects collide, but often it is enough to use your intuitive thinking.

Features:
• Inventive and unique gameplay.
• Easy to understand.
• Realistic Physics.
• 400 levels, designed with love.
• Encourages logical thinking and creativity.
• Discover new features like bombs and multi-colored balls.
• 3D-graphics.
• Solutions are available, if you get stuck.

developerAddress:
Raketspel AB
Kronobergsgatan 21
112 33 Stockholm, Sweden
recentChanges: Halloween Theme!
comments: Challenging game, entertaining. I laugh because I tilt my phone all the time trying to get my ball to roll where I need it to... which doesn't do anything. I like this game because if I ever get stuck there are hints. I would love the developer to help me sync the game (Google or Facebook) so when I change phones I can keep my levels.

Only reason for 1 star is that I changed phones, and when I downloaded the game to new phone I had to start over again! No way to log in and continue from where I left off. Not happy as I spent a good bit of money on this game in the past. Very addictive game.

Greatest game ever! Can"t get enough of this game, please keep new levels coming, no matter how easy, 😜 you are keeping me busy and entertained despite all the chaos in the world. Thank you Raketspel, keep up the great work! This game is the most fun I've ever had on my phone!!!!!! Playing so much, developing DIGGING THUMB SYNDROME.

Its been a good game, with some crazy hard levels. Thats if you dont mind ALL the ads.. But I reached chapter 98 and now it wont open,,goes to the play or insane levels, but NOTHING !!!!!! and there is no way im starting all over !!!! They fixed my bug or whatever,,,i looked for other games while "dig this"was down,,and found nothing good... Changed my rating to 5 stars ,and im back playing my favorite game.

Love this game so addictive. Up to level 100.. always look forward to the new levels. The only thing that i can say is the walkthrough solutions are done on PCs and the ball stops giving the player a chance to set up the route..it doesnt work the same on the phone app and some portions of the levels are impossible to pass.. but i do love this game... highly recommend.

title: Real Guitar Free - Chords, Tabs & Simulator Games
description:
🎸 Real Guitar Free is a simulator app featuring electric and acoustic guitar sounds recorded with live guitars! Learn how to play the guitar with free chords and tabs that we have in stock for you! The app has dozens of useful options and playing modes and is a perfect fit for both beginners and mastered guitarists.

Are you looking for a temporary music instrument substitution or want to learn and revise chords? Do you want to jam to a song that you like or maybe you need tabs of popular songs? Playing music simulator games is the way you spend your free time? All you need is Real Guitar. You can strum, pluck and strike virtual strings playing chords, riffs and even solo of any complexity.

High-quality sounds that are recorded professionally using genuine musical instruments give you the possibility to play without using the amp. The simulator has a user-friendly interface that lets you make music and songs as easy as never before. 

Moreover, It’s a great tool to learn guitar for beginners and an amazing free game for kids. Millions of musicians around the world are fond of it for different reasons. 

Here’s what you get with our app:

★ Various types of guitar and music instruments:
- Acoustic
- Electric
- Classic
- 12 String

★ Awesome playing options:
- Solo mode to make beautiful solos (all music notes are animated)
- Chord mode to practice strumming
- Hand switcher for both right handed and left handed guitarists
- Nylon and steel strings
- Various strumming patterns

★ Chords and guitar tabs:
- Complete chord library book with the playback function
- Chord Finder helps you quickly find chords on the fingerboard and learn scales on the fretboard (useful when practicing guitar lessons)
- Songbook with notes and chords (lyrics are coming soon)


The app is a great tool that can be used to:
- Beginners
- Teach kids how to play
- Make your lessons more fun
- Travel and practice on the go
- Learn new chords, songs, tunes, riffs and solos
- Get to know basics of the bass

Tips from Gismart:
- You should definitely use the app to jam to songs when you travel and are away from your musical instrument. Everyday practicing helps improve sense of tempo and rhythm and is definitely a way to success 
- It’s a must-have tool for beginners as well as for rock band guitarists and game admirers. 
- To learn scales is a great way of exploring the fingerboard (fretboard) and improving your solo and chord performances.
- Never use poor quality apps! There are tons of virtual simulators out there, but only few with high quality guitar sounds made with live instruments and by professional musicians. We’re at Gismart really care about quality.

Whether you’re striving to become the next rock guitarist or simply looking for free games to pass time with music, Real Guitar will provide you and your friends with a lot of fun! ...Oh, and did we mention there’s no need to change strings? )🎸

comments: Scam, do not bother. Forces you to subscribe for almost 10 dollars - a month (!!!) before you even get to play, and then it is *still* choke-full of ads on every corner. The game itself is functional and has a few songs to play, but there is 500 others like that on the market that don't behave like scams. Oh by the way uninstalling will not unsubscribe you, you have to go to the play store->hamburger menu->subscriptions. Yes I know the first three days are free. It is still a joke.

I can't play.When I start the app, it shows me a way to continue and be a member(common)I click on the "x" and then another page appears wich allows me to pay for the membership I look and wait for an "x" I see none I can't do anything except pay wich I will NEVER do.I am really disappointed in this app I thought it would be fun but turns out it's just another stupid scam.DO NOT INSTALL.

This is a horrendous app!! Won't allow you to even play, without paying 70 for a 1 year subscription. There is no way to exit, no X or option to use limited features. Total scam. Don't waste your time. Developers, you need to fix this issue!! Or delete the app!! Calling you out...

At first when I saw the reviews I thought they we're lying. But once I installed it, is said Free Trial 67.98/month! Please fix your game developers. And also warning for the people that want to install it. *SCAM ALERT! DO NOT BUY!*

***SCAM ALERT*** The app is a scam,It will not continue until you subscribe to its annual subscription which is about $50 US, This app shouldn't be on the app store. Its something different to give a trial version, but not letting you continue without subscription, thats some next level scam. Let the user decide if they want all the features.

title: Bowling Crew — 3D bowling game
description:
Join 10 000 000 community and play Bowling Crew – The World’s #1 3D bowling game!

Challenge your friends or play 1v1 matches with worthy opponents from all over the world. This is the best choice for bowling fans and one of the most popular mobile games of all time!

Switch between fascinating bowling balls to knock down all ten pins and get a strike! Win epic PvP-battles to gain rewards. Level up to win even more bowling matches and climb to the top of this free, fun multiplayer game.

Wargaming brings you legendary online multiplayer games to play with your like-minded friends.

Bowling Crew features:

INSTANT MATCHES
We will quickly find you a skill-appropriate opponent. Every match lasts no longer than 3 minutes. No more waiting – play online anytime, anywhere.

CHALLENGE OF THE DAY
Test your skills on alleys with nonstandard rules every day. Show everyone how you're rolling!

SEASONS
Every two weeks you have an opportunity to participate in a competitive season with unique prizes. Win matches, gather tokens and collect season rewards!

FANTASTIC GRAPHICS
We take special care of graphics. Our breathtaking alleys will dive you in a fascinating atmosphere of one of iconic world epochs (often, not real).

AND MORE!
-revolutionary gameplay, which is easy to learn and difficult to master;
-millions of players, who are waiting to be challenged;
-11 unique 3D bowling alleys and 49 striking balls;
-weekly leagues, where you can advance and unlock new bowling balls;
-easter eggs, that are hidden in every bowling lane – try to find them all;
-quick-fire real-time PvP multiplayer, which allows you compete with best bowling players;

Welcome to Bowling Crew! Compete with your friends for the ‘KING OF BOWLING’ title.
First sports game from World of Tanks Blitz and World of Warships Blitz creators.

SUPPORT
In case you’ve faced any issues or some have some questions, do not hesitate to contact us:
E-mail support@bowlingcrew.com
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/bowlingcrewgame
YouTube https://www.youtube.com/BowlingCrew
Discord: https://discord.gg/Hb2w6r5

The game requires Internet connection.

recentChanges:
New season starts now! Here is the news:

- More rewards for happy owners of the Season Pass.
- Improvements in the currency balance. One of them is that you need chips instead of gold for additional attempts in the Challenge of the Day now.

Good luck on the lanes!
comments: There is far too much luck and not enough strategy in this game. One can use the same level balls, lined up on the same dot, pointed in the same direction, on the same alley, use the same swing; and one week you get strikes or 9s. Next week, tons of splits. The flower pin arrangement is a very good example. The game does not reward figuring out strategy. It also does not provide enough opportunities to upgrade balls. It also does a poor job of pairing u against opponents with same ball level.

Fun! All free for me so far. Update: I still really enjoy playing this game. The graphics are incredible and the ways the balls, pins and alleys interact seems to be 100% true to the laws of physics. Sometimes I'll get startled by the ball or pins shooting back in my face or I'll burst out in a laugh when something unexpected happens. This is still one of my go-to games even when I'm losing.

Your game is the best bowling, most realistic and I used to bowl pro. But it freezes up constantly. Its really frustrating when your bowling for 6,000. I've probably lost 15,000 easy. Please fix the freezing! The lower right side still freezes my stick. I like the changes, however, the one u call Rabbit, 2configuration of 5 pins. These games r to challenge yourself.the only way to get a strike is by accident. Please change the one, no fun.

This app is filled with a bunch of bots. The whole system is rigged. What a disappointment. The balls don't get any better. How I know it's rigged and you aren't playing against live players is try and forfeit in the last frame beforeit even begins. Miraculously it shows the other persons score over those 3 frames when there wasn't even enough time to bowl those 3 frames. Rigged!!!

The game is very nice to play, however, when and if you purchase certain items, they don't tell you that if you don't have that particular ball in play you have to WAIT until that ball Opens up for you. Therefore, you purchased something that may not be available to you when you purchase it! So you have to keep playing, just to see your purchased item! NOT GOOD.
